name: Ready
long_description:
Ready builds software tools that help local internet service providers connect more people to better broadband services. Local ISPs connect more than 50 million U.S. homes to the internet today, but their businesses typically run on a mess of legacy systems, and as a result, they struggle to work effectively, and usually fail to deliver great subscriber experience.

With Ready, local ISPs get everything they need to deliver seamless subscriber experience – from finding & signing prospects in their geographic area, to onboarding and billing, to integrations with legacy data systems – all in one place.

If you’re a talented engineer looking for meaningful, rewarding experience, there are many reasons to consider joining Ready for your next chapter, including:
* **Constant engagement**: large product surface area means there’s never a shortage of interesting, challenging, meaningful problems to solve.
* Team motto is “**builders building**”: We strongly prefer shipping results to customers over heavy processes and lots of meetings.
* Experienced founders and a culture of sharing mean there are plenty of opportunities to **learn all about building startups**, not just coding.
* Aspects of the product are customer-facing enterprise tools, other aspects face the subscriber, a rare combo of **B2B** and **B2B2C**.
* **Remote team**: work anywhere you want, as long as you get strong internet (and the platform we’re making helps make that true in more places).
* We’re well funded, and place strong emphasis on **revenue from customers** – our ambition is to build a large and important company with many options down the road and **minimal dilution** along the way.
one_liner: Software that helps ISPs connect more people to better broadband.

name: Letter
long_description: Letter is a beautifully designed banking and financial platform made exclusively for high net-worth individuals. We make it easy to give customized debit cards to family members and staff, automatically donate to charity, and get access to exclusive investment and lending opportunities through our marketplace.
one_liner: Beautifully designed banking for high net-worth individuals.

name: SockSoho
long_description:
SockSoho is India's largest DTC sock brand. We are on a mission to build the Uniqlo of India and socks is just our starting point. 

SockSoho is backed by top tier VCs including Justin Kan (founder, Twitch), Justin Mateen (founder, Tinder), Y-Combinator, Goat Capital, Soma Capital, Cathexis Ventures, Venture Souq, Litani Ventures, Starling Ventures, and strategic investors from Facebook, Google, AirBnB, PayPal, Amazon.
one_liner: DTC Fashion brand for 200M urban men in India

name: Supabase
long_description:
We are building the features of Firebase using enterprise-grade, open source products. Wherever possible, we support existing open source tools and communities. If those tools don’t exist, we build and open source them ourselves.

We are 100% remote.
one_liner: The open source Firebase alternative.

name: CarbonChain
long_description: We’re building a SaaS tool that enables companies in highly polluting industries to track their supply chain carbon emissions so they can mitigate risks from incoming carbon taxes and government penalties.
one_liner: We help companies automate the accounting of their carbon emissions

name: arketa
long_description: All in one platform for online and in-person classes, video on-demand, courses and website hosting.
one_liner: Everything for your fitness or wellness business.

name: Henry
long_description: We train software developers for free and help them find a job in exchange of a share of their future income.
one_liner: We train the best software engineers in Latam

name: Laylo
long_description: Laylo is the complete marketing and messaging platform for content creators. Laylo combines landing pages, messaging, link tracking, and more to empower musicians, artists, celebrities, and creators with the tools to drive more sales and streams.
one_liner: Salesforce for content creators

name: Orange Health
long_description:
Orange Health offers at-home collection of samples on-demand within 60 minutes and delivers test results twice as fast as the industry norm. The reports are shared on chat between patient and doctor to enable seamless follow-ups.

With an on-demand service, patients can now avoid visiting crowded and potentially infectious collection centers. At the same time, they can get diagnosed much faster and get better treatment remotely from their own doctor
one_liner: India's Fastest diagnostics service

name: Maytana
one_liner: Financial command center for multinational startups
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Bundle
long_description: Bundle powers DTC brands with an easy-to-use subscription management and discovery platform. Starting with a Shopify app, we'll give merchants the subscription product power of premium subscription brands like Dollar Shave Club and Ipsy. As we grow our support for more eCommerce platforms and merchants, we'll help customers discover new brands through cross-sells and make it easier for them to manage their subscriptions in one place.
one_liner: Dollar Shave Club as a platform.

name: Akiflow
long_description:
Akiflow is a Tasks + Calendars productivity app
⚡️ Capture tasks from multiple sources
⚙️ Process fast with shortcuts (plan/snooze)
✅ Increase your focus and personal organization
one_liner: All your tasks and calendars into one blazingly fast app

name: Dataland
long_description: Dataland allows internal teams to work across all their systems of record (Postgres, Mongo, Stripe, HubSpot) from one consistent UI. It presents a spreadsheet-like view where operators can both understand state and take action across these different systems. It's also programmable - developers can add new integrations by shipping code to a built-in serverless execution engine.
one_liner: Command your entire business from one app
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: PANADATA
location: City of Knowledge, Panama City, Panama
long_description:
We run background checks on businesses using data from public records in Panama.

Trusted locally by largest banks, law firms, banking regulators, ports, foreign embassies, law enforcement. Our main use cases are due diligence, commercial intelligence and compliance.
one_liner: We run background checks on businesses using data from public records…

name: Cohere
one_liner: The easiest way to support and onboard your users

name: Minimum
long_description: Minimum allows businesses to make their operations carbon neutral by default. Minimum’s platform allows businesses to both calculate the carbon footprint of its products & services, and to connect to a curated set of market-leading carbon offsetting projects to neutralize their environmental impact. Once businesses have selected projects to support, Minimum's proprietary API can be used to embed carbon calculation and offsetting functionality directly into their business processes or customer journeys, for example by triggering an offset at the point of sale. Alternatively, you can use Minimum’s simple web app to easily input company emissions information manually.
one_liner: An easy way to integrate carbon neutrality into your business

name: Farel
long_description: Farel is an all-in-one eCommerce platform specifically designed for small and mid-sized airlines.
one_liner: The Operating system for next generation airlines

name: Hotplate
long_description: Create a menu, receive and manage orders, and offer delivery. Hotplate is a one-stop solution for food operators to efficiently grow and manage their business. For more information please visit:
one_liner: Online ordering platform for independent chefs

name: Tippi
long_description: Select equipment you want for your stay — like a monitor for work or bikes for fun. Tippi rents it to you at low price and brings it to your place.
one_liner: Convert any airbnb or hotel room into your next office

name: Papercups
long_description:
Papercups is an open core live chat widget that you can embed on your website or mobile apps. 
We provide a self-hosted alternative to Intercom for companies that are privacy and security contentious like companies in  fintech and healthcare.
one_liner: Open Core Intercom Alternative
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Skio
long_description:
Skio (skio.com) helps brands on Shopify sell subscriptions without ripping their hair out.

Customers include Bev (drinkbev.com), MatchaBar (matchabar.co), Muddy Bites (muddybites.com), Stryx (stryx.com), Doe Lashes (doelashes.com), Barukas (barukas.com), Red Bay Coffee (redbaycoffee.com), & Remedy Organics (remedyorganics.com).

We've raised $3.7m from investors like Y Combinator (ycombinator.com), Adjacent (Nico Wittenborn), James Beshara (Magic Mind, @jamesbeshara), Jeremy Cai (Italic, @jjeremycai), Daniel Rutberg/Moody Nashawaty (Mutesix), Shaan Puri (My First Million, @ShaanVP), Julian Shapiro (Demand Curve, @julian), Roman Khan (Linjer, Raycon), Paul Michaux (Prose), Kevin Lee (immi, @kevinleeme), Geoff Miles (Bev), Kal Freese (Taika), Mike Rossi (Smile.io), Lauren Jarvis (Literati), Maneet Khaira (Backbone), Adrian Alfieri (@adrianalfieri), Grace Clarke (@graceclarke), Sahil Bloom (@SahilBloom), Alex Whatley (Cresicor), Jeff Chang (Growth Advisor, @JeffChang30), Mike Angell (Carted), Roland Cassirer/Ryan Brennan/Phil Kramer (Orchard Analytics), Yunyu Lin/Rahul Sengottuvelu (Cohere), & many D2C angels.

We do better than current solutions through native Shopify checkout (increased conversions with PayPal option, no duplicate products, no checkout.rechargeapps.com url, no separate refunding), passwordless login (customer tickets around login solved), 10x faster subscription editing, a ready-to-go headless subscription portal (instant loads), group subscription discounts (referrals 2.0), and an easy migration from ReCharge (no payment method updates needed).

The company is founded by Kennan Davison (linkedin.com/in/kennandavison), an ex-Pinterest growth engineer & college dropout.
one_liner: Subscriptions for Shopify

name: Virtually
long_description:
We help build and scale online schools by bringing together payments, live classes, and student management. 

Traditionally, schools have to either hire an engineering team or duct-tape dozens of different tools together. Virtually makes it easy bringing it all together in one easy-to-use solution.
one_liner: The Shopify for Online Schools

name: Scrimba
long_description: Scrimba is a coding course platform with over 120K monthly active students. It's based on a new video format that makes the screencasts fully interactive for students, and easier to create for teachers. Our vision is to create a coding school that has the quality of Stanford but the price of a gym membership.
one_liner: We turn people into hireable devs at 1% of the price of code bootcamps

name: TyltGO
long_description: TyltGO provides brick & mortar retailers and e-commerce brands with same-day delivery under their own brand name.
one_liner: TyltGO powers retailers with same-day delivery.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Flint
long_description: Flint is a local buying collective and purchasing service for Food Wholesale. We compare dozens of wholesalers and get exactly what you need while never missing out on any savings.
one_liner: Flexport for the wholesale of food.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Liyfe
long_description: 20% of cost for oncology care is wasted due to lack of nurses for symptom management. Liyfe is an innovative digital nurse to scale symptom and risk assessment, transforming patient care at home.
one_liner: Digital nurse to scale symptom and risk assessment--oncology and NASH

name: Kingdom Supercultures
long_description: Kingdom Supercultures designs novel microbial cultures that make it easy for food manufacturers to create exciting new foods.  We've developed the world's first 0-calorie fermented sodas, beers with entirely new flavors, and novel plant-based dairy replacements.
one_liner: New foods with microbes

name: Tella
one_liner: Video recording for work

name: Mozper
long_description: Mozper is bringing the weekly allowance into the digital era in Latin America. About 70% of the population in the region has never received formal financial education, and do not have the right tools to teach their children. In Brazil and Mexico alone, parents give more than $10B each year in pocket money to kids. Currently, parents must choose between giving their kids cash or handing over their own credit/debit cards. Mozper is a debit card and app where parents can give their kids an allowance, set spending rules (so they can't blow it all on video games), assign chores and even create and track savings goals. Mozper is currently available in Mexico.
one_liner: A debit card and app designed for kids and parents in Latin America

name: Memberstack
long_description:
Memberstack makes it easy to add user accounts and recurring payments to static websites, Webflow, Squarespace, and more! 

We’ve helped 1000+ companies generate millions in recurring revenue, and we’re just getting started 😁 If we succeed, Memberstack will enable hundreds of thousands of people to create powerful web apps and massive online businesses.

Memberstack is backed by some incredible leaders, advisors, and investors who helped build the companies we use every day. Check the link for more info 👇

https://www.memberstack.com/blog/1000-customers-and-fundraise
one_liner: Add user accounts and payments to any website with one line of code

name: Mailwarm
long_description:
Mailwarm is a marketing software which takes care of your email deliverability so your emails reach your recipients' inboxes.
Mailwarm allows you to :
- get a perfect email activity 
- raise your sender reputation
- keep your email deliverability high
one_liner: Prevents marketing emails from landing in spam.

name: Aquarium Learning
long_description:
ML models are only as good as the datasets they're trained on, and that means that most improvement to model performance comes from improvement to the quality and diversity of their datasets.

Our tooling makes it easy for ML teams to find anomalies + failure patterns in their datasets and fix these problems by editing / adding the right data. So the next time you retrain your model, it just gets better.
one_liner: We help ML teams improve their models by improving their datasets

name: Piepacker
long_description: At the crossroads of online multiplayer gaming and video chatting, Piepacker is a free and legal platform which provides instant access to officially licensed retro video games from a web browser, without any download. It features a video chat with AR 3D filters and Piepacker's catalog continues to grow with plans to add new original retro games, modern indie as well as cards and board games.
one_liner: Piepacker, play retro games online with friends

name: Notabene
long_description:
Notabene helps businesses perform crypto transactions in a regulatory compliant way. Think of us as the SWIFT network for Crypto.

New global regulations for crypto transactions are here and will be enforced over the next year. Businesses now have to follow strict rules similar to banks, or shut down. 

We provide a SaaS platform that allows businesses to perform due-diligence on their counter-parties and manage the risk of incoming and outgoing transactions.
one_liner: Software to manage risk  in crypto transactions

name: Decentro
long_description:
Almost every company that has to integrate with the legacy financial institutions, faces several challenges when it comes to the product cycle. Not only are the APIs and documentations less available, but they are also old school and ridden with errors and loopholes. 

On top of that, the lack of a single point of contact from the underlying institutions, makes the already long integration cycle of 5 months feel like a temple run between different departments. And since those services break and update over time, you can imagine the nightmare in terms of coordination between the tech teams. 

We are a full-stack platform where you can come, select your desired modules, play in the sandbox, and launch your product with the APIs and SDKs within a couple of weeks! Not only that, but we also take care of all upcoming fixes, iterations, and updates without breaking any flow.

It's that easy, as it should be. Welcome to the future.
one_liner: API platform for banking integrations (Plaid for India and APAC)
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Bikayi
long_description: An app to help SMBs create their whatsapp integrated online stores without hassle as easy as forwarding messages on whatsapp.
one_liner: Shopify for India

name: Tydo
long_description: Tydo organizes complex data for DTC brands into rich and intuitive dashboards. Data that you can use to make clear decisions and take deliberate action on. Data that moves with the currents of your business. Let’s get clarity and make waves together!
one_liner: Performance analytics for today's DTC brands

name: WareIQ
long_description:
We are building an on-demand Fulfillment network and all software tools in a central platform which is required for an Etailer to manage their eCommerce Fulfillment operations.

Etailers connect all their stores to our platform and send us their inventory. Whenever an order is placed on any of the channels, our Decision Engine allocates order to the nearest Warehouse holding the inventory, and right courier partner to pick & deliver to the end customer.
one_liner: Amazon-like next day delivery for eCommerce companies in India
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Clew
long_description: Clew lets employees see and organize files across their work apps from one place.
one_liner: Unified file system for the cloud.

name: Plerk
long_description:
We help companies to give local and remote employees flexible benefits and perks, no matter geography.
A virtual card with benefits to pay for flexible perks for local and remote teams worldwide. Companies define budget, choose the programs of perks as general or granular as they decide, deploy money and give employees the power to decide the merchant. Company has total control, just one bill. Employees choose what they really need and want.
one_liner: We modernize perks and benefits in emerging markets

name: Hyper
long_description: Hyper is an avatar social network for iOS. We allow anyone with a modern iOS device to build an avatar and go live to the internet with the push of a button. "Real" avatar live-streamers spend $10,000+ on elaborate motion capture setups to go live– we can do most of this right from a modern phone's sensors and computer vision.
one_liner: An avatar social network for iOS.

name: Nabla Bio
long_description: At Nabla, we’ve developed a protein engineering platform that makes it easier to design antibodies that are more likely to get FDA approved. We do this by learning the molecular properties that differentiate approved antibodies from ones that have failed.
one_liner: Antibody drugs that are more likely to get approved

name: Balance
long_description: Balance is the easiest way for B2B marketplaces, merchants, and service providers to process payments online. We raised our last funding round from Lightspeed, Stripe, and Max Levchin to build 'Stripe for B2B'. Balance offers the first business checkout, enabling business customers to pay How they want (check, card, bank) and When they want (net terms, payment plans, invoice payments). this is achieved while the seller receives the funds instantly and easily like card payment.
one_liner: The first B2B Checkout Platform

name: Vitable Health
long_description:
We're a team of engineers, clinicians, and operators redesigning how healthcare fundamentally works for the 80 million uninsured and under-insured Americans. We started with a simple vertically integrated primary and urgent care health plan through a network of nurse practitioners that come directly to members virtually or through in-home visits. We designed our plan to make high-quality concierge care accessible to everyone - from the Grammy winners that have used us to our uninsured members.

We're growing fast at 5x ARR over the last 6 months and are well-capitalized from world-class investors like Y Combinator, Softbank, and others unannounced along with incredible founders and operators with experience building and funding unicorns like Michael Seibel (YC, Twitch), Immad Akhund (Mercury), Allison Pickens (Gainsight), Jack Altman (Lattice), Dan Folkman (GoPuff) and others.
one_liner: Affordable primary and urgent care health coverage

name: Batch
long_description:
We enable companies that use messaging platforms like Kafka the ability to gain visibility into their queues and most importantly, gain the ability to replay any events that have passed through their bus.

Event replay is rooted in event sourcing and while "replay" is often touted as one of the best features of event driven arch, it is difficult and costly to achieve. With our platform, any engineering org can reap the benefits of event replay without breaking the bank.
one_liner: Observability and replays for messaging systems

name: Oico
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description: Oico is the best way for large contractors in Brazil to buy construction material. We replace the time-consuming work of managing orders, deliveries and payments across dozens of suppliers, with a one-stop solution.
one_liner: B2B marketplace for construction material in Brazil.

name: Statiq.
former_names: Statiq ( by Shatify Services Private Limited )
Statiq ( by Sharify Services Private Limited )
long_description: Statiq connects electric vehicle owners to EV chargers. EV owners can discover chargers near them, pre-book a slot and pay for the usage conveniently. Property owners can buy, share their chargers, manage them and earn by becoming charger hosts with Statiq. Our EV chargers can be found at shopping malls, workplaces, restaurants , hotels, residential spaces.
one_liner: India's Largest EV charging network

name: NextEra Robotics
long_description: Software Platform for companies to hire Industrial Robots like they hire employees - on a monthly or hourly payment.
one_liner: We enable companies to hire Industrial Robots like they hire employees

name: Justo
long_description:
At Justo, which means “fair” in Spanish, we aim to give restaurant owners access to technology that will help them increase their sales, at a more fair price. We provide restaurants their own online store, we teach them about advertising and marketing, and we automate the process for them. We also offer last-mile delivery service.

We are in Chile, Peru. Colombia and Mexico.

Our goal is to create a service that is profitable for restaurants and for us.
one_liner: Helps restaurants take online orders directly from customers
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Hellometer
long_description:
Hellometer helps fast food owners' grow same store sales using security cameras to improve customer wait times.

Speed of service is fast food's core value proposition (it’s literally in the name) and owners currently don't have a reliable way to measure it. We show them when and where they have slowdowns and for every 7s they improve service times, owners see 1% increase in revenue.
one_liner: Making fast food faster

name: Stacker
long_description:
We let you create applications for your team, your partners or your customers, powered by the data you're already using.

Connect in your spreadsheets, Airtable or database and we'll automatically create an app for you.
one_liner: Turns spreadsheets into internal apps and customer portals

name: Tappity
long_description: Tappity is building the world’s largest library of interactive lessons for kids—starting with science! Find every science topic kids love in one place taught by the world's most entertaining instructors.
one_liner: World's largest library of interactive lessons for kids

name: KeyDB
long_description: KeyDB is a fast key value database that combines in memory caching and FLASH persistence in a single package.
one_liner: The only database you'll ever need

name: buildspace
long_description: If you're a dev that's curious about web3 but not sure where to start -- this is the spot for you. Learn + start building cool stuff right now, earn NFTs, access secret work opportunities in crypto.
one_liner: Where devs jump from web2 to web3.

name: Yotta
long_description: Users save money, get over 2x the national average in interest and weekly chances to win additional prizes up to $10 million through weekly random number drawings.
one_liner: Save money and win prizes up to $10m through weekly number draws.

name: Mesh
long_description: Mesh, is an internal social network for companies, that makes it easy, for employees to accomplish goals, and get timely feedback, especially in remote teams. It looks like Facebook, and instead of filling boring HR forms, employees like & comment, on each other’s progress.
one_liner: Performance management platform that fits the way you work
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Daybreak Health
long_description: We offer online counseling services designed for teens.  Our licensed therapists provide clinically-validated therapy programs to teens through our mobile app
one_liner: Clinically-validated online counseling designed for teens

name: Biocogniv
long_description:
More than a decade since the HITECH Act established a timeline for EHR adoption, US hospitals today find themselves generating more clinical and administrative data on any given day than previously thought possible. Yet clinical operations are still based on subjective decision-making and traditional processes that ignore not only the raw data, but also the valuable efficiency improvements that can be automatically derived from them.

Biocogniv picks up where the EHR transformation left off and introduces real-time intelligence on top of this vast backdrop of data, to improve the quality, cost, and ultimately access to care in US health systems.
one_liner: Real-time AI for hospitals

name: Osmind
long_description: There are 22M+ Americans who suffer from treatment-resistant mental health conditions, meaning they’ve failed two or more conventional treatments. Our mission is to further innovative mental treatments (ranging from FDA-approved psychedelic medicine to neuromodulation) for those who are suffering the most. We do this by empowering providers, improving patient care, and accelerating research. Our software is used by mental health doctors and their patients. We analyze multimodal data from the software to help the doctors deliver better care and also offer insights to help research and development of new treatments that actually work. Together, we can usher in the mental health revolution and help solve our world's mental health crisis.
one_liner: Operating system for neuropsychiatry

name: Vectrix
long_description:
Vectrix gives IT and security teams an easy way to secure the SaaS tools that their businesses rely on.

In just a few clicks, teams can scan and continuously monitor their tools for security issues ranging from user access and file exposure to misconfigurations and shadow IT.

Founded by former security engineers and security leaders at Vimeo, Autodesk, and PlanGrid, we’re bringing a fresh take to how growing companies have approached security historically, offering ease-of-use, flexibility, and accessibility that, until now, has never been an option.
one_liner: Scan and detect security issues in your cloud and SaaS tools.

name: MarketForce
long_description:
MarketForce empowers consumer brands to manage their field sales activities and grow their distribution channels in Africa, and other emerging markets. 

We enable informal merchants to source, order and pay for inventory at any time via interactive SMS and mobile app, and get it delivered within hours. We also empower them to collect digital payments and make extra money by reselling digital financial services such as airtime, electricity tokens and bill payments. 

MarketForce is already enabling trade across 20,000+ retailers, and $500 million in transactions have been processed through the platform to date. We have raised $2,500,000 in seed funding from a group of strong institutional and angel investors, including Future Africa, Launch Africa, Greenhouse Capital, V8 Capital, Reflect Ventures, Rebel Fund, Remapped Ventures, EchoVC Partners, P1 Ventures and Ventures Platform.
one_liner: The operating system for informal merchants in Africa.

name: Atomic
long_description: With our API any company that holds consumer deposits (e.g. savings apps) can easily embed professionally managed investment accounts into their services.
one_liner: API that lets companies embed investment accounts into their services

name: Bits
one_liner: Bits is a digital store card that helps people build credit

name: Opvia
long_description: Today, when scientists do experiments, they store their data in Excel.  So we built Opvia.  Opvia keeps the simplicity of spreadsheets, but adds powerful features specific to scientific workflows.
one_liner: Flexible data and process management for life science companies.

name: webapp.io
long_description:
Merge changes in hours instead of days. Webapp.io embeds new full-stack review environments directly into every pull request.

If your team is building a webapp + using github/gitlab/bitbucket, talk to us! founders@webapp.io
one_liner: Review code changes like Facebook does
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: doola (formerly StartPack)
long_description: doola (formerly StartPack) is a “Business-in-a-Box” for online SMBs. We take care of everything online SMBs need to form an LLC, set up their bank account, accept payments, and manage ongoing compliance and tax filings. We realized how difficult it was to set up the full stack of software and accounts you need to get a business off the ground. This is the same problem faced by online SMBs, who begin their business as a side hustle, and just want to focus on growing their business, not annoying administrative work. That’s why we built doola: to take care of it all. Today, people on every continent have launched companies with doola. (HQ: New York)
one_liner: "Business-in-a-Box" for online SMBs

name: BLISSWAY
long_description: BLISSWAY is developing a new tolling technology that gives cities the ability to maintain free flow conditions on highways 24/7, with massive monetization of road assets as a byproduct. We achieve this via roadside solar-powered cameras, state-of-the-art ML & optimization algorithms, and a smartphone app. Our first pilot was deployed in Colorado in August of 2020.
one_liner: Solving Highway Congestion

name: Workbase
long_description:
We help B2B companies reduce churn and grow customer spending. 
Our product gives account managers access to data dashboards and priority checklists needed to proactively save customers and upsell them to more profitable products.

Most companies have all the data they need to figure this out, but it’s often locked away in 20 different systems. There is no central place for an account manager to easily prioritize which customers to focus on and what actions to take to help them. Workbase is the solution, by one-click integrating the data sources and customizing the interface and actions for each company.

When working on similar internal tools at companies like Segment, we saw first-hand that proactively managing the customer journey could increase net retained revenue by as much as 20 percent.
one_liner: Data & workflow platform for B2B account teams

name: ClearMix
long_description: Our platform connects expert producers with guests to record marketing videos remotely from anywhere - videos are produced 4x faster and at 10x lower cost.
one_liner: On-Demand, Fully-Remote Marketing and Sales Video Production Platform

name: Cradle
long_description: Cradle is a B2B payments network in India that lets small businesses collect online payments from other businesses for free.
one_liner: B2B payments network in India

name: Arist
long_description: Arist is the text message learning platform. We help Fortune 500 companies and governments rapidly teach and train employees, entirely via text message.
one_liner: Workforce training via text message

name: TANGObuilder
long_description: Today the building design process is cumbersome and expensive. Architects submit their design to structural engineers for validation. Engineers need to design all structural elements such as walls, columns, and beams to ensure the structure will not collapse and complies with regulations.  The structural engineer needs four to six weeks to generate the initial solution. The engineer will submit his proposal to the architect and then engage in an extensive back and forth discussion until they agree on a satisfying solution. TANGObuilder generates the building structural design in real-time, cutting six weeks of the overall process, and reducing material usage by 30%.
one_liner: TANGObuilder automates structural engineers jobs.

name: Foreword
one_liner: A marketplace for live, online workshops for professionals

name: Humanloop
long_description: Annotation, training, monitoring in one unified platform powered by active learning, enabling humans and AI to do knowledge work at scale.
one_liner: All-in-one platform for NLP

name: Minimall
long_description:
Hi, we’re Minimall. 

Minimall is Pinduoduo for Europe. Customers save 50% buying directly from factories in China. 
We started selling facemasks during covid and made 450k $ in 6 weeks. Now we’re selling home & electronics goods.
In Europe 30% of all products originate from China; we get the best prices by partnering with factories and selling in Europe with our group-buying app.
We are 3 french-chinese cofounders living in both Paris and Shenzhen, with over a decade of experience working with chinese factories. 
Like Pinduoduo, you have to group-buy with friends or family to get the discount. That makes customer acquisition 20 times cheaper, those savings are passed on to customers. 
Last year, with this model, customers bought $ 100B from Pinduoduo.
We’re Minimall, we’re bringing that model to Europe!

Additional adressed field: product's lifecycle
one_liner: Pinduoduo for Europe. Customers save 50% buying directly from…

BlaBla is your fun, convenient, free app to enjoy an immersive English learning environment with endless topics, 12000+ video lessons, audio chatrooms, and more!

name: Speedscale
long_description: Speedscale helps enterprises prevent costly incidents by validating how new code will perform under production-like workload conditions.  Speedscale can replay and mock API traffic, introduce chaos, and measure the golden signals of latency, throughput, saturation and errors before the code is released. Speedscale Traffic Replay is an alternative to legacy testing approaches which take days or weeks to run and do not scale well for modern architectures.
one_liner: Accelerate development by simulating API's with production traffic.

name: CoreCare
long_description:
Getting paid in healthcare is hard. Healthcare providers contract with numerous payors, all of which have their own systems and processes for authorizing payment. Worse, payor systems don't communicate with provider EMRs, so providers are forced to do a lot of manual work between them to get paid. This results in providers spending $300 Billion a year to get paid, and ultimately collect less money than what they are owed.

CoreCare aggregates administrative patient data from all systems providers work with (EHR, Gov, Payer), standardizes it in our Enterprise Data Warehouse and creates a single net view of administrative patient data for the provider. Then we add workflow automations (according to client specifications) to eliminate the manual work providers are forced to do to get paid.
one_liner: Making it easy for healthcare providers to collect payments using…

name: Farmako Healthcare
long_description:
We are building India's first centralized EMR App for more than 80% of doctors in India who still work on paper. 

You as a patient can visit all hospitals using Farmako, and all your lab reports and prescriptions from different doctors get automatically uploaded into your health record.
one_liner: India's first Centralized EMR App for Doctors, Clinics

BukuWarung is SEA's fastest growing startup and we are building digital infrastructure for 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia. BukuWarung's vision is to empower 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform, starting with bookkeeping, online storefront and payments.

BukuWarung has raised $80M from top tier VCs globally: Peter Thiel's Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y-Combinator, Rocketship.vc, AC Ventures, Quona Capital, East Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, SoftBank Partners, DST Global Partners, and strategic angel investors from Stripe, PayPal, Plaid, Grab, Gojek, Facebook, AirBnB, Fast, Mastercard.

Every year, e-commerce companies spend billions on content (product descriptions, articles etc..) -- it is expensive, inconsistent in quality and slow. Hypotenuse instantly replaces all of this by generating this content in seconds, in a way that matches the company's writing style while maintaining human-level fluency.

- Invest your charitable balance for tax-free growth with low-cost ETFs.
- Send grants to 1.4 million charities with a few clicks.

The best part is that all the infrastructure runs in your AWS account, and you have full ownership and visibility into it. No more black boxes that you can't troubleshoot and manage.

We want to empower engineers to build, deploy, secure, and monitor infrastructure faster than ever. Our long-term vision is to be the go-to platform to get started and to be able to manage all things cloud - no matter which cloud provider you choose.

Teams can use a simple URL that is easy to join and remember. You can share a website and allow your colleagues to click, type, and browse with you. You can share your code directly from your IDE or even share a terminal session that your team can interact with. All with high-quality audio and video chat.

We are building tools for real-time remote collaboration that makes it easy for teams to work as if they were side by side and share what they know.

The Indian restaurant industry has already adopted technology to adapt to the growing demands and match the expectations of today's customers but the absence of a full-stack cloud-based software is extremely frustrating to business owners today. The existing systems lack modularity, lack the ability to integrate with services, and hence aren't plug and play. Also, Restaurants are extremely frustrated with all the 5-6 independent systems that don't talk to each other. 

We are solving these problems by building a full-stack solution for the 30 million+ restaurants in India, by solving order management, operations management, online delivery, payment processing, reports & analytics, and guest identification and re-engagement all using one system - Explorex.

While the majority of universities in Europe are free to attend, STEM courses are often outdated and theoretical; Strive School works with those pursuing STEM fields to help them become job-ready software engineers.

With Volopay, finance and accounting teams can control expense requests and approvals, make bill payments (domestic/cross-border), manage company cards, and reconcile all accounting on one platform.

Volopay completely eliminates the need for expense reports and reimbursements while giving everyone in the company a card to use. We worked in an offshore dev centre in the past and it took 2 months to get our reimbursements and 4 weeks to make any purchase as there was just one corporate card for the entire company and clunky bill payments solutions offered by the banks. 

Among our customers are Reddoorz (OYO of South East Asia), Dathena (biggest data security co in Singapore) and Beam (APAC’s leading micro-mobility player).

A comprehensive care plan is delivered with a focus on the doctor-patient relationship and holistic medicine to reverse the condition.

The system includes camera hardware mounted to the vehicle and a processing unit that can control the vehicle's brake, throttle and steering while under the supervision of a driver, augmenting their skills but not replacing them. 

Our key insight is that there is a 30% difference in fuel efficiency between the best and worst truck drivers. By training our AI ADAS system how to drive from data provided by the best drivers, the AIDAS can improve the efficiency of all drivers.
one_liner: Energy-efficient Co-Pilot for trucks

We've solved this problem. The Depict.ai algorithm increases overall e-commerce revenue by 4-6% for any store without needing any sales data at all.

name: SuperTokens
long_description:
SuperTokens is building open source authentication (as an alternative to Auth0, Firebase and AWS Cognito). Add secure, hassle free authentication to your app in 1 day. We enable startups to launch quicker and focus on their core product offering

1. We're easier to implement as we take a modular approach - making it possible to pick only the features you need for your use case. This means you need not worry about complications associated with other features (eg: SSO and OAuth if you don’t need it) and this in turn makes it easier to implement and manage SuperTokens.
2. Developer's can own and manage their user's data. 
3. SuperTokens can be run on your premise for free and also has a generous hosted tier for those who dont want to manage it themselves.

SuperTokens is being used by hundreds of developers across the globe.
one_liner: Open source alternative to Auth0 / AWS Cognito / Firebase Auth

Roboflow enables developers to create computer vision models without machine learning expertise. With our end to end platform helps you can convert a few dozen raw images into a custom trained and deployed model in an afternoon.

Over 50,000 developers (including employees of half of the Fortune 100) have used Roboflow to improve products and processes in manufacturing, agriculture, medicine, retail, and more.
one_liner: 🖼️ Give your software the sense of sight.

name: Jeeves
long_description:
Jeeves provides startups in Mexico, Canada, Colombia, Chile, UK and Europe with a true international corporate credit card, upto 4% cashback, no personal guarantee required and built in ability to pay SPEI in Mexico and EFT/e-transfer in Canada.

If you are operating a startup internationally and using a USD card, you pay 1-2% on every transaction -- this is automatically added by MasterCard, Amex and Visa. Jeeves eliminates those fees and you can pay us back directly in your local currency -- MXN, CAD, GBP, EUR, reducing your FX fees significantly and making your month end expense management process more efficient.

We can sign up non US entities as well as US entities. So if you are operating only in Mexico, Canada, UK or Europe, you can still sign up for Jeeves (no US entity required).

Additional benefits include:
* No personal guarantee required to sign up.
* Pay us back in your local currency -- MXN, CAD, GBP, EUR.
* Can sign up non US entities.
* No FX fees (vs. using Amex or another US card for international purchases).
* Pay for non card transactions directly with the app -- this includes the ability to pay for SPEI in Mexico and EFT/e-transfer in Canada (coming soon).

Save your accounting and finance team 10+ hours a week and:
* Start spending without any transfer of funds (we put the cash up for you).
* 5-10x higher limits than Amex.
* Free built in expense management tools.
* Unlimited virtual cards for your entire team.
* 1% cashback on spend up to $20K and 2% above it.

We are live with more than 1000 companies - including a large YC contingent. Join us today!
one_liner: International banking infrastructure for global startups.

We instantly send your data to RedShift, BigQuery, PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, and Snowflake.

name: twoplus fertility
long_description:
We are making a new fertility treatment that infertile couples can order with a click of a
button to help them conceive at home. Our technology increases the likelihood of pregnancy by guiding significantly higher number of sperms towards the ovum using a proprietary combination of surface features and microenvironment optimization.

The fertility treatments available today, such as in-vitro fertilization (IVF) and intra-uterine
insemination (IUI), are psychologically and financially draining and come with considerable treatment-associated risks. Furthermore, over 25 million women of reproductive age in the US
have limited nearby access to fertility treatment.
one_liner: An effective home-use fertility treatment for natural conception

PhotoRoom provides photo editing software powerful enough to create outstanding images yet simple enough to be used without any training. We leverage deep learning to translate pixels into objects, drastically simplifying non-creative tasks such as removing backgrounds from images.

Our mission: enable entrepreneurs and small businesses to compose images that stand out.

Founded by Matthieu Rouif (10 years of experience in mobile apps, built apps used by 100+ million users) and Eliot Andres (4 years of experience in large-scale computer vision), PhotoRoom was selected by Y Combinator in 2020. Talented engineers, designers and marketers have joined the team since then, coming from Apple, Algolia or Google among others.

Today, PhotoRoom is profitable and is used by more than 5 millions of users every month. We improve our product and our technology with the support of world-class experts in the field like Yann LeCun, Roxanne Varza or Holger Seim. PhotoRoom was featured by Apple as one of the most innovative photo apps in recent years.

As a small tight-knit team, our priorities are impact and iteration speed. We ship new versions every week and talk to our users daily. There is nothing we enjoy more than working side-by-side with another team member to improve our users' experience.
one_liner: Automatically removes background & get amazing marketing images on iOS

name: Trident Bioscience
long_description: Trident Bioscience builds tools to expedite the discovery and optimization of useful proteins. Our technology first applies predictive models of protein structure and function to generate sets of potentially active protein sequences. We then apply our state-of-the-art sequence optimization algorithm to design gene libraries capable of testing these candidates extremely quickly and affordably. By combining these technologies, we're closing the design-build-test loop of protein optimization and cutting the total cycle time to help bring synthetic proteins to market faster than ever before.
one_liner: Accelerating protein engineering.

Granular, high-accuracy demand forecasting solves this issue by allowing businesses to align resources to exactly meet demand. 
Our demand forecasting as a service, brings simplicity & precision to this often complex and error-prone process, and quickly provides business users the right answers to run their operations.

But when a call gets dropped or the audio cuts out, it’s hard for the video developers to understand why it happened. This is a major problem for new players in the video chat industry that lose customers because of call quality issues; customers should be able to use video platforms with the features they want without having to sacrifice call quality.

Careerist is an online learning platform that trains tech job seekers and automates their job applications with Robotic Process Automation, leading to faster and higher placement. It features live and self-paced training via adaptive-learning software and partnerships with third-party tutors who teach on Careerist's infrastructure.

Techcrunch: "Edtech meets SaaS in Careerist’s job placement learning platform. The startup trains job seekers through live and self-paced training taught by third-party tutors. The adaptive learning software is meant to help candidates prep for tech interviews. Once a candidate is well equipped, Careerist uses automation to help them apply for jobs. The startup doesn’t require tuition until candidates are placed."

name: Revolve Surgical
long_description:
Revolve is building the world’s only surgical robot designed for every operating room. Its simple yet powerful design makes it the only robot that can service the 1M+ abdominal surgeries performed outside of hospitals in the US every year.

The founders met at the top surgical robotics lab in the country where they worked on next-generation surgical tools for the da Vinci Surgical System. Collectively, they’ve worked on medical robots for applications in general surgery, ENT, urology, dentistry and neurosurgery; medical imaging AI (ex-Swift Medical); rehabilitation devices, surgical instruments for pediatrics; the Ford GT; and a lunar rover.

Revolve’s surgical robotics platform has been developed in collaboration with over 50 surgeons, resulting in a system that is just 1% of the size and cost of competitor devices. The robot has been validated through animal testing, and the company has secured LOIs from Buffalo General Hospital and Pearl Women’s Center.
one_liner: Surgical robotics for every operating room

name: Liv Labs
long_description:
Liv Labs is a US-based consumer healthtech company making fitness solutions for incontinence. 
27 million American women worry about leaking pee in public: a $7B market. Liv Labs is developing a simple medical device to keep them dry at the gym and adaptive exercise software to restore natural continence. Device inventor, Carly Price, reimagined the humble pillow for Casper and now leads the Palo Alto Design Lab for Ford Motor Company. Liv Labs CEO, Melody Roberts, incubated digital self service experiences now scaling globally at McDonald’s and Panera. We landed a $1.67M Direct Phase II SBIR grant from the NIH, based on stellar device effectiveness data and user feedback like: “With this, surgery is off the table.” Our human factors study is complete, our FDA presubmission is filed, and our clinical trial is gearing up at Northwestern University.
one_liner: Fitness solutions for incontinence

name: Inspector Cloud
long_description: AI SaaS that helps FMCG brands to cut labour costs, boost on-shelf availability of their SKU through Image Recognition.
one_liner: AI SaaS for retail analytics

name: Mecho Autotech
long_description:
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). 

About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. 

We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part.
one_liner: On-demand  auto maintenance & repairs

name: Odiggo
long_description:
Odiggo connects car owners with mobile mechanics in the middle-east.  With our app, car owners can order an oil change, replace their tires, or order any other car service within 24 hours. 
Every month over tens of thousands of car repairs are fulfilled using our service and we take 15% of every transaction, growing at 35% MoM, and we have currently generated millions of dollars in sales since we started 19 months ago, with over 85,000 users. Odiggo is founded by Ahmed Omar & Ahmed Nasser, both coming from a growth background and have grown companies in the US and MENA to over $100M annually, We have raised $2.93M in Seed from Y-Combinator, 500Startups & Plug&Play, and others. https://odiggo.com
one_liner: car-services in minutes

name: Beau
long_description: Beau is a no-code tool for businesses to onboard and automate interactions with their clients. Customers use our software to collect submissions, payments, send messages and more.
one_liner: No-code client workflows for repetitive client-facing tasks

name: Toku
long_description: Toku helps B2C companies increase their monthly revenue collection rate so they can focus on the their main business. Payment method management, failed payment retries, payment reminders, failed payment notifications, among others.
one_liner: Recurring payments for B2C companies on Latam
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Metaphor
long_description: We’re building a better search engine than Google by teaching large language models to read and understand the entire web. Our models already outperform Google on some queries, and they’ll get a lot better. We’ve scaled them by 25x at YC, and as a technology language models are scaling faster than Moore’s Law.
one_liner: A better search engine than Google via language models

name: Safer Management
long_description:
Safer Management sells attendance software to public school districts and colleges. Public schools receive federal funding based on their average daily attendance, and our software ensures they get the money they need.

We started Safer Mgmt. 12 months ago after I dropped off my twin boys and experienced inefficiencies with the sign-in process. We are now in 75 public schools and two colleges with annual reoccurring revenue of $621,000. We have 82% margins and are profitable. At scale, we will charge $15 per student per year. 

There are 70 million public school students in America which is a $1.4 billion dollar market opportunity.
one_liner: Attendance tracking for Public Schools and Universities

name: Chipax
long_description: Chipax handles all payments, invoices, and reconciliations to provide real-time AR & AP for SMBs, starting in Mexico and Chile. We're currently at $1.6M ARR with more than 1,100 paying businesses. The company is founded by Antonio Correa, François Gueneau de Mussy, Joaquín Brenner, and Felipe Urzúa, Engineers from top universities in Chile, who have all experienced the pain of managing SMBs finances first hand in their previous jobs.
one_liner: Quickbooks for SMBs in Latam
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Amenli
long_description: Amenli is the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. Egypt has one of the lowest insurance penetrations in the world with a 100m population and a $2B GWP market growing 20+% YoY and a potential TAM of $10B. Over the past few months, Amenli issued 500+ policies in less than 10 mins compared to the minimum of 3 weeks industry standard. Amenli co-founders, Shady & Adham were founding team members of Paymob, one of the fastest growing payment companies in MENA. Shady was CCO and Adham was its Tech Lead and they worked together for more than 3 years to scale-up Paymob from scratch to 50K+ merchants, 5 countries and dozens of millions of monthly transactions.
one_liner: Offers insurance to customers in a convenient & transparent way

name: Pide Directo
long_description:
PideDirecto is a branded digital ordering and delivery solution for local buisness in Latam. We build out their direct-to-consumer sales channels and enable them to deliver their products in under 30 minutes. 

We empower local buisness such as restaurants, pharmacies, local grocery stores, flower shops, clothing stores, cake shops and many more by building out their own branded website, integrating phone and social media orders and helping them deliver their products in less than 30 minutes. While also providing our partners key customer insights and marketing support. 

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.
one_liner: Enabling brands in LatAm to sell direct and deliver in under 30min.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Lightly
long_description: When ML teams send their data to companies like Scale.ai for labeling, most can only afford to label 1% or less of their datasets.  But today they don’t have a good way to pick which 1% to label. We help them pick the best 1% of their data to label.  By labeling the most representative data, they significantly improve model accuracy at the same cost.
one_liner: Help ML teams label the right data
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Nash
long_description: Nash makes it easy for businesses to offer same-day delivery. We do this by building business workflows on top of delivery APIs (like Doordash, Uber, Skipcart). For example, a local dry-cleaning business can start offering pickup and dropoff service at a customer’s desired time without operating their own fleet.
one_liner: The easiest way for any business to offer delivery
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Equipt Health
long_description: Equipt Health is a digital health platform focused on increasing access to healthcare, starting with sleep apnea.
one_liner: Home medical equipment, prescribed online and delivered to your door.

name: Payflow
long_description: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid whenever they want, instead of just once a month (or biweekly). We sell it to companies as an employee benefit (B2B SaaS).
one_liner: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid their salary on-demand.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Ahazou
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description: Ahazou is a SaaS app that helps offline local businesses to connect online with their customers to promote their brand, to build their reputation and to sell more. We've reached USD100k MRR with 16k+ subscribers. Our vision is to build the next all-in-one platform for 50 million local businesses to grow online in Latam. The company is founded by Rui Miadaira - 10+ years building local businesses, 3x entrepreneur, tech background with a Harvard MBA - and has built a team from iFood, Movile, PicPay. Ahazou is backed by GFC, Monashees, Y Combinator (S21) and more.
one_liner: Podium for local businesses in Latam

name: Titipku
long_description: Local market is a traditional wet market that consist with 200 - 1000 merchants who sell groceries located in every residential area. We  digitize all these merchants into our apps and provide personal shoppers. So every household can buy groceries from multiple merchants at one local market in one single order. There are 16.000 local markets in Indonesia with 8.000.000 merchants inside.
one_liner: Instacart in Indonesia and Southeast Asia

name: HEO Robotics
long_description: HEO Robotics visually monitors satellites for governments and defence. We do this by transforming existing Earth observation satellites with software to image other satellites as they fly close by.
one_liner: We visually monitor space objects for governments and defense

name: Turion Space
long_description: Turion Space is building spacecraft to remove orbital debris and provide services to existing satellites.  Our spacecraft will rendezvous and dock with current satellites and large debris objects using vision sensors and robotic arms.  Utilizing the onboard propulsion system, the spacecraft will either deorbit or change the orbit of the debris object or satellite. Our team has a proven track record of bringing ideas to orbit with over 25 years of experience from SpaceX, Skunk Works, and Electroimpact.  Solving this problem is crucial to ensure a sustainable space economy, and is the first step towards our longer term vision of mining Asteroids.
one_liner: Space debris removal and satellite servicing

name: Stepful
long_description: Stepful trains people with a high school education in 4 months and places them into healthcare jobs. Healthcare is the fastest growing industry in the US accounting for 40% of all jobs added including medical assistants, nursing assistants, and phlebotomists.
one_liner: Online Training for Healthcare Jobs

name: Synder
long_description: Synder is an easy accounting platform focused on e-commerce.  It connects all sales platforms (like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon or Etsy) into one ecosystem, providing businesses with consolidated cash flow, automated accounting, and inventory management making Synder a single source of truth of the correct analytics, accounting and tax filing.
one_liner: Easy accounting for e-commerce
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Quest
long_description: Quest is a Q&A app where experts answer questions in short audio clips. We’re starting with career advice, hosting founders and operators from YC and companies like Google, who share intimate and personal stories about work you've never heard before.
one_liner: Audio answers to career questions

name: Café
long_description: Café makes it easy for teams to meet in and out of the office by showing you who’s working, from where, in the upcoming days.
one_liner: Empower people to decide where to work from

name: Datlo
location: Maringá - Floriano, Maringá - State of Paraná, Brazil
long_description: Datlo is a geointelligence platform made for sales and marketing folks. In seconds you can conduct market research, find new customers, and distribute channels for your company. All of that without needing a data scientist or a programmer.
one_liner: Datlo helps companies increase sales and expand through data

name: Verano Health
long_description:
We're building the nation's largest digital diabetes platform for underserved Americans. There are 80 million Americans on Medicaid and 30% or more have chronic disease. Less than 1% of patients with diabetes receive needed training.

We provide a SMS-based telehealth platform to people with chronic disease on Medicaid. Our proven Healthy at Home program uses 2-way SMS interactions, weekly diabetes coaching visits, and evidence-based health education. 

Our vision is to reach millions of Americans that lack at-home support for chronic disease. We're billing health insurance $186 for telehealth visits and have 2 contracts underway. With your support, we can be a fully sustainable nonprofit by 2023.
one_liner: Nonprofit telehealth coaches for underserved Americans on Medicaid

name: OneShop
long_description: OneShop is a mobile app that helps clothing sellers manage the complexity of selling on multiple marketplaces, such as Poshmark and Mercari.
one_liner: One app to manage your clothing resale business

name: FirstIgnite
long_description: FirstIgnite helps connect companies, consultants and investors with global academic experts in order to help them make better decisions.
one_liner: Academic Experts on Demand

name: MergeQueue
long_description:
MergeQueue is a developer tool that automates merge workflows and keeps builds healthy. Engineers save up to 5 hours a week and avoid frustration of broken builds.

Our users include Slack, Bosch, Lightspeed, Fast Checkout and many others. For instance, Slack went from 180 master-build failures per quarter to just 1 build failure when they started using MergeQueue.

Our goal is to become the leading brand for developer experience.
one_liner: Google-level engineering productivity suite
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: LabSimply
long_description: There are over 70 million low accuracy tests done in US every year for conditions like the flu. Labsimply is using novel CRISPR enzymes to replace these with Point-of-care tests that offer PCR accuracy in 5 minutes or less.
one_liner: CRISPR powered Diagnostics with results in < 5mins

name: Talentdrop
long_description:
Talentdrop is turning recruiting into an open marketplace, where hiring companies post bounties for their open roles and any recruiter or other professional can collect it by referring a successful candidate. Companies get more people working on their hiring problem without having to pay more for it, and now anyone can earn big recruiting bonuses previously limited to a few firms.

Professional recruiters can now monetize the excess candidate inventory created from their primary business. This is work they've already done but previously couldn't benefit from. Likewise, candidates won't have to start the vetting process over from scratch again and again since they'll be able to be referred with context and get warm intros into hot hiring companies that can be hard to access. Companies can also share candidates in a more efficient way (for example, Company A has two great product candidates but only one headcount - they can refer the second).

Machine learning will help us make better hiring recommendations faster.
one_liner: Marketplace that matches talent to a company's needs.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Stack
long_description: Stack helps users to save for their life goals like retirement, marriage, education through low fees and globally diversified ETF portfolios in an effortless and automated manner. Savings can be set on autopilot by setting personalised rules such as 'round up' on transactions or 'set & forget'.  Stack also helps the users to earn passive income as they spend through Stock reward on the Stack Card.
one_liner: Vanguard of India for Effortless Investing

name: GamerPay
long_description:
GamerPay is a marketplace for trading gaming skins and assets without scams. We do this by integrating with games to instantly validate all trades.

We launched 3 months ago and transacted 245.000 dollars growing 30% MoM. 

Talking to 5.000 gamers we learned that 46% have been scammed more than once. Over half are minors, who are stuck trading for cash on social media due to their age. 

We are the first to build a fully compliant system for parental consent, enabling the majority of gamers to trade legally and giving the parents peace of mind.

There are 215 million trades annually in games we support. We make 7 dollars on average per trade. So a $1.5B initial market, growing fast alongside gaming and blockchain game economies.   

The team behind previously co-founded the largest transactional marketplace for secondhand high end clothes in Denmark, with 1 million users and a yearly transacted GMV north of $40 million.
one_liner: We are the marketplace for trading gaming skins & assets without scams

name: Sitenna
long_description: Sitenna provides software that helps telecom companies find new locations to put up towers and antennae. It currently takes >24m to deploy a site and this is getting much worse as 5G requires x6-10 more sites than are deployed today. We bring the market together and speed up the process to 6 months, reducing costs for everyone. The team is led by a group of industry veterans with C-Suite level access to telecom companies worldwide.
one_liner: B2B SaaS for telecom companies to find new sites for towers & antennae

name: Evidence
long_description:
Evidence is an open source, code-based business intelligence tool.

Evidence enables analysts to build reports and dashboards by using a markup language instead of a drag and drop interface.
one_liner: Business intelligence for modern data teams

name: Protego
long_description: Protego helps Latin American companies automate their chargeback dispute process and reduce inefficient manual reviews. We deliver a reliable anti-fraud solution that helps minimize chargebacks losses, identity fraud, and high false-positive rates.
one_liner: We help Latam companies recover lost revenue from chargebacks

name: Luminate Medical
long_description: Luminate Medical is developing a medical device that helps cancer patients prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss in a comfortable and portable way. Over 1.1M US patients receive chemotherapy treatments causing hair loss each year, creating a $1.7B market in the US alone. To date, we've used our novel compression therapy to prevent hair loss in a 120 animal study, and completed a clinical study showing our device works with healthy volunteers. Our team includes a Thiel Fellow, and a Biomedical Electronic Engineering PhD who has led clinical trials for breast cancer patients.
one_liner: Developing a medical device to prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss.

name: Pactima
long_description:
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company that’s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.

Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.
one_liner: Live video signing for real-time agreements

name: Medium Biosciences
long_description: Our product is a software platform that makes it really easy for industrial biotechnology companies to interface with machine learning models for enzyme engineering. Enzymes power most chemical reactions in nature but usually need engineering to work at industrial scale. Our models can be used to suggest high performing sequences that would have typically taken months of wet lab work to identify.
one_liner: Deep Learning for Enzyme Engineering

name: Adra
long_description:
Adra is a software that helps dental clinics find cavities and other problems in x-rays faster and more accurately so they can book more procedures and increase their revenue. We started our pilot with 20 dentists 2 months ago and have already increased their clinic revenue by 12%. 
Adra is founded by a dentist and clinic owner, a machine learning expert, and a bioscientist.
When every dentist uses Adra, they will bill patients an extra $52B per year. We will capture a quarter of that, making our addressable market $13B.
https://www.adra.ai/
one_liner: Driving dental clinic revenue by finding more cavities

name: BlackOakTV
long_description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.
one_liner: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.

name: Tantl
long_description: Tantl makes it easy for developers to build internal workflows, such as allowing customer support reps to quickly process refunds. We do this by providing a low code api that handles 90% of the work.
one_liner: Enabling developers to build internal workflows 10x faster.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: StandardCode
long_description:
StandardCode makes it easy for companies to comply with child data privacy laws such as COPPA and GDPR-K. We do this by making APIs to automate online ID and age verification for children.

[Book a demo](https://calendly.com/anaskar/30min)
one_liner: APIs for parental consent and age verification

name: SFA Therapeutics
long_description: SFA Therapeutics is creating therapeutically-tailored oral drugs that regulate the immune system from bacterial metabolites; with a focus on autoimmune diseases and cancers that originate from chronic inflammation. There are over 100 million patients who suffer from autoimmune diseases. Our treatment is designed to block the root cause of many of these chronic inflammatory diseases, with a safe oral drug.
one_liner: Regulating the immune system to block cancer & autoimmune diseases

name: Codex
long_description: Codex is a devtool and local first solution that enables just-in-time documentation for deep collaboration wherever you work. From your IDE, like VSCode, to our desktop app. When you’re working and think “what the #$@%!? does this code block do?” Codex let’s you request context with a button click. It then determines the best person to respond and stores their answer for other team members to access later, all automatically and directly on the code block.
one_liner: Make programming multiplayer
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Mindmesh
long_description:
Meetings, docs, wikis, conversations... 
Mindmesh is the knowledge base that works with your existing tools: write bite-size documentation on the fly, backup what would otherwise be lost in Slack, and search for the knowledge scattered across Drive, Notion, Intercom, Zendesk and many more.
one_liner: The knowledge base that scales with your team

name: Opkit
long_description: Opkit is purchasing SaaS for surgery centers. We save surgery centers $500k+/year by optimizing how they buy medical devices. We launched 3 weeks ago and already converted our first pilot customer to a $30k annual contract.
one_liner: Purchasing software for surgery centers

name: Crew
long_description:
Instead of waiting for candidates to apply, companies use Crew to pro-actively contact, nurture & close talent, at scale. 
The 1st all-in-one recruiting CRM that lets teams automate their outbound efforts, streamline the hiring processes, and gather all the data in one place.
one_liner: Modern Recruiting CRM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Therify
long_description: Therify is an inclusive mental health benefit for companies. Through our web platform, employees access culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided content to support their emotional well-being.
one_liner: Inclusive mental healthcare for companies
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Phykos
one_liner: Growing seaweed to stabilize the climate.

name: Shopscribe
long_description: Shopscribe enables the 1.3M local shops in Europe – like bakeries and nail salons – to offer subscriptions for their products and unlock guaranteed recurring revenue.
one_liner: Subscriptions for local shops

name: Plai
long_description: Plai is the advertising tool built for the 50million+ microbusinesses and creators. The platform lets them launch targeted ads from their phone in seconds, with no experience required. Instead of spending hundreds of hours learning Google Ads, TikTok Ads or spending a lot of money hiring an expensive agency, creators and micropreneurs can use Plai to launch their campaigns. Plai lets creators simply plug in their creative and budget, and Plai runs their advertising campaign using the best strategies from Google and Facebook.
one_liner: Launch targeted ads from your phone in seconds

name: Atlas
long_description: Atlas is building the operating system for restaurants, focusing on Southeast Asia. Think Shopify for restaurants -- the easiest way to start, run and grow any restaurant online and offline. The team at Atlas previously built Grain, a venture-backed online restaurant, to millions in revenue. Now, Atlas is building the software that helps restaurants achieve what Grain did in 3 years in less than 3 months. Team and investors are from Grain, Accenture, Microsoft, Udacity, McKinsey, Salesforce, Y Combinator and others.
one_liner: Operating system for restaurants, focusing on Southeast Asia

name: CellChorus
long_description:
CellChorus is a life science company that applies AI/ML to “watch” and evaluate 1000s of videos of cell-cell interactions so scientists can develop and deliver better cell therapies, antibody therapeutics and vaccines. 

Our platform allows us to evaluate thousands of mini-microscopy experiments in parallel and quantify movement, contact, killing, survival and other activities of single cells and cell-cell interactions. 

Our customers include top-25 biopharma companies developing cell therapies, antibody therapeutics and vaccines (including one of the few companies with an approved CAR T cell therapy) across oncology, infectious diseases and auto-immune disorders.
one_liner: Dynamic single-cell analysis

name: Abatable
long_description:
Abatable is the robo-advisor for high quality carbon offsetting. We help companies offset their hard to abate emissions through diversified portfolios of trusted carbon offsets which we source, evaluate and finance. Our team has the right founder-product fit to tackle this problem and have been close friends for over 10 years. Maria was previously VP at Goldman Sachs, where she worked with large companies on forestry investments and carbon procurement, and Valerio was a Product Manager at Monzo, Google and Facebook. 
We are targeting a $5B annual market opportunity from asset managers with existing net zero commitments as our initial customer segment.
one_liner: Robo-advisor for high quality carbon offsetting

name: ContraForce
long_description:
ContraForce XDR is delivering an open-architecture approach to automating the complex challenges of Security Operations through automation. 

Our no-code approach allows customers to deploy an enterprise grade SecOps platform that dynamically updates detection and response capabilities through an AI-driven approach. Allowing customers to collapse the time it takes to detection, contain, and response to threats, minimizing the security and scope of impact.
one_liner: An AI-Driven Platform to Deliver Open XDR for Any Business.

name: Storylane
long_description: Storylane enables marketing and sales teams to create and share interactive product demos in 10 min. Prospective buyers can self-experience the demos without talking to sales. Our no-code platform allows teams (without any engineering help) to capture, personalize, add guides and publish a demo. These Demos can be embedded on websites, email campaigns or sales followups.
one_liner: Build Interactive Product Demo in 10 mins for SaaS companies

name: StrideQ (formerly SliceQ)
long_description:
StrideQ (formerly SliceQ) is the automated phone ordering system for restaurants which ensures no missed calls and no missed orders. Surprisingly, 33% of restaurant customers still prefer ordering via phone calls, but front desk staff is often busy and revenue is lost.

After enabling StrideQ our customers have increased their sales by over 10%, even while dealing with staff shortages in covid times.

Phone ordering is our wedge to become the point of sale system for all restaurants. StrideQ also streamlines dine-in and online orders in one single system. It helps to run restaurants more easily by effectively managing operations during weekend peak rush.
one_liner: Automated phone ordering system for restaurants

name: Byte Kitchen
