long_description: Byte is able to quickly expand the geographic footprint of any given brand with minimal up front investment by licensing their IP, and rolling out their cuisine across a network of next generation kitchens optimized for delivery, pick up, and take out.
one_liner: Byte kitchen brings America's best restaurants to your neighbourhood

name: Moving Parts
long_description:
Moving Parts is a library of components for iOS. Everything your designers and engineers are building that isn’t unique to your app, we can do better and cheaper.

We're building high-level SwiftUI components that plug right into your application, made to solve real-world problems when designing and building a native mobile app.

Our components are also highly styleable and take care of responsiveness, localization, accessibility, and follow all platform best practices around dark mode, dynamic font size etc.
one_liner: Delightful components for iOS.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Membo
long_description: Membo is a next-day grocery delivery app for premium customers in Europe. Like PinDuoDuo Groceries in China, Membo is the fastest way to order your weekly groceries directly from local food producers. The convenience of supermarkets & 15-minute grocery apps comes at the expense of freshness: food that should be delivered fresh, gets bought in bulk and sits on warehouse shelves for days. To get the freshest produce, you need quick producer-to-end-customer delivery, not just quick warehouse-to-customer delivery. Membo lets you order food directly from hundreds of local food producers & organises delivery so you always get the freshest version of every product. Membo's CEO, Vahur Hansen, was an early engineer at TransferWise, and co-founder, Paula Kink, built her own healthtech startup. Launched in Dec 2020, we've grown 30% MoM for the past 8 months and have delivered over 4000 orders in Tallinn, Estonia.
one_liner: Groceries fresher than a farmer’s market, delivered to you (EU)

name: Orderli
long_description:
Orderli is tableside ordering for bars and pubs in Europe. Orderli works without downloading an app, guests can scan a QR code on the table, browser the menu and order what they want. 

For the staff we provide a simple app which gives them a better overview who is ordering and control of the orders that are sent to the kitchen.

In the backend we use predictions to recommend restaurant owners what to purchase and make changes to the menu in real-time.
one_liner: Square for Europe

name: Suplias
long_description:
Suplias is a B2B marketplace where mom and pop stores in Africa buy inventory directly from manufacturers using a mobile app
We have launched in Nigeria, where we have been growing by 40% monthly for the last 12 months
Our founding team has a combined 25+ years of experience in supply chain and ecommerce having worked for Procter & Gamble, Pepsi Co, Gap and Jumia, the #1 ecommerce company in Africa.
one_liner: Where small grocery stores in Africa buy inventory

name: Abhi
long_description: An early wage access platform allowing salaried employees to draw down a percentage of their accrued salary before the next payroll cycle. Helping employees to avoid late payment fee on bills, access emergency cash and substitute expensive debt. We work on a B2B2C model allowing companies to extend the product as a benefits program to their employee base.
one_liner: Abhi is Pakistan's 1st financial wellness platform focusing on…

name: Pandai
location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
long_description:
💡 What is Pandai?

Pandai is an app that helps students get better grades in school. 

Pandai provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, from which students can learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose their weaknesses.

🔥 Why do we build this? 

In Southeast Asia, the education system is competitive and exam-oriented. 

There is a huge demand for interventions (tutors, workbooks, and extra classes) to help students perform better in school. Pandai fills the demand with a solution that is better than the alternatives.

👨‍🏫 Who We Are

The three founders are based in Malaysia and have known each other since high school, 23 years ago. 

After we graduated (from MIT & other US colleges), we started our first education company in 2007, focusing on coaching school students in STEM subjects.

We worked closely with students (many of them from underprivileged backgrounds) and saw firsthand the impact we’ve had on them. 

We then realized that with technology, we could reach more students and bring more impact. Hence, we released Pandai in 2020. 

🚀 Present & Future

Currently, we have launched in our home ground Malaysia in 2020. 

So far, 280,000 students have completed 83 million questions on Pandai, and 92% of users have seen some improvement in their academic performance. 

We plan to expand to Southeast Asia and other emerging markets, a market of 100M+ school students. Pandai is designed to be scalable, and our content (also available in English) can be mapped to other curricula from other countries.
one_liner: Learning app for school students in Southeast Asia

name: Verde
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description: Verde is a digital platform that simplifies and expands access to working capital loans for small and medium farmers in Brazil. We serve farmers locally with faster and more transparent financial resources.
one_liner: Digital lending platform for Brazilian farmers

name: Coinfeeds
long_description: Coinfeeds is an API that provides real-time news and social sentiment on any cryptocurrency. We provide the best data by applying the same machine learning technologies we used when leading the data teams at Uber and Robinhood. Our long term vision is to become the Bloomberg for crypto.
one_liner: Bloomberg for cryptocurrencies

name: idemeum
long_description:
idemeum is a Passwordless Application Management platform. Our vision is to provide a single place for small and medium businesses (SMBs) to set up and manage employee access to SaaS apps.

Behind the scenes we connect to any HR system and automate employee onboarding and account provisioning. Employees leverage mobile device biometrics to access any type of app - free or paid. 

Instead of deploying multiple tools for SSO, password management, and passwordless access, idemeum offers one platform to do it all.
one_liner: Passwordless application management platform.

name: Ruth Health
long_description:
Ruth Health treats the 83% of post-pregnancy womxn who pee in their pants. We deliver 30-minute Postpartum Recovery + Training Sessions via telehealth, so moms around the globe with pelvic floor prolapse can get back to work, sex, and normal life—5x faster.

Using conversational AI + biometric readings, Ruth Health will accumulate the largest, most diverse database in America on longitudinal maternal health
one_liner: Telehealth for pregnant people 🧡

name: Teamspace
long_description: Teamspace is a shared canvas for remote collaboration. It combines documents, images, tables, tasks and more on a realtime spatial canvas. It's designed for remote and video-first from the ground up.
one_liner: A shared canvas for work.

name: Baubap
long_description: Building the first digital bank for the economically vulnerable starting with a mobile lending app  for Mexico
one_liner: Smart micro financing for everyone

name: Oneistox
long_description:
Oneistox offers online cohort-based courses for designers, architects, and engineers from around the world for their professional growth. Learners are upskilling in subjects like Product design, Building Information design, Sustainable design, Computational design, Graphic design among others. 

Project-based learning and peer-to-peer interaction in cohort makes learning enriching and increases the completion rates to 82%. Learners work in groups of 2-6 on live projects and create significant outputs from scratch.

2000+ learners from 27 countries have already upskilled on Oneistox. The majority from India, Middle East and USA. 
Active community of 60,000 on social media.

The company is led by alumni of SPA Delhi and IIT Madras.
one_liner: Online cohort based courses in design and architecture

name: Kapacity.io
long_description:
Kapacity.io is building the future of smart energy grids with an electricity Load Balancing service focused on buildings.

By shifting electricity consumption in buildings to periods of lower electricity prices and higher renewable energy production, our customers pay less for electricity and emit less CO2. Our service can also participate in power grid balancing to help keep our lights on during moments of high energy demand.

Our customers are building owners, asset managers and energy companies who use Kapacity.io to reduce energy costs & emissions in their building portfolios. Buildings are responsible for 30% of global CO2-emissions. Our mission is to push that down to zero.
one_liner: Reducing energy costs & emissions in buildings.

name: Plug
location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
long_description: Plug gives digital businesses access to multiple payments services through a single integration, and the ability to change between them on a transaction to transaction basis without writing code.
one_liner: Plug is an API to accept payments with multiple payment providers

name: Tuli Health
long_description:
Tuli health is turning all 11 000 independent pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers.  Our software makes it easy for these pharmacies to sell and fulfill COVID-19 tests today and other diagnostic tests tomorrow. Instead of waiting for a long time or travelling a long distance to receive the tests, customers can now receive tests in their neighbourhood, with results guaranteed in 24 hours. 

Tuli Health was launched in June, had onboarded 147 pharmacies, performed over 7000 diagnostic tests, and helped pharmacies generate $1.3 million in incremental revenue per month. 

The vision is to make every local pharmacy into a diagnostic center powered by Tuli Health.
one_liner: Transforming pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers

name: Stownest
long_description:
Valet self-storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. 

Service built on technology and strong customer experience fundamentals.
one_liner: Valet Self Storage - Flexible, Full-Service Storage Spaces for INDIA

name: Filadd
long_description: With online courses, we help students graduate from University, starting from the admissions and throughout their entire college education until they graduate. All our courses include 24/7 interaction with our Tutors and Teachers making 95% of our users reach their desire score. We have prepared more than 10,000 students and in 2021 we have already made 800K which means 6X Year-over-Year growth.
one_liner: We help students in Latin America graduate from College.

name: Kiwi Biosciences
long_description: Kiwi Biosciences can help 18M Americans suffering from Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) enjoy a normal meal without running to the bathroom two hours later. We develop novel, patent-pending enzymes that break down common digestive triggers in food.
one_liner: Patent-pending enzymes to break down common dietary triggers

name: Nasdisc
long_description:
Nasdisc is a marketplace for the $4B worth of records purchased every year.

The vinyl market has seen exponential growth in the past decade - the first 6 months of this year has already seen an increase of 108% in sales. Our platform takes a 12% cut, making this a $400mm opportunity that is more than doubling every year.

Pressing plants are backed up years out, bots buy limited releases in seconds, and record prices are skyrocketing in both retail and aftermarket sales. Despite this growth, the only dedicated marketplace is difficult to use, doesn’t process transactions, yet facilitates over $600mm in vinyl exchanges per year. 

This is why I finally decided to quit my job at Google and recruit my best friends from college to fix it. We’re all software engineers and have been passionate about music and vinyl since we were kids, and have $50k in records ourselves.

We started building a marketplace in July and launched our website 4 weeks ago. We now have $1k / week in sales, and $50k in listings.
one_liner: A marketplace for vinyl, cassettes and cds

name: Luable
long_description: Luable allows people in Latin America to compare and invest in 5% yield savings accounts online. Unlike the US, you cannot sign up for a savings account online in LatAm unless you are already a customer. We make it easier for anyone to do it online.
one_liner: Online broker for high yield  savings accounts in Latin America

name: Caire Health
long_description: Our AI software improves the speed and accuracy of brain bleed diagnoses - increasing hospital revenue and saving patient lives.
one_liner: Diagnose Brain Bleeds in Seconds

name: bloop
long_description: Nobody studies CS to spend their careers CTRL-F'ing their way through documentation and Stack Overflow. We surface code examples within the IDE, keeping developers in-flow.
one_liner: Radically better code-search
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Synth
long_description:
We are building a second brain for knowledge workers. Our app captures all the relevant information you consume - text, audio, video and summarizes it 1-click. It also makes it easy to search and retrieve the information you want, wherever you like.

All co-founders know each other since 2019 and met at a one-year AI fellowship. Since their time at the fellowship, they have felt frustrated creating their second brain while shifting between apps like Roam Research, and Obsidian. These applications were burdening them to do all three tasks of capturing, organizing, and retrieving, making the cost to value ratio of setting up the second brain really high. They decided to solve this and want to shift the burden of these steps on to software, making it easier for a user to build their second brain. 

Synth is targeting 30 million knowledge workers, who earn more than $100k, paying us $20 per month, presenting a $7.2billion market opportunity.
one_liner: Second brain for knowledge workers

name: Pylon
long_description:
Pylon provides water and electricity distribution companies, in emerging markets, with a platform for reducing their losses as well as opening new revenue streams. These losses are coming from leakages, consumption thefts, and uncollected bills, amongst others.
We have signed 11 utilities onto our platform across 2 countries and connected our systems to over 560k endpoints.
Today our average client has reduced their aggregate revenue losses by 45%
Expanding in Africa, LATAM, and SEA.
one_liner: Infrastructure management software for water & electricity companies

name: Dime
long_description: Dime lets creators turn their content into unique digital collectibles. Fans can buy items from their favorite artists, trade them on our marketplace, and display their collections on our site. Under the hood everything is secured using NFTs, but we take care of all of that. For creators it’s just like Patreon--except fans get to own a unique digital item in exchange for their support.
one_liner: Turn your content into unique digital collectibles.

name: Telivy
long_description: Telivy’s empowers SAAS platforms and insurance agencies with an embedded multi-carrier cyber insurance solution, providing the fastest and easiest solution to get cyber insurance for their small business customers. We are licensed to do business in 48 US states.
one_liner: Fastest way to purchase cyber insurance for small businesses

name: PAYZE
long_description: Innovator of online transactions, helping businesses in former soviet union countries to accept payments from around the world through a single integration.
one_liner: Stripe for former Soviet Union countries

name: Humane Genomics
long_description: Humane Genomics is an artificial virus platform. We design and build oncolytic therapeutics with unprecedented selectivity and efficiency. Our first indications are bone cancer, liver cancer and small cell lung cancer.
one_liner: A platform to make artificial viruses as cancer therapeutics.

name: Algofi
long_description:
Algofi is building a fast and low-cost lending market on the Algorand blockchain.

Building on Algorand enables < $0.01 transactions compared to ~$15 or more on other incumbent networks.  These high costs and slow transactions make decentralized lending markets inaccessible to the majority of potential users, something we are working to change.

Our long term goals are quite ambitious.  We aim to be the first crypto-native bank that bridges the gap between traditional and decentralized finance. The initial lending protocol will launch for users everywhere in Q4 of 2021, with additional fiat on- and off-ramp solutions, and more, forthcoming.
one_liner: Fast, low-cost crypto lending market on the Algorand blockchain

name: Female Invest
long_description: Female Invest is on a mission to close the financial gender gap by educating women+ on personal finance and investing through a subscription based online learning platform. Soon we will integrate a trading platform and in that way become Robin Hood for women. We currently have MRR of USD 125.000 and 17.000+ paying subscribers across more than 60 countries.
one_liner: Female Invest is a social e-learning platform for investing

name: Ferveret
long_description: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers inspired by nuclear power plant cooling. We save data centers 96% in cooling costs, 68% on capital costs and reduce their carbon footprint by 40% while increasing chip performance by 2X. Today about 40% of the electricity use of these facilities is wasted for cooling. Ferveret patent-pending technology revolutionizes the data center cooling and eliminates the waste of electricity. Furthermore, this technology can be implemented overnight in existing data centers with our uniquely designed tanks. The company is founded by Reza Azizian, MIT alumnus, one of the lead thermal architects for Microsoft HoloLens and at NVIDIA, and Matteo Bucci, an MIT professor with 15 years of experience in two-phase heat transfer for nuclear reactors. We have in lab proof of concept of our technology, and we are in the process of building demo units to launch pilot programs with our first two industrial customers. Some of our notable investors are YCombinator and E14 fund.
one_liner: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers

name: Filta
long_description: Filta is the face filter NFT marketplace being built by veterans from Pixar/Oculus/Facebook. We partner with creators to release limited-edition filters for their fans to use on social media. It turns out: the face filters you see everywhere on Snapchat and Instagram are created by independent artists - not by the platforms. Popular filter artists today have 1m+ followers, their best filters get downloaded over 1B times each, and rarely (if ever!) do artists get paid for their work. So we fixed this with the best filter creation tools on the market and a marketplace that lets artists sell their work directly to their fans. We’ve recently launched our testflight and have already sold ~50 filters including one for $1200. We’re now scaling up to bigger artists (200k+ followers) and working towards a future where filters become digital fashion and are worn on social media, on stream, in VR, and on the streets with AR.
one_liner: The Face Filter NFT Marketplace

name: Siglo
long_description: Siglo is a wireless ISP for communities in urban Latin America offering a faster, better, and easy-to-pay service.
one_liner: Home Internet for urban Latin America

name: Waterplan
long_description: Waterplan is a SaaS platform for companies to manage water availability in their facilities. Ccustomers include multi-national companies like  McCain, Henkel, San Miguel Global, and BIER (Beverage Industry Environmental Roundtable). The platform combines companies’ operational data with local water satellite imagery to provide a real-time financial assessment of water risk. Based on that, it offers tailored mitigation and adaptation opportunities, from conventional infrastructure to nature-based solutions. The company was founded by a team of tech and water 2nd-time entrepreneurs with two exits and almost ten years of experience working for Fortune 500 companies in water projects. Early backers include YCombinator, Greg Koch (former Senior Director, Global Water Stewardship at The Coca-Cola Company), Gonzalo Delacámara (Senior Policy Advisor to the European Commission, UN, OECD, World Bank Group), & Benjamin Zaitchik (Associate professor in the Johns Hopkins University Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences). waterplan.com
one_liner: Water risk mitigation for industrial facilities.

name: Buoyant Aero
long_description: Buoyant Aero builds unmanned blimps that move middle-mile air freight at half the cost of a small plane. We're two MIT hardware engineers who've been friends for almost a decade, and we've built satellites and antennas at Astranis, Wafer, and OneWeb. So far, we’ve built and flown four airships - our most recent is 20 feet long and capable of speeds up to 35 miles per hour. We’ve also closed $5 million in LOIs and have two pilot programs planned. We're starting by improving air cargo in remote regions like Alaska and northern Canada, and will expand to move less-than-truckload shipments in low density parts of the world.
one_liner: Using drone blimps to move middle mile air freight at half the cost.

name: Argus
long_description: Argus lets the bankers, consultants, alternative asset investors and others trade their $5T of liquid assets easily in line with employer compliance restrictions.
one_liner: Unlocking the $5T of assets of employees with employer restrictions

name: Bedrock AI
long_description:
Bedrock AI is software that extracts hard-to-find information in public company filing like annual reports. We find accounting policy changes, regulatory problems, and other material information that most analysts never see. This information is buried in 100s of pages of corporate reporting. Our web-based research tools facilitate detailed public company analysis at scale so that investors can cut research time and improve portfolio returns. 

We launched in April. Our customers include 3 hedge funds with over $25B in AUM and we have ongoing pilot contracts with 4 government agencies.  

The Bedrock team is a group of natural language processing researchers and CPAs with a mission to support accountability through information transparency. 

Learn more: https://bedrock-ai.com
Join our newsletter https://bedrock.substack.com/
Our free site: ledge.bedrock-ai.com
one_liner: Find what matters - investment research at scale
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Greenwork
long_description: Greenwork helps government-funded training programs find jobs for the ten million people they train per year. Starting with this beachhead, we’re building LinkedIn for blue-collar workers to help companies make the most difficult hires in today’s labor market: skilled tradespeople.
one_liner: LinkedIn for Skilled Blue-Collar Workers
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Nomod
long_description: We're building a financial operating system for forward thinking businesses. We're starting with making it incredibly easy to sign up and start accepting card payments both in-person and online. Next up, we're working on holding money, spending money, making payments, and providing fast access to credit!
one_liner: Square minus the hardware

name: Genuity
long_description: Genuity is a one-stop-shop for companies to manage IT and buy business software. Companies use Genuity to keep track of all the company laptops, manage employee support requests, and buy software at wholesale prices.
one_liner: SaaS Platform to manage IT and buy business software

name: Genomelink
long_description:
Genomelink is a DNA App Store. If you got DNA tested from companies like 23andMe/Ancestry, you can transfer your DNA data to Genomelink and unlock hundreds of unique apps like:
🧬Global ancestry report that goes deeper than 23andMe.
🧬More varieties of body and mind traits analysis than that are available on Ancestry.

Team:
Tomo from M3, Inc. ($70B medical platform), Yuta from MyCode (#1 consumer genetic testing in Japan), Ken from Sony (tech & bio-info lead at a joint venture between Illumina and Sony), and Carlos Bustamante, P.I. from Stanford University. The investor and affiliates include Y Combinator (S21), Sompo (Top insurance CVC in Japan, led deals for Palantir and Noom), Sony, Berkeley SkyDeck, and StartX.
one_liner: DNA App Store

name: Telmai
long_description: Telmai is a data quality monitoring platform that helps data teams quickly detect and investigate data quality issues.
one_liner: Data quality profiling and monitoring

name: Infina
long_description:
We are the Robinhood of Vietnam, a retail investing app designed for younger investors.

Since launch in Jan, we have achieved rapid growth selling mutual funds and fixed income products.  We are launching stock trading in Q4 2021, and crypto in the second half of next year.

We’re the right team to build this company. I was previously with IDG Ventures, investing in Vietnam and South East Asia from 2008 to 2014.  Then I founded Lana, Reddit of Vietnam, which was acquired by LINE corporation in 2017.  

Just like Robinhood in the US, investing apps are seeing explosive growth in many markets around the world, and this wave is coming to Vietnam. There is a growing middle class who are hungry to invest in assets like stocks and crypto. We are building Infina to capture this huge opportunity to democratize investing in South East Asia.
one_liner: Robinhood of Vietnam (retail investing app)

name: Lumify
long_description: Everything a nurse needs in one app.
one_liner: The super app for nurses

name: Pillar
long_description:
Pillar's operating system powers Health Coaching as a service for Health & Wellness Companies. 

Our platform and provider network plug into a company’s platform, connecting their client base with a qualified health coach for recurring 1:1 video calls that make lifestyle and behavior change accessible. Pillar’s platform increases success rates, revenue and retention by enabling seamless virtual care from providers with training accredited by the National Board of Medical Examiners, all for less than hiring, managing and optimizing a best-in-class coaching experience in-house.
one_liner: Operating System for Health & Wellness Coaching

name: Tenyks
long_description:
Tenyks is a University of Cambridge spin-out inventing the way humanity interacts with AI to protect the world from the terminator, but also to ensure that AI is developed with passion, excitement, and joy! 

We are building an MLOps monitoring and validation platform that helps ML developers working with computer vision data to build more reliable software faster. Specifically, our platform helps ML developers understand what's wrong with their algorithms and fix issues.

The founders developed the technology during their PhD research in Explainable AI for Computer Vision and it is the result of 9 top tier publications and 1 patent application.
one_liner: Inventing the way humanity interacts with AI

name: Chari
long_description:
Chari is an e-commerce and fintech app for traditional retailers in French-Speaking Africa allowing them to order any consumer goods they sell and get delivered for free in less than 24 hours. 
Chari is also a financial services provider for these retailers, offering them microloans
.
one_liner: B2B e-commerce and fintech platform for traditional proximity stores

name: Noloco
long_description: Noloco is a no-code platform for teams to instantly create apps powered by their business data. Easily turn Airtable bases and spreadsheets into customer portals or internal tools without code.
one_liner: Instantly create apps around your business data. Without code.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Litnerd
long_description:
Litnerd is an online reading program that brings K-5 books to life by streaming live actors in the classroom. We blend the creator economy to traditional education, complete with ebooks and lesson plans. Litnerd will teach the 37 Million elementary school students in America how to read. 

Today schools spend approx. $20 Billion on reading and supplemental education programs. Yet 42% of their students still cannot read by 4th grade.

Litnerd is a contracted vendor with the largest education district in America, New York City Department of Education. Our program is currently implemented as designated classroom reading time across public schools. We have been growing aggressively at 60% MoM, used by over 14,000 paying students and hit $110K in ARR in less than 5 months.
one_liner: Teaching 37M students to read with live-stream actors

name: Dots
long_description: Dots is building a multichannel payouts API for marketplaces. Our API lets a marketplace pay their sellers in the ways they want to be paid, including Venmo, Paypal, ACH and Zelle. As more Americans earn a living by becoming a 1099 worker, marketplaces need to provide flexible payout options and we make supporting these payouts easy through a single API.
one_liner: Multi-channel payouts API for marketplaces.

name: Revery AI
long_description: Founded by 3 Computer Vision PhDs at UIUC, Revery AI creates a scalable method to visualize garments on people. The technology powers a virtual dressing room where shoppers can mix & match outfits and visualize them on any model instantly online (Live Demo: https://demo.revery.ai). In 6 months, we integrated with 4 fashion retailers, including the largest fashion retailer in SEA. Our product helps retailers achieve a 3.8x conversion rates and a 3x add-to-cart rates. Unlike any previous virtual try-on solution, we are fully automated, meaning we can work with millions of SKUs at negligible costs while our competitors struggle with thousands. Our vision is to digitize all fashion products and become the infrastructure of the digital fashion experience.
one_liner: Virtual dressing room at Scale

name: Slip
long_description:
Slip (YC S21) is a marketplace that makes it easy to build and sell interactive programming courses. Today, companies either let devs buy books or video based courses that don’t incorporate learning by doing. 


Slip's founder Kenneth Cassel started the company after he launched an interactive programming course on an obscure topic (learning vim) and made $11k in one month. Students began raving about the how the interactive exercises was a fun and effective way to learn the topic.


He realized that developers didn't really understand the value of the learned skills they've obtained, and that building an interactive programming course was too hard. Slip is now helping expert developers monetize their knowledge while leveling up career developers. 


In the first month since launching, course creators earned over $6500 on the platform, and over 1300 developers signed up to be authors. 


Slips investors include Y Combinator, John Andrew Entwistle (founder of Coder.com), and Josh Browder (founder of DoNotPay).
one_liner: Marketplace for expert devs to build and sell interactive courses

name: Mach9 Robotics
long_description: Mach9 builds software and integrated hardware for utility infrastructure inspection. Energy and gas utility companies use our platform to monitor infrastructure that costs hundreds of thousands of dollars per minute of downtime.
one_liner: The Operating System for Cities
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Examedi
long_description: Examedi is a healthcare-at-home marketplace in Latin America that sends nurses and lab technicians directly to patients’ homes for appointments. It’s like Uber, but for medical lab work.
one_liner: Uber for Healthcare in Latinamerica

name: Ancana
long_description:
With Ancana, you can own a 1/4 or 1/8 share of the home and split expenses with the other co-owners. If you buy a 1/4 share of a home, you have access to it for 3 months of the year. For each property we set up the investment trust, find qualified co-owners, and handle the entire real estate purchase transaction. Costs are split amongst the co-owners, and we take care of the furnishing and ongoing property management.

We accomplish this by creating an investment trust for each property and dividing it into individual, purchasable shares that represent ownership in the property. We furnish each home and find and vet the co-owners. Once all of the shares of the property are sold, we retain no ownership stake in the property and transition into the role of property manager, ensuring the home is well maintained and handling any issues that arise. Unlike a timeshare, Ancana owners own a real asset (the property) versus a block of time. If you decide you want to sell your share, you are free to do so at any time, either through us or on the open market, and capture any appreciation the property has accrued.
one_liner: Marketplace to buy managed vacation homes through fractional ownership

name: Onfolk
long_description:
We make it easy for small businesses to set up and run their payroll & HR (instead of a mess of spreadsheets, poorly integrated tools, and emails with accountants).

Our team are software engineers who spent 4 years scaling Monzo from 400k to 5.5m customers. While at Monzo we repeatedly got paid incorrectly by their crappy payroll providers. So we decided to build the product that they should have used from day 1.

We’ve gained certification as a payroll software from the UK government.
one_liner: Gusto for Europe
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: CostCertified
long_description: We are building the Amazon for construction where contractors can give their customers an interactive shopping experience, turning the estimate into a point-of-sale, for the first time.  It is a marketplace for general contractors, subcontractors, retailers and consumers, powered by a database of over 114,000 real items.
one_liner: Amazon for Construction

name: FloatPays
long_description:
Floatpays is an on-demand wage access platform that helps employees access, spend, save and manage their money.

The problem we are solving is that more than 75% of the 12 million employed South African’s run out of money before the end of the month, 52% of those end up borrowing money to survive. Informal lending is the only option for most borrowers, with interest rates anywhere between 30-50%. The story is the same in most African countries where payday/micro-lending has become the norm amongst lower-income earners.

Our app features include financial education, a budget planning tool, cash access, and voucher purchases all from wages earned but unpaid. We are currently working on a savings product to promote long-term financial resilience.
	
We launched our product in South Africa in July 2020 and plan to extend our reach into additional African countries in 2022 and beyond.
one_liner: On-demand wage access service built for the African market

name: HitPay
long_description:
HitPay is a no-code, full-stack payments and commerce platform for SMBs in South East Asia. We empower SMBs and individuals who have limited coding skills or resources, to start accepting online and in-person payments within 5 minutes on any sales channel.

HitPay merchants get access to a wide range of card, bank transfer, e-wallet, and BNPL payment methods embedded seamlessly into no-code commerce tools.
one_liner: No code payment processing for SMBs in South East Asia

name: TransAstra Corporation
long_description: TransAstra builds and flies space tugs that take customer satellites from where they are in orbit to where they need to go. Our tugs will mine asteroids and move heavy industry to outer space. Our proprietary Omnivore™ thruster is a breakthrough solar thermal rocket we are developing to dominate the orbital logistics market. Omnivore is less expensive and higher in performance than the best thrusters on the market today and can use nearly any fluid as propellant, greatly simplifying orbital logistics. Our founder, Dr. Joel Sercel, is a Caltech space propulsion technologist and plasma physicist, former NASA/JPL engineer, and former CTO of Momentus. We have signed MOUs with Blue Origin and several other aerospace companies and are signing new deals weekly. We have over a $100M in market traction based on LOIs, MOUs, and contracts for orbital logistics and supply. In Y Combinator S21, thus far TransAstra has accepted more than $4.5M in private investment and more than $4.5M of undiluted NASA funding.
one_liner: Orbital logistics: Unleashing space industry, from Earth to asteroids

name: Float
long_description: Float is Pipe for supply chain finance. We help fast-growing consumer brands unlock capital from their inventory. We pay their supplier invoices up front and enable them to pay for their inventory after they’ve sold it.
one_liner: Supply chain finance for consumer brands

name: The Breakaway
long_description:
The Breakaway is a motivational coaching app for fitness enthusiasts, starting with cyclists. Our subscribers sync data from platforms like Peloton, Zwift and Garmin and log in daily to get motivation, coaching, and personalized challenges.

Our mission is to help people improve.

This is a re-invention of coaching and improvement. In five years, when every physical activity has data attached to it, everyone will want a coach at their fingertips. This is not an individual trainer, not a 7 day a week training plan, but a smart, simple digital coach that knows them across data platforms and helps them achieve their goals day after day, week after week, year after year. We are starting with cycling but we will evolve this to all digital fitness activities over time.

The Breakaway is for anyone who is committed to improving their fitness, and in doing so, improving their life.

Our subscription app is live in the Apple App Store. Our core team was among the first Strava employees and we have built engaging products for athletes all over the world. We live for this stuff.
one_liner: A motivational coaching platform for fitness enthusiasts.

name: Matrubials
long_description: Matrubials is an anti-infectives company, focused on human milk peptides as therapeutics to address antimicrobial resistance and modern diseases. Currently the global rise in severe bacterial infections and the drying pipeline of effective treatments are burdensome for healthcare and economics. Sculpted by evolution, milk, first food for the newborn, provides an exemplary solution to address the nutritive and protective challenges an infant is faced with. The anti-pathogenic molecules from milk can be developed into therapeutics geared towards all-age diseases. Our first indication is bacterial vaginosis, a bacterial dysbiosis related inflammation that results in recurrent infections, disruption of homeostasis and long-term clinical complications in women of reproductive age, including but not limited to preterm births, fertility issues and increased rates of STDs. Our next inflection point is the evaluation of rapidly acting and selective candidate peptides in pre-clinical host impact and early safety studies, which can aid clinical and portfolio development towards topical applications.
one_liner: Developing milk-derived therapeutics for infectious diseases

name: Writesonic
long_description:
Writesonic is an AI-powered copywriting tool that generates unique and engaging marketing content for any business in seconds. With a few lines of text, Writesonic will generate ads, blog posts, landing pages, product descriptions, and more.

Writesonic has over 1600 reviews and a 4.8 star average on Trustpilot, G2, and Capterra, by far the highest in the category, and our user acquisition to date has been 100% organic - mostly through word of mouth and SEO.
one_liner: AI-powered copywriting and content marketing.

name: Akute Health
long_description:
Akute Health makes an electronic medical record (EMR) system used by digital health companies to track patients. Our EMR is a web app used daily by clinical teams at digital health companies similar to Ro, Hims, and One Medical.

In 2015, I was diagnosed with cancer and spent 9 months in the hospital. While in the hospital, I built an app to track my own records. I needed something that was simple to use and allowed me to easily track & trend different types of data.

I later turned that app into a full medical record system. We now have over 40 customers and 20k patient records. We've also grown revenue 4x this year and have continued net negative churn. One of our customers has raised over $100M and as they grow, we will grow with them.

We are building the de facto EMR for digital health companies.
one_liner: A medical record system for digital health companies.

name: outloud.ai
long_description: We record conversations that customers have when they are placing orders in drive-thru restaurants, automatically analyze them, and help operators to upsell better or alert them when they are out of stock.
one_liner: Building Gong.io for offline retail.

name: Sirka
long_description: Our program helps people prevent or manage chronic diseases by breaking bad eating habits with plans created by vetted, certified nutritionist / dietitians. Customers get an unlimited chat access to consult with our professionals, and personal recommendations to help adopt new habits into life.
one_liner: Noom for Southeast Asia

name: Mentum
long_description:
Mentum is an API that allows fintechs in LATAM to offer investment services to their end-users. We offer access to the US and local stock markets and simplify account opening, funding, management, and reporting of investment portfolios. Our platform reduces costs, accelerates time to market, and allows you to stay fully compliant with local regulations.

We are on a mission to improve financial inclusion in Latin America and facilitate access to wealth-creation services that are currently inaccessible to the majority of the population.
one_liner: Investment management API for fintechs in LATAM

name: Meticulous
long_description: Meticulous is a tool to catch bugs in web applications with zero-effort from developers. Insert a single line of JavaScript onto your site, and we record thousands of real user sessions. We then test your new code by replaying those user sessions to automatically find bugs for you before they hit production.
one_liner: Software to catch bugs in web apps with zero-effort from developers.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Warrant
long_description: We build APIs and infrastructure that helps developers implement authorization and access control in their apps in less than 20 lines of code. Warrant handles the complexity of managing authorization so engineering teams can focus on building their core products.
one_liner: APIs for authorization and access control.

name: Spark Studio
long_description:
Spark Studio brings quality extracurricular learning for children to the convenience of their homes. Courses are taught to children between 5 and 15 years of age in classrooms sized 1:6. Courses last between 10-15 weeks.

We’re building this with a full-stack approach (as opposed to a marketplace) in three categories - communication skills, music and visual arts. We design curriculum, train teachers, develop content and interactive technology for kids to play and practice. This makes our students love these classes, resulting in a completion rate of 98.5%!
one_liner: Online extracurricular courses for kids (5-15 yrs)

name: Adaptyv Biosystems
long_description: We’ve miniaturized protein synthesis & screening on a nanofluidic chip to make it 100'000 times cheaper than existing tech. In two years we'll have built the worlds largest protein design database and can use it to develop new therapeutics for previously untreatable diseases.
one_liner: High-throughput protein synthesis & screening

name: Endla
long_description:
Endla increases the value of oil & gas wells by providing software that helps design the well that maximizes ROI.

Our product AlphaSpace, optimizes the well design by automatically producing many high-quality options which the engineer can then measure against their business objectives (auto-design). Having software that finds the optimal solution, empowers the engineer to work a layer up on understanding the problem and specifying the important objectives.

Our vision is to make auto-design and auto-operation software part of the workflow for every engineer working with physical assets.
one_liner: Software that increases the value of oil & gas wells
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Levo
long_description: Levo is a high yield savings account for Mexico. We aggregate the savings accounts of our users and negotiate significantly better interest rates from other banks on their behalf. There are $65b in savings for which we charge 1.5%, making this a $1b opportunity only in Mexico. The company is founded by Salvador Rivero, former Equities VP Portfolio Manager for BBVA, for which he invested $1.5b USD in Mexico and Latam; and Max Merghentaler 3x founder and CTO of 2 ML companies. To date we have $300k USD AuM, growing at 28% w/w, 64% client retention and 2,516% net AuM retention, we have LOIs with 3 banks. Our main investors are Y Combinator, Magma Partners, Latitud and BackBone Ventures.
one_liner: Levo is a high yield savings account for Mexico

name: Marble
one_liner: A Virtual Property Manager for Long-Term Rentals
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: HeyCharge
long_description: EV charging infrastructure today is expensive, difficult to install, and doesn't integrate well with existing products, services, and businesses. HeyCharge solves all of these problems with ultra-low-cost, plug-and-play EV chargers that don't require internet connections and integrate with third-party products via our SDK and APIs. Our customers are energy utilities, property operators, mobility service providers, and more.
one_liner: Low-cost, high-scale EV charging platform for apartments (and more).

name: Heimdal
long_description: Heimdal produces calcium and magnesium carbonate extracted from the ocean to capture CO2 in a solid form which can be used in industries ranging from concrete to steel. The concrete industry alone accounts for 8% of global carbon emissions with the vast majority of this coming from the burning of limestone in kilns. This limestone is ordinarily mined and burned, releasing a natural store of CO2 into the atmosphere - it can be thought of much like burning fossil fuels. Heimdal's method instead produces synthetic limestone and dolomite from CO2 in the atmosphere and ions in the ocean to prevent new emissions.
one_liner: Concrete and glass made from CO2 from the atmosphere

name: Comadre
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
one_liner: Family bank for low income families in Brazil.

name: Evidently AI
long_description: We are building an open-source standard to monitor ML models in production. The tool is used by enterprise data science teams to operate their models reliably and detect and resolve issues.
one_liner: Open-source monitoring for machine learning models

name: Whaly
long_description:
Whaly helps business teams working at fast growing companies combine all their data sources and built consolidated metrics to improve their decision making process.

We do this by providing an ETL, Data Warehouse and a Visualisation layer, all in one.

We understood that most people were unable to execute their data projects because tools were too fragmented and made for engineers. We decided to make a bundled, no code platform for these.

Emilien, Florian and Pierre were the minds behind the Data advertising platforms of the major media and e-commerce companies in France in their earlier position as Product Manager and head of Customer Success, giving them an edge on how to execute successfully a data project.
one_liner: Whaly is building a no-code Looker

name: Payhippo
long_description:
Payhippo provides loans to small businesses in Africa in under 3 hours.

We made $42k in revenue in Nigeria in July 2021, growing 25% m/m with a 97% repayment rate.
one_liner: Loans to Nigeria's SMEs in under 3 hours

name: Portão 3
location: Uberlândia, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil
long_description:
Portão 3 is a corporate travel and expenses product for LATAM with over U$ 24k in revenue.

We are disrupting the 11,000+ corporate travel agents in LATAM that do not invest in technology. 

We generated over 1.2M in GTV in July, even during the COVID pandemic. We are also at breakeven now.

The company is founded by Fernando, second-time entrepreneur with past successful exit and ex-CPO of large IT consulting firms in Brazil and Bianca, experienced entrepreneurs in the travel and growth industry.
one_liner: Corporate travel and expenses product for LATAM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Zensors
long_description: Zensors will convert every camera in your building into an AI powered supersensor. The AI platform does this by connecting to your existing cameras and can watches a space to track multiple workflows around capacity management, staffing, cleaning, customer experience and business asset tracking. The AI learns activity patterns to streamline facilities management or business processes and provides real time anomaly alerts, forecasts and rich data analytics.
one_liner: Google Analytics for the physical world

name: Flowly
long_description:
Flowly’s mobile app is the VR version of Calm with a focus on reducing chronic pain for 100 million Americans. Flowly subscribers receive a $5 VR headset and Heart Rate sensor that collects a user's biometric data like HR and HRV, and converts it to visualizations in virtual experiences that reduce pain by 46%. 
Flowly is backed by the National Institutes of Health.
one_liner: Our mobile app reduces chronic pain for 100 million Americans.

name: Makani Science
long_description:
Makani Science is a medical device company based in Irvine, California. We have created the world's first wireless patch that can accurately and continuously monitor breathing. The company is co-founded by Dr. Michelle Khine and Dr. Michael Chu, two experts in the wearable monitoring space from the University of California, Irvine. 

The Makani Science system will collect unique breathing waveforms from patients in everyday environments to create the first large database of respiratory patterns associated with different diseases. Data will be collected through systems sold to our initial beachhead market, where we will help improve monitoring safety in patients being sedated for medical procedures. Our long-term goal is to combine machine learning with this database to identify and predict respiratory complications for different patient populations. 

We have a highly experienced team and will be FDA cleared in our beachhead market within a year.
one_liner: Reinventing respiration monitoring

name: Fizz
long_description: Fizz is a debit card for US college students that builds credit in an easy, safe, and transparent way, while helping them save money on campus. Carlo, Scott, and Moritz dropped out of Harvard and Cornell (CS, statistics and finance), to build Fizz into the financial service provider that their peers, and any young adult recognizes as an ally in tackling personal finance challenges - starting with building credit.
one_liner: Fizz is a debit card for college students that builds credit.

name: Hera
long_description:
Google Calendar is built on hypotheses that are now deprecated. Now that most of our meetings are virtual, there is a massive opportunity to remove frictions at each step of the lifecycle of these meetings, and finally make calendars actionable.

From Hera, users can:
- Schedule a meeting or share availabilities
- Prepare a meeting with the right context on attendees and past discussions
- Join a meeting in one-click
- Snooze a meeting to make sure you don't forget to follow-up

All of that without leaving the keyboard.
one_liner: Calendar app to prepare, join and follow-up on virtual meetings

name: Lernit
long_description: Lernit makes it easy for companies in Latam to develop their workforce, even when they are remote. We allow them to set and track goals, evaluate their performance, and train them with online courses.
one_liner: Lattice for Latam with personalized learning and development
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Astek Diagnostics
long_description: Astek Diagnostics is building a platform (Eugris) that guides physicians in prescribing appropriate antibiotics for patients with bacterial sepsis in one hour. It is done by detecting the oxygen consumption of the bacteria
one_liner: One-hour antibiotic sensitivity testing

name: Freterium
long_description:
Freterium is a collaborative SaaS platform that connects organizations, people and technologies in the logistics value chain to help them move things.

Our connected cloud platform provides real-time visibility of shipments, elastic logistics infrastructure (in-house & 3rd party fleets), proprietary routing algorithms, productivity tools, and seamless collaboration that breaks down traditional organizational silos.
one_liner: Real-Time Collaborative Transport Management Platfom
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Digistain
long_description: 50% of women with breast cancer suffer through expensive and potentially lethal chemotherapy they don't need. Digistain solves this problem by scanning biopsies in the infrared to measure the increase in cancerous DNA. We remove the guesswork from diagnosis
one_liner: We Save Patients From Avoidable Chemotherapy

name: Protex AI
long_description:
Tl;dr: We’re building software that monitors existing cameras in the port, logistics, and manufacturing industries to ensure compliance and identify safety issues.

At Protex AI, we’re on a mission to protect the industrial workforce! We’re building a proactive computer vision tool for workplace safety - empowering industrial Health and Safety (HS) teams to identify risk and danger before it becomes a problem.

🤕 The Problem:
Keeping people safe at work is extremely hard. In the U.S. alone, there were over 5,000 deaths in the workplace in 2019, mainly in the heavy industry space.

Serious workplace injuries cost U.S. businesses circa $62 Billion annually. Until now, safety has been reactive, someone has to get injured, and in some cases fatally before something is done about it.

✅ Problem Solved:
Protex AI’s platform uses privacy-preserving camera monitoring software to provide companies with an always-on guardian angel, protecting their workforce.

The platform plugs into existing CCTV infrastructure and enables HS teams to flexibly translate their document-based safety rules into the real world.

Protex AI takes these rules and autonomously audits the customer’s facility to identify areas of high risk and non-compliance.

HS teams can access this data via a reporting engine and use it in weekly safety meetings, external safety audits, insurance discussions, and legal claims.

The tool integrates seamlessly with existing safety workflows to augment data produced by any manual incident logging system in place.
one_liner: Computer vision that makes the industrial workplace, safer
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Inflow
long_description: Inflow is a self-help app for people to manage their ADHD. They provide support through psychoeducation, habit development, and community.
one_liner: A self-help app for people to manage their ADHD.

name: Vinco
long_description: Vinco helps companies in Latin America pay for blue-collar employees’ online education. We do this by connecting employees to accessible programs (like High School, College, and Language Courses) and in turn, improve employee retention by at least 2x.
one_liner: Retaining employees in LatAm via education
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Aleph
one_liner: One source of truth for financial data.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: KaiPod Learning
long_description:
KaiPod Learning works with middle- and high-school students who go to school online. We provide a physical place for these students to work on their classes, to interact with other students, and to get support from teachers.

Our founder was the CPO of Pearson Online Schools and knows that despite all the noise around online learning, millions of kids thought it was the best school they ever had! But they *needed* a place to go for in-person support. 

In our summer pilot, we tripled the rate of academic progress *and* received an NPS of 100. Now, we are getting ready to launch our first locations this fall.

After COVID, we will see at least 5 million students opt-in to online learning and we will license our platform and approach to anyone who supports these students.
one_liner: Making online learning more personal and more social

name: Kodda
long_description:
We make insurance as easy as ordering food delivery.

Instead of doing 10 hours of paperwork dealing with brokers and traditional insurance companies you simply go to our website, get covered in under 90 seconds, claim in minutes and get paid fast.
one_liner: Lemonade for LatAm

name: Aleph Solutions
long_description:
Aleph helps companies with thousands of products like General Motors and Bosch increase their revenue in Latin America by listing their inventory on large e-commerce sites like Mercado Libre and Amazon. Our customers sell over U$D 4M dollars’ worth of product every month using our software.

Many brands struggle with the shift to sell on marketplaces. They want resellers to be involved in their online sales strategies, but both still need to maintain 10,000 products, prices and inventory up-to-date across digital channels and Marketplaces do not provide tools to help brands and resellers on the journey.

Aleph is the best way for brands and wholesalers to replicate their offline network of resellers online. With Aleph, Brands create high-quality product catalogs to share with their resellers. Now, any seller can access their product catalogue and sell on marketplaces.
one_liner: Help global brands sell on online marketplaces

name: Zoios
long_description:
Zoios is like Google Analytics for HR. We are the first company to combine employee engagement surveys with personality tests and performance data. Our software helps companies hire the right people, get them more engaged and retain them for longer.

Zoios was founded in January and soft-launched with the first customer in February. Today, we’re live with 12 customers, have $24.000 ARR and are growing 69% MoM since we got into Y-Combinator in May.
one_liner: Reinventing Analytics for HR.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Kurios
long_description:
Kurios is cohort based online courses for professionals in Latin America. Our instructors are professionals coming out of tech companies like Google, Amazon, Stripe and more. 

Our course completion rate is 90% and annual customer retention rate is 100%.

We have 65 B2B customers and we up-skill their employees in product management, growth and data analytics, just to start with.

Some customers: Walmart Mexico, Banorte (2nd bank in Mexico), Mercado Libre, BCP (#1 bank in Peru), Alicorp (leading CPG in Latam), Sura (leading pension fund), etc.
one_liner: Cohort-based online courses for professionals in Latin America

name: Encuadrado
long_description: Encuadrado automates booking, payments, and invoicing for solo practitioners running appointment-based businesses in LATAM.
one_liner: Payments and scheduling for services professionals in LATAM

name: Clarity
long_description: Clarity makes it easy for remote teams to plan projects, track tasks, and stay organized. We do this by providing an all-in-one workspace that automates tedious project management work.
one_liner: The simplest all-in-one workspace for remote teams

name: Dots
long_description:
Dots helps companies interact with their customers through their Slack or Discord communities to increase revenue and retention. 

Email and help forums don’t work anymore. B2B companies are interacting with their customers in chat communities. Ultimately, customers want a real time connection to their Account Exec, customer success rep and other customers.  And companies need software to scale these interactions - that is what Dots provides through automation of manual tasks (DM'ing segments), and analyzing the activity of key accounts.
one_liner: Scale customer communities to drive revenue and retention

name: Shimmer
long_description:
Shimmer offers online mental health support groups that are led by peer coaches. Members pay a monthly subscription fee to join a small group of people with shared identity & experiences and improve their mental wellbeing together.

Our platform allows members to gratitude journal, mood track, set goals, and join weekly video sessions and community events focused on improving their mental well-being and promoting meaningful connections.
one_liner: Online mental health support groups led by coaches

name: Mixr
long_description: Mixr is a social platform for remote and hybrid teams; we host virtual game tournaments and an ongoing office competition.  Mixr tournaments have built-in audio/video chat, a library of fun games, ice breakers, and automatic breakout rooms - all built with the goal of being easy for managers and employees to use.  By participating in tournaments, players earn high scores and trophies which places them on the company-wide leaderboards.  Our goal is to bring companies together, boost employee engagement and help companies bolster a collaborative corporate culture.
one_liner: Team building through online game tournaments.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: OneSchema
long_description: OneSchema enables operations teams to import customer CSV data 10x faster. Our product is an intelligent data cleaning tool for CSV files. Operations teams use OneSchema when they need to repeatedly upload data to a system with a known schema (for example, setting up a new customer's data in a SaaS product or uploading a supplier inventory catalogs). OneSchema can instantly check for errors in a CSV file and suggests fixes. We save operations teams valuable time and save customers from the headache of data cleansing. OneSchema’s vision is to enable 1-click transformation of data between any two systems.
one_liner: 10x faster CSV data setup for customer onboarding

name: Arengu
long_description: Arengu allows developers to build frictionless signup flows in minutes. Large companies like Airbnb, Uber or Revolut, dedicate a full engineering team to build and optimize their signup flows. Most companies cannot dedicate these resources, and Arengu helps them deliver an optimized signup flow that boosts conversion rates by 20-30%.
one_liner: Build frictionless signup flows in minutes

name: Invezo
long_description: Invezo is an analysis tool for stocks and cryptocurrencies. We’re the only app that integrates social media data with classic market data for the new generation of investors. As market accessibility has grown, a new class of young retail investors has emerged. Young investors understand the market in a totally different way; they don’t care as much about traditional financial data and they make investment decisions based on what's trending or going viral. Invezo is the only app built for this new generation of investors.
one_liner: Simple investing research for retail traders

name: Genei
long_description:
Genei automatically summarises background reading to make it faster for content writers to produce blogs, articles and reports. We're growing at 10% per month and have hit $9k of MRR. 

Ultimately, our team of prize-winning Oxford scientists are building the future of how we read, write and research.
one_liner: Cliffs notes for content writers

name: Snowboard Software
long_description:
We are helping analytics teams to find, understand and trust data. 

Our laser-focus on Snowflake enables us to extract metadata and usage data that is not available to existing data catalog solutions. This additional information is critical to power a relevant search and provide valuable context for each table or column. Our users also don't need to think about a second user management and RBAC. We mirror what already exists in Snowflake.
one_liner: The fast and automated data catalog for the Snowflake data cloud.

name: ShipBlu
long_description:
ShipBlu provides Amazon level logistics for eCommerce companies in MENA - one of the fastest growing eCommerce markets in the world. As it stands, the majority of delivery providers are still using pen and paper to manage delivery and fulfillment operations, leading to 5x the rate of failed deliveries and 3x the operating costs as compared to global benchmarks.

At ShipBlu, we've built an infrastructure that handles every aspect of delivery and fulfillment operations. We've also added some unique features that tie in various business functions, allowing us to realize significant efficiencies compared to other players. Our platform is managed by ShipBlu AutoPilot - our collection of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithms that constantly make operational predictions and decisions to reduce costs, meet delivery constraints, and refine our operating assumptions. Designed by ShipBlu's CTO, Abdelrahman is currently completing his PhD at Brown University where he explores the applications of AI and ML in optimization problems.

We built a nationwide delivery network in Egypt in about 2.5 months, kicking off operations on Aug 1st, 2021. In under 4 weeks, we have signed on over 40 merchants, and when those merchants fully go live in October, we will be making over $40k in MRR.
one_liner: Amazon Level Logistics for eCommerce Companies in MENA.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Whalesync
long_description: Whalesync lets businesses automatically sync their data across no-code tools like Airtable and Webflow. This makes it easy to manage things like customer data, marketing campaigns, and blog content spread across their SaaS applications without needing to hire software engineers and build a data pipeline.
one_liner: The simplest no-code data pipeline

name: Milky Way AI
long_description:
We help CPG brands to understand how their products are being displayed, priced and what are their competitors are doing across millions of physical stores in real time with our computer vision powered mobile app. 

Each year these brands spend $500 bn annually buying prime retail shelf space to influence customer purchasing decisions, but they have no easy way to audit it. 

Our mobile app reduces the time of these audits by 10x and cost by 3x.
one_liner: Mobile app for CPG brands to connect to millions of stores globally

name: Malloc
long_description: Malloc is a mobile app that monitors and prevents any app from recording you or transmitting your data without you knowing. We sell our app to individuals, enterprises and governments who care about their privacy.
one_liner: A mobile app that protects your phone from spyware.

name: Sequin
long_description:
Sequin (Y Combinator) is the first debit card that builds credit for women. The Sequin Card launched only 3 weeks ago and already has 1500+ cards pre-qualified, 100+ live with $20,000 in deposits, $8k in TPV, and no paid marketing (referrals). 

Vrinda Gupta, the founder and CEO, launched the Chase Sapphire Reserve at Visa, where she was rejected from the credit card she built! She learned that 70% of women today were also getting rejected from these credit cards like her. She teamed up with ex-PayPal engineering leader, Mark Thomas, co-founder and CTO, to transform her debit card to build credit by first spotting purchases and reporting repayments to credit bureaus (Experian reporting live). 

Sequin is backed by high-profile investors such as the Schwab Family, Y Combinator, and IDEO Ventures and is an official Visa partner. The team plans to expand its offerings into a $65B largely untapped market for women's credit products with smarter underwriting and targeted rewards.
one_liner: Sequin is a debit card for women to build credit.

name: FastFarma
long_description: FastFarma is the digital pharmacy for latam, that offers best price guaranteed and 30 minute delivery with a full service offering.
one_liner: Digital pharmacy for Latam, that saves you money and time.

name: Numary
long_description: Numary is an open-source financial ledger. With its integrated language Numscript, developers can building complex money flows while saving engineering time & reducing risk.
one_liner: Open-source financial ledger for e-commerce and fintech companies

name: Mergent
long_description: Mergent is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy backend apps. Unlike other providers that require applications to be rewritten as functions, Mergent enables developers to ship entire applications as serverless applications.
one_liner: A developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy backend apps
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Coinrule
long_description:
Coinrule Catches the Next Market Opportunity on Your Behalf by Automating Your Investments.

Coinrule's previous Crowdfunding Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nnYJ4PnSvnU
one_liner: Coinrule Automates Your Crypto Investments

name: Infiuss Health
long_description:
Infiuss health connects US and EU-based pharma, life science companies and  researchers to participants for clinical trials and research in Africa.
1.4 Billion Africans (the most diverse population on earth) are excluded from clinical research studies today because it takes on average 9-12 months to recruit participants and engage with them to take part in these studies. Leading to researchers missing out on huge data that could be generated from studying this population and also exposing us to drugs and vaccines tested on non-African participants. 
We are building a decentralized platform to power remote research/clinical trials in Africa, by connecting researchers (in industry and academia) directly to patients, participants for their clinical research studies in under 5days.
Our all-in-one software helps researchers remotely recruit participants, collect remote consent, collect analyze data and provide virtual support. 20X faster and cheaper than third-party contract research organizations.
one_liner: SAAS Platform for running  Clinical research and trials in Africa

name: Lemonade Finance
long_description: Lemonade is a digital bank for the African diaspora. There are over 20 million African immigrants in North America and Europe with many running businesses back home and we provide multi-currency accounts to help manage their unique banking needs.
one_liner: Digital bank for the African Diaspora

name: Momo Medical
long_description:
We go to nursing homes, and we put an internet-connected bed sensor underneath all their beds. Our app gives nurses valuable insights and an overview of all their residents. We reduce fall incidents and bedsores while improving evening and night shift productivity by over 30%. 

Momo Medical solves the biggest problem affecting nursing homes, staff shortages while increasing the quality of care. 

The last months, we signed 250,000$ in contracts and are signing contracts in a matter of weeks instead of the industry average of 12+months. This year, we have grown more than 25% MoM and monitor more than 1000 residents in 20 organizations. We have 0% churn, and nurses love what we have built.
one_liner: We help nurses in nursing homes to be 30% more effective

name: Comet Health
one_liner: Digital platform for pelvic floor physical therapy

name: DiveHealth
long_description:
We figure out which treatment migraine patients should be on using DNA and symptoms and deliver to their door.

Using our approach, patients have an 80% higher treatment satisfaction rate, have one extra day per week to enjoy their life and get 55% pain reduction.

We are a DTC business with a one-time fee (DNA test) + subscription component (meds and app).
one_liner: First personalized migraine clinic using genetics and clinical data.

name: Yemaachi Biotechnology
long_description:
Yemaachi Biotech is diversifying and expanding access to precision cancer diagnostics and therapeutics by collecting  and sequencing samples from all across Africa, which is the most genetically diverse population on the planet. We then use this data to either optimize existing diagnostic tests, or help other companies discover new ones.
With our research activities based in Africa, we are able to leverage access to the most genetically diverse population on the planet to build a first-of-its-kind clinical and molecular knowledgebase on cancer among African people.
one_liner: Diversifying precision cancer diagnostics and treatments

name: Scispot
long_description:
Scispot is a fully configurable workflow automation platform for fast-growing life science companies.  Our customers use Scispot to design and automate their workflows at all stages of their R&D, from planning, lab execution to reporting collaboratively.

Scispot creates a connected digital replica of an entire life science company -- it centralizes company-wide data, templatizes routine research, and automates non-scientific tasks. The primary issue facing any growing life science company is disconnected data. Connecting this disparate data requires a lot of custom engineering resources and developing code. But with Scispot, these companies can easily connect research, operations, and inventory data without writing a single line of code. 

Within 4 months of the official launch, Scispot has become a digital partner of a wide range of life science companies that focus on lab-grown meat, biomanufacturing, biotherapeutics R&D, mass spectrometry research, preclinical contract research, and microbiome research.
one_liner: Life science operating platform

name: Gemfy
long_description: We create an affordable way for gamers to start playing crypto games and a secure way for investors to earn yield through NFTs.
one_liner: Enabling gamers to play crypto games

name: Cartpanda
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description:
Cartpanda is a digital commerce platform. 
We offer a complete ecosystem - from storefront, to checkout and payments.

Create a beautiful and high-converting online store in less than a day using our theme builder. For savvy merchants, we still allow you to completely edit your theme code, which is in Liquid.

Using Cartpanda, you can finally own your checkout! Use our no-code editor to personalize how your checkout page should look like. Then increase revenue by leveraging our 1-Click-Upsell and Order Bump apps.

Take advantage of our multiple sales channels and choose how you want to sell it. You can use our storefront and checkout… or integrate on top of other platforms such as WooCommerce and Shopify, everything is synchronized.

We are leveling the playing field so anyone can compete with the "big guys".
one_liner: Shopify for Brazil. A complete ecosystem for online businesses.

name: Intellect
long_description:
Intellect is a modern-day mental health company on a mission to make mental healthcare & wellbeing support accessible for everyone in Asia.

Today, Intellect is the largest and fastest growing mental health tech company in Asia, serving over 2.5 million members and leading organisations globally through our mental health platform. Intellect was also selected as one of Google’s Best Apps of 2020.

Intellect is backed by leading investors including Insignia Ventures Partners, Y Combinator, and an extensive list of family offices, big tech executives & renowned angel investors.
one_liner: A modern-day mental health company for Asia.

name: Hypercontext
long_description:
Hypercontext helps managers run more effective meetings that tie back to their OKRs and is trusted by over 100k managers in companies like Netflix, Linkedin, and Facebook. 

Managers use our app to run their 1:1s, team meetings, and OKRs in one workflow that increases the odds of their team hitting their goals by 95%.
one_liner: Meeting agendas, notes, & goals that tie back to your OKRs

name: Arrow
long_description: Arrow is the fastest way to checkout in South-East Asia. Arrow works across all platforms, empowering anyone to collect payments, in one-click.
one_liner: One-Click Checkouts for Southeast Asia

name: Cloudthread
long_description: Cloudthread is an analytics platform that helps engineering teams build cost efficiently in the cloud. We were behind Lyft's internal cloud cost management system and now we use that deep expertise to help organizations save hours of engineering time, reduce cloud bills, and prevent costly re-architectures.
one_liner: Cloud cost efficiency. Engineering first.

name: MazumaGo
long_description: MazumaGo is the first digital bank for construction companies. We simplify payments, credit cards, and bank accounts in an easy-to-use dashboard.
one_liner: BANKING FOR CONSTRUCTION

name: MindFi
long_description: MindFi is an app that reduces burnout and improves mental health for employees. We sell to companies in Asia such as Deutsche Bank, KPMG, PatSnap, Visa. Our annual revenue is US $150k to date and we’re growing 53% month on month. The team is headquartered in Singapore and consists of Bjorn, (ex-Zendesk product manager), psychologist Anita Sadasivan (UMich alum, ex-Raffles Hospital), Leon 2X startup founder with 2 exits and Gangeshwar, an award-winning AI engineer.
one_liner: Transforming Mental Health for Corporate Asia
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Monto
long_description: Monto is like the Shopify App store for the Webflow Ecommerce. We're building the must have tools to turn your Webflow Ecom site into a true Ecommerce Business.
one_liner: Shopify App Store for Webflow Ecommerce

name: Argonaut
long_description:
Argonaut automates provisioning infrastructure and service deployments within minutes, by generating kubernetes and terraform configurations.

Deep integrations with Git and observability stacks enable end to end pipelines, freeing up your engineering teams from operational work.
