one_liner: Automate DevOps on your cloud

name: Apollo
long_description: Apollo is a debit card that rewards you with stock. Every swipe earns guaranteed fractional shares plus a chance to win big with a full share of your favorite stocks.
one_liner: The card that rewards you with stock

name: mello
long_description:
mello is the new standard that companies use to measure, track and action on burnout to inspire happier, healthier, more motivated teams. 🚀

Our vision is to bring wellbeing to every teams' workflow.
one_liner: The new standard to reduce employee burnout.

name: Matidor.com
long_description:
Matidor is a project management software for projects where you need to see what's happening live on a map. Since our launch 9 months ago, we have done $80k ARR and started 5 enterprise pilots that will represent another 500k ARR within the next 6 months. Natural resources companies such as Petronas and GHD manage their environmental activities across thousands of locations. Instead of switching between spreadsheets, they need to visualize their projects on a map and zoom into each one of them for details such as site drawings, tasks, costs and communications.
https://matidor.com
one_liner: Project management on a live map

name: inai
long_description:
inai provides a single integration for global payments to help companies take digital payments across the globe.  

Its a single integration for a merchant that will provide connections to all payment gateways ( Stripe/ Adyen/ Braintree), wallets ( Paypal, Apple Pay, Google Pay) , BNPL providers ( Klarna / affirm / afterpay), fraud ( Sift , riskified etc). 

Merchants will have a no-code dashboard to customize the checkout by region ( Show Apple pay and stripe in US along with USD pricing but show Klarna, Google Pay and Sofort in Germany with pricing in Eur for e.g)

Merchants can also easily switch between providers and your data stays with you on Inai rather than with PSP like stripe making switch to Adyen or Braintree easy.
one_liner: Segment for global payments

name: Hotswap
long_description: We use automation to cleanly migrate data, which removes the friction of customer acquisition.
one_liner: We help companies onboard customers from competitors.

name: Cero
long_description:
At Cero, we solve specific coordination tasks between hospitals and patients, such as appointment confirmations and last minute cancellations, by automatically communicating with patients over WhatsApp. For example, a patient can confirm and reschedule their appointment without needing to call anyone.

Almost half of the medical appointments in Latin America are missed because patients simply do not show up. This ranges from missing a regular dentist check to missing an expensive MRI scan. With increasing pressure to improve access to care in developing countries, optimizing communication and coordination with patients is a key task to achieve. This is a massive problem especially in places where most people don't know how to effectively use self-service mediums (or are too busy to use them).
 
We bootstrapped the company and we are profitable. We currently have $97K in monthly revenue from 15 clients with a CMRG of 20% in the last year. We have 100% logo retention and we grow with our clients. We are currently coordinating over 600,000 medical appointments every month, just in Chile.

This problem represents a $3.5B market opportunity in Latin America only. Latin America has 650M people, each one having an average of 3 medical consultations per year. We charge for every time we effectively communicate with a patient. We plan to handle several coordination interactions with every patient for each consultation, which considers a roadmap of scheduling, confirming, booking, reimbursements, payments, among others.

We are a team mixing strong knowledge about the healthcare industry with deep technical skills. Felipe (CEO) is a former dentist that has led deep changes in healthcare payments in Chile. Mauricio (CTO) and Jorge (R&D), both PhD in Computer Science, led the creation of the most advanced Spanish Language Neural Network used daily by scientists and practitioners in LatAm (BETO: Spanish BERT).

In a weekend project, Mauricio and Jorge automated the communication with students attending a summer school obtaining impressive engagement. Felipe was struggling with contacting his patients to coordinate appointments, and saw a big opportunity in this technology. The three together have designed and run a solution that is currently coordinating over 600,000 patients per month in our home country, Chile.
one_liner: Automated communication between hospitals and patients in Latam

name: MayaEats
long_description:
MayaEats is doing to the restaurant industry what AirBnB and Uber did to homes and taxis, building the world's largest restaurant chain without owning the kitchens and its operations (Hyper Scalable Model). 

It is very common to find a lot of restaurants with underutilized kitchen capacity, meaning they are currently serving 50 meals a day whereas their capacity is able to accommodate 200 meals a day. Some of the estimate suggests there could be a million underutilized kitchens in the US alone and a-lot more globally. Also we noticed most of the mom & pop stores lack branding and marketing skills which makes it difficult for them to compete against larger chains.

MayaEats creates highly profitable and highly scalable delivery only brands based on data. Then, we partner with qualifying brick-n-motor / cloud restaurants who have under utilized kitchens nationwide who fulfill orders which are delivered via third-party delivery services including Doordash, UberEats, Grubhub and many others. MayaEats provides menus & recipes with full training and handles all promotions. Restaurant owners have to do only one thing well, prepare delicious food for the customers.

So far launched 60+ digital stores, processed around 53,000 orders, made around $1.85 Million in GMV and $375,000 in revenue.

MayaEats' bigger vision is to launch over 500,000 digital restaurants in the next few years.
one_liner: The World's Largest Virtual Restaurant Chain.

name: fluke
location: São Carlos, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description:
Brazilians hate the experience of using the traditional mobile carriers. They force you to pay for data packages you don’t need and make it impossible to switch your plans. Fluke offers a better customer experience and that’s why we have a CAC that is 50% lower and an LTV that’s 30% higher than traditional carriers.

What’s smart about our approach is we rent infrastructure from these incumbents and build a better customer experience on top of it. This keeps our costs lows and lets us focus on what really matters: the customer experience! 

We have the best network and customers are switching to us because of the service and flexibility to build their own customized mobile plans.

We are doing in telco what Nubank did in banking in Brazil.

We are Fluke, thank you!
one_liner: fluke is a full-digital mobile operator in Brazil

name: DigiBuild Software
long_description:
Our tools help large companies, like VCC Construction, improve the schedule and budget on projects and save over a million dollars annually.

DigiBuild is the only blockchain-enabled construction project management platform. Our customers manage workflows such as procurement, budgets, schedules, contracts, and payments.

DigiBuild allows for collaboration across 50+ disparate construction stakeholders–all on a single platform.
one_liner: We build construction software powered by blockchain.

name: SigmaOS
long_description:
SigmaOS is a new type of browser designed for founders, researchers, and content creators to make you better and faster at working on the web.

You work 7+ hours a day on the web. Buried in a sea of 100+ tabs and 10+ web-apps 🤯, you constantly lose context for why you did what you did, and are always one click away from being distracted.

We took apart the browser for you, and rebuilt a new experience from the ground-up, for the FASTEST and most PRODUCTIVE work. ⚡
one_liner: The first web browser made for work!

name: Palenca
long_description:
Palenca is Payroll API for LatAm. We make it possible for any worker to share their employment records and for businesses to uses those records. Like Plaid, but for Payroll.

Unicorns like Kavak and Lalamove use us to run background checks and provide financial services.
one_liner: Payroll API for LatAm

name: Cloudanix
long_description: We help DevOps teams to improve the security of their Cloud infrastructure. Our solution value increases for companies using multi-cloud (like GCP, Azure, AWS) or have multi-accounts (like Dev, Test, Prod)
one_liner: One Security Platform For Cloud Infrastructure

name: TrackChain
long_description:
Truck freight marketplace for local and cross-border shipments with last-generation tech, data, and financial services.

TrackChain reinventing old-fashioned logistics processes by digitizing and automating freight procurement & shipments management, users can log in to the platform to get instant rates & booking, for spot market and contract freight, which is smartly matched with the reliable Carriers network on TrackChain. They can use financial services to optimized payments, route planning with live shipment tracking using GPS/ELD information, digital documents, and performance analytics, an local & cross-border logistics solution in one place.

We are taking logistics in a new direction by building the most efficient, secure, and low-carbon digital freight network in Latam.
one_liner: Reinventing Truck Freight Brokerage in Latam
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Enso
long_description:
Enso is a no-code interactive ELT and data-driven process automation tool. It lets you load, blend, analyze your data, and then automate the whole process, simply by connecting visual components together. 

DEMO: https://youtu.be/fQvWMoOjmQk
one_liner: The most interactive ELT / data processing tool you have ever used.

name: Monet
long_description: Monet provides Instant Salary Advances to employees in Latin America. We are a mobile app available to any employee with a recurring income and a bank account.
one_liner: Instant Salary Advances in Latin America

name: testRigor
long_description: testRigor is an executable specifications engine to help companies to empower their manual QA to be able to build automation 15X than QA engineers and spend 200X less time maintaining the code.
one_liner: Executable specifications in English for test automation
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Ivella
long_description: Ivella is building the future of banking for couples, starting with a new way for early-stage couples to split expenses.
one_liner: Building the future of banking for couples.

name: Glitzi
long_description: Glitzi provides at-home spa, beauty and grooming services for people in Latin America. We do this by connecting you to our network of high quality masseuses, manicurists and barbers.
one_liner: At-home spa, beauty & grooming services marketplace for LatAm

name: QOA
long_description:
Imagine a world without chocolate. Horrifying, right? But the supply of cocoa is endangered and chocolate is as bad as meat for our planet. 

We make future-proof chocolate using precision fermentation. Doing this, our chocolate is 10x more sustainable and 20% cheaper than conventional chocolate. In order to mimic the organoleptic properties of chocolate (tender, smoothly melting taste release) we are working on the flavor itself but also on replacing the cocoa butter. 

55 Mio lbs of chocolate are consumed every day. By 2035 we will substitute a big chunk of it through our sustainable chocolate.
one_liner: We do for chocolate what Oatly did for milk.

name: Warpfy
long_description: Warpfy acquires e-commerce stores in promising categories, and scales these multi-channel systematically into global D2C brands. We do this by taking a big data approach to launching new products , apply our expertise in ecommerce, use our technology platform to grow them multi-channel, and optimize supply chain for speed to market, and turn these into superbrands that sell products across global marketplaces like Amazon, Shopify, Shopee, and more.
one_liner: We acquire and scale global D2C brands (Thrasio + SheIn)

name: Enerjazz
long_description:
Enerjazz is building a battery swapping network (like gasoline stations) for 2M+ commercial electric vehicles in India. We make batteries affordable for EV owners and enable them to earn 80% more. 

Every rickshaw in India will be electric (8M) because of the government not renewing licenses for gas-powered rickshaws. The charging infrastructure does not exist at home for rickshaw owners. The only way for a professional electric rickshaw driver to be profitable is to swap batteries - overnight charging is not sufficient.
one_liner: Making electric vehicle batteries affordable

name: Covie
long_description:
Interacting with insurance across a variety of carriers should be undifferentiated heavy lifting - a piece of infrastructure like Stripe, Twilio, or AWS that "just works"in the background while your business focuses on what makes it different. We provide programmatic building blocks to make this a reality, putting a carrier-neutral API and tooling on top of insurance, starting with policy access (think Plaid, but for your insurance company) and monitoring.

Our technology has a variety of use cases that range from insurance verification and tracking, financial advising, compliance & risk management, and marketing/distribution of insurance products.
one_liner: Programmatic building blocks for transacting with insurance

name: Muse
long_description: Muse allows anyone to transform their static website into a virtual world. We do this through our no-code editor, which is similar to Squarespace. Our websites are quickly replacing traditional personal websites commonly built using Squarespace or Wix.
one_liner: Squarespace for 3D websites

name: Perfekto
long_description:
Perfekto offers imperfect produce delivered from farm to table, essentially building Imperfect Foods for Latam.

Anahí previously led the Uber Grocery launch in Latam, while Jan was ex-Head of Latam for a leading Swiss fintech. Seven months after launching in Mexico City, Perfekto already has $7.7K of monthly net revenue from 287 active subscribers and just grew 170% MoM in weekly orders.

It turns out Latam is an even better market for this model than the U.S. In Latam 50% of produce is wasted along the supply chain and the “Supply Centers” unique to Latam's major cities make it easy to source from many local farmers at once vs. one at a time.

In Mexico, the produce market alone represents a $3.7B opportunity, which serves as the beachhead to create Latam’s #1 brand for sustainable food and attack its $909B Grocery Market.
one_liner: Imperfect produce delivered from farm to table in LatAm

name: Okani
long_description:
Okani is a low-cost health membership for the 50M Mexicans that spend 25B on healthcare out of pocket. 

We become patients' first point of contact with the healthcare system by providing digital primary care through chat and an app, then orchestrate the delivery of secondary healthcare with physicians, labs, pharmacies and clinics. 

We're founded by a team of 3 engineers and a doctor with a masters in clinical care. Pepe previously sold a startup to Cabify and ran engineering with Romario for Nubank's first international market.
one_liner: Primary healthcare app for Latam.

name: Pluggy
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description:
Pluggy is a B2B Fintech that allows any developer to connect to the data from their users' bank and broker accounts, essentially Plaid for Brazil. 

We are 100% focused in Brazil. One of the largest markets in the world. Its complexity, risks and challenges require its own solution.

Local focus and our deep experience in banking tech engineering allowed Pluggy to create a product that is considered by our customers as the only one to provide reliable data at the right time to market.

We currently cover 90% of the bank accounts in Brazil a market of more than 7 billion USD. 

We are Pluggy!
one_liner: Plaid for Brazil: we allow developers to access users' financial data
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Govly
long_description:
### 🏛Govly makes it easier to sell to the government ###

#### We...

#### 🗄Centralize government opportunities
Govly starts out with sam.gov opportunities then allows you to ingest any other contract feed.

You can create targeted searches to find what you're looking and get notified immediately when a new opportunity matches any of your saved searches.

#### 🤝Facilitate internal and external collaboration
You can easily track what you're working on and see what your team is working on.

You can also partner with other organizations in the Govly network to securely share data back and forth and collaborate on bids.

#### 🤖Automate repetitive tasks 
You can automate repetitive task related to specific contracting workflows saving users an average of 10 hours per week.

#### 📊Provide market analytics
You can use our advanced searching alongside our analytics dashboard to identify trends and new business opportunities.
one_liner: We make selling to the government easy.

name: Pideaky
long_description:
We are Square for Latin America and target 10M neighborhood corner stores.
We increase their income by 30% by helping them accept card payments, process bills, and sell internet access to the 150 customers who walk into their stores every day.
one_liner: Square for Latin America

name: Breadcrumbs.io
long_description: Breadcrumbs analyzes customer and prospect data to identify hidden revenue opportunities. It does this through a no-code scoring engine that can be set up in minutes rather than months. Because of Breadcrumbs sales teams can now focus on the right opportunity at the right time.
one_liner: No-code scoring engine identifying your most engaged upsell opps

name: Monto
long_description: Through our platform employees of our affiliated companies can access their earned wages on-demand for a low fixed fee.
one_liner: Salary on-demand platform for Latin America

name: Bree
long_description: Bree is building a challenger bank for the 11 million Canadians living paycheck to paycheck, starting with interest-free cash advances. We make money through tips and an optional, same-day express fee. By solving our customers' most urgent problem—illiquidity between paychecks —our cash advance business is a cheap, but profitable and repeatable hook that builds distribution for a broader challenger bank. This represents a $9 billion revenue opportunity in Canada.
one_liner: Chime for Canada, starting with cash advances

name: Repool
long_description: Repool is a platform that makes it easy to quickly create and join hedge funds for talented retail investors, like Angellist for hedge funds.  In just weeks, talented investors with no prior FINRA licensing can have their own turnkey fund.
one_liner: Making hedge funds easy to create and join. For everyone.

name: Laudable
long_description: Instead of sending a PDF case study nobody will read, with Laudable, B2B marketing teams can identify happy customers at their moment of delight, capture authentic customer testimonial videos, and quickly find and share the most relevant moments in every sales email, marketing campaign, website page, board presentation, and more.
one_liner: Platform to find and leverage happy customers

name: Sprout
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description:
We're on a mission to make investing in the US markets accessible and fair to everyone in Latin America.  Our social features make it seamless for investors to mingle, share investment ideas and learn from each other.   We make it super easy to invest in thousands of US stocks & ETFs, with as little as a $1 USD, no account minimums, and no fees.  

Our team is composed of highly experienced builders hailing from Goldman Sachs, E*Trade Financial, Nubank, ING, Wise...
one_liner: Latin Americas' first investing social network.  Learn. Share. Invest.

name: SenpAI.GG
long_description: SenpAI.gg is a gaming coach for the 1.4 billion PC gamers globally. SenpAI.gg’s desktop application makes personalized recommendations in the game and provides post-game feedback to help gamers improve faster. It is the most comprehensive assistant that supports gamers before and during the game via Voice Assistant, or an overlay that uses computer vision. The company is Boston-based and founded by Olcay Yilmazcoban (MIT researcher & gamer) and Berk Ozer (engineer & gamer). We raised $3M seed funding (ACT Venture Partners) and we are in the Summer 2021 Batch of Y Combinator. https://senpai.gg/
one_liner: Personal gaming coach for PC gamers globally

name: Onebrief
long_description:
Virtually everything in the military requires a plan—from everyday operations to war-time missions. With a rigorous process, many stakeholders, and rudimentary software (PowerPoint!!), planning is very slow. 

Onebrief is a collaborative software designed to make military planning fast. It turns every input into reusable building blocks and automatically keeps all planning artifacts in sync.
one_liner: Onebrief makes military headquarters run seamlessly

name: Iona Mind
long_description:
Iona Mind is building the first FDA approved digital treatment for anxiety and depression.

Our products are based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), one of the most effective evidence-based forms of treatment, which is delivered in a fully automated way using a conversational interface. Unlike other wellbeing apps, our exercises and programs are evidence-based, with over 300 peer reviewed journal papers showing the efficacy of CBT in the treatment of many common mental health conditions. 
 
Our mental wellness app is currently available through the App and Play stores and helps thousands of people all over the world. We also support employers in providing evidence-based mental health support to all their staff. 
 
Our founding team includes Professor Paul Farrand, one of the world's leading experts in Low-Intensity Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and one of the architects of the modern mental health system in the UK and Philip Howson who was CTO of XTX Markets - one of the world’s largest algorithmic trading firms.
one_liner: Software-based mental health treatments

name: Keyri
long_description:
We make an SDK for mobile apps that enables passwordless sign up/login with a tap on mobile and WhatsApp-like login with QR on desktop for any app. It eliminates account takeover fraud by leveraging smartphone biometrics and can be used as a primary login method or as a second verification layer in high risk scenarios.

Keyri's device-based identity architecture also eliminates account sharing, multiple account creation, programmatic account creation, and account selling.
one_liner: Easy, secure passwordless authentication. Sign in with QR or a tap.

name: Metlo
long_description: Metlo is the single tool for companies to handle all business metrics in a standardized way. We integrate with all the major data warehouses and downstream tools so you can create metrics once in Metlo and consume them in the tools of your choice, using the interface of your choice -- SQL, our REST API, or our Python SDK.
one_liner: Single source of truth for all business metrics

name: Jovian
long_description:
Jovian is the online Stanford for data science and machine learning. We run a 6-month part-time data science program where we train professionals with a background in programming, statistics, or analytics to become data scientists. Students learn practical skills, build real-world portfolio projects, and undergo 4 weeks of job readiness training. Our tutors offer 24x7 guidance & mentorship over Slack & Zoom.

Here’s what students spend 600+ hours learning & practicing:

1. Python Programming (Jupyter, Functions, Classes, Web Scraping, Git ...)
2. Statistics for Data Science (Probability, Statistics, Hypothesis Testing ...)
3. Data Analysis with Python (Numpy, Pandas, Data Cleaning & Wrangling ...)
4. Data Visualization with Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Folium ...)
5. Machine Learning with Python (Regression, Random Forests, GBMs ...)
6. Product Analytics and Tools (SQL, Excel, Tableau, Google Analytics ...)

Students solve 10 coding assignments and build 3 real-world projects:
1. Web Scraping with Python
2. Exploratory Data Analysis & Visualization
3. Machine Learning with Python
Every student picks unique project topics & writes detailed project reports. 

If you're hiring for data science roles, write to support@jovian.ai .
one_liner: Online Stanford for Data Science and Machine Learning

name: Playhouse
long_description: Playhouse is a mobile app for browsing video listings of homes and neighborhoods. We combine property and neighborhood data with a highly engaging full-screen video feed to create the ultimate consumer experience for discovering real estate.
one_liner: TikTok for real estate
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Tinai
long_description:
We are Tinai, an early-stage startup that builds mobile apps to help the 6 million small businesses in Vietnam do bookkeeping. With our apps, a drug store or convenience store owner can record transactions, manage customer credits, and control inventory. 

The 6 million small businesses in Vietnam account for $110B in GDP, but 80-90% of them still use pen and paper to do bookkeeping. This results in uncollected sales, lost inventory, and wasted time.

We can help them digitize bookkeeping because we are engineers with experience building for a billion+ users across TikTok, Amazon, and Quora. Tinai is founded by Long Tran, ex-machine learning engineer at Bytedance and Quora, Stanford MS, Columbia BA; and Thanh Nguyen, who spent 6 years as a software engineer at Amazon where he launched 3D modeling and virtual try-on.
one_liner: Bookkeeping app for Vietnam's 6M small businesses.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Rinse
long_description: Rinse is building the One Medical for dental. Beautiful studios, easy to book same day appointments, and anxiety-free care focused on prevention, not the upsell.
one_liner: We're building the One Medical for dental

name: SalaryBox
former_names: SalaryBox (Registered Name- Cresce Innovation Private Limited)
long_description:
Salarybox is a payroll app for small businesses in India. There are 63 Million small businesses in India and 90% still manage payroll manually. Today, business owners manage attendance on pen-paper; calculate salary on excel and pay employees in cash.

Using our App, the entire process can be performed with the click of a button. Our app reduces the time taken to process payroll from 5 days to 5 minutes. 

We use Payroll data to build a credit profile of 300 Million+ blue-collar workers and improve access to financial products.
one_liner: Gusto for India

name: Aqua
long_description: An investment platform that allows individuals to invest in private equity at lower minimums.
one_liner: Democratizing Private Equity Fund Investing through Lowered Minimums

name: Secoda
long_description:
Secoda is a universal data discovery and documentation tool that makes finding metadata, queries, charts and documentation as easy as a google search.

Today, data teams are collecting tons of data, but most employees don't know what data exists, how to use it, and what data to trust. This confusion happens because different components of company data get collected in fragmented tools. Teams use dbt and Snowflake for data cataloging, Google Sheets for events, Confluence for general knowledge, Slack to manage data requests, Mode for reports, Github, Looker, the list goes on and on.

Secoda lets teams manage their queries, charts, data catalog, data dictionary, and documentation in one place.

After teams switch to Secoda, data knowledge is centralized in one place. Instead of having to switch between Snowflake, dbt, Confluence Google Sheets, BI tool, and your query editor, Secoda keeps all your data knowledge in one place for everyone who needs it.
one_liner: The second brain for your data team

name: Locale
long_description:
Locale is a marketplace that delivers the best food from up to hours away, all in one box. We’ve partnered with Bay Area favorites to deliver orders everywhere from SF to Santa Cruz. This is far outside of the delivery radius that these businesses can reach with traditional delivery apps.

Since launching a year ago, we’re doing over $200K in monthly revenue and have delivered more than 15K orders. Consumers retain 70%+ month over month with more than $105 average order value. Our 80+ food producers give us higher discounts than any other delivery service and market for us. This is due to our unique order ahead business model and because we expand their delivery radius to reach new customers without any upfront costs or time commitments.

Locale is backed by YC, Tencent co-founder Jason Zeng’s Decent Capital, and more.
one_liner: The best local food from up to hours away, all in one box.

name: Pirouette Medical
long_description: At Pirouette, we have developed a low-profile, disk-shaped, rugged injection device with a patient-centric focus on affordability, portability, and usability. The patented device, based on extensive patient input, is designed to make administering an injection as easy as pushing a button. This allows individuals with limited or no training to easily and intuitively perform an injection on themselves or others.
one_liner: We make injections as easy as pushing a button!

name: Micro Meat
one_liner: Technologies for scaling up cultured/clean meat production

name: Kodex
long_description:
Kodex makes it easy for companies to process, and respond to, subpoenas from governments around the world. Agencies, like the FBI, subpoena user data from customers like Coinbase, and thousands of other companies - without Kodex, companies largely rely on email, fax, and spreadsheets to manage them.

Kodex is a SaaS tool that helps private sector companies manage relationships, workflows, and secure file transfer with government agencies who are seeking confidential information on a company's users. We streamline compliance operations, protect the privacy of their users, reduce error, and validate the legitimacy of government agents who are requesting information.

To date, we have launched with Coinbase, Kik Messenger, Whisper App, & Amino Apps. These companies alone receive over 20,000 data requests per year.
one_liner: Easiest way for companies to process data requests from governments

name: Verihubs
long_description: Verihubs builds a digital infrastructure and provides a range of AI-based services for financial services enterprises in Indonesia, enabling them to create a seamless customer onboarding process, from phone number verification, end-to-end KYC process, fraud detection, to instantaneous bank account linking, all in a single continuous flow. In addition to getting an instant verification, the end-users can also immediately start pulling funds directly from their bank account of choice as we provide an interconnection between their financial platforms.
one_liner: Data and Verification Platform for Indonesian Fintechs
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: HyperLinq
long_description: HyperLinq offers a simple yet powerful trading terminal on a monthly subscription. Our users are active day traders and professional fund managers. HyperLinq helps traders organize their portfolios, discover opportunities, execute trades faster, and analyze transactions.
one_liner: Bloomberg Terminal for Cryptocurrency Traders

name: Maroo
long_description:
Average wedding cost in the US is ~$40-45K. Based on NerdWallet's research in 2019 approximately 74% of couples go into debt in order to pay off their wedding expenses. They pay from 10%-35% APR on credit cards or personal loans charges and overdrafts. 

We believe there is a better way to start your married life than getting into another pile of credit debt. Which is why we are offering 0% APR payment plans up to 24 months on all wedding expenses with embedded event cancellation insurance.
one_liner: Buy Now Pay Later for $95B US wedding market

name: Awesomic
long_description:
Awesomic matches companies with the vetted designers instantly. Companies pay a flat monthly subscription and get results every business day, in 24 hours. 

We’ve already worked with 600+ companies worldwide; 100+ of them are YC startups. 
We tripled our revenue since April.

Feel free to check out more about Awesomic below:

How App Works – https://www.awesomic.io/how-it-works
Portfolio – https://www.awesomic.io/portfolio
Customers' Cases – https://www.awesomic.io/case-study
Book a Live Demo – https://www.awesomic.io/demo
one_liner: Get design tasks done in 24h

name: Fitia
long_description: Fitia is an automated meal planner for weight loss in Latin America. Our users get personalized recipes based on their data and their local country ingredients, supported with an exclusive database of 1M foods & recipes in the continent.
one_liner: Automated meal planner for weight loss in LatAm

name: trii
long_description: trii reduces the cost of retail transactions in Latam by automating processes that used to be expensive, manual, and time-consuming. trii is directly connected to Latam's local exchanges, allowing us to trade both US and local stocks with a very friendly relation with regulators. trii will become a digital bank for Latam's Andean Region.
one_liner: M1 for Latam

name: SafeBeat Rx
long_description:
34 million people suffer from heart rhythm disorders. Just to start recommended heart pills, patients have to be hospitalized for 3+ days just for monitoring, even when they aren’t feeling sick. SafeBeat Rx replaces this hospitalization with a take-home kit that combines FDA-approved wearables with our life-saving ECG software that lets patients start these medications safely at home.

We are a team of physicians, engineers, data scientists, and machine learning experts dedicated to using engineering to improve heart health.
one_liner: Live-saving ECG technology that replaces a hospitalization

name: Brite
long_description: We are building a benefits marketplace for employers to purchase and compare benefits by industry and company size. We are currently a decision support tool for employees to select the best benefit package.
one_liner: Software that helps employees pick their employee benefits.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Ivy Homes
long_description:
Selling a home is a super stressful affair due to the uncertainties involved. We help smoothen that process by guaranteeing a fair price and offering that value upfront for the seller. We’ve built up an information system that captures the details of all real estate transactions.
We’ve further developed a pricing model on top of it that helps determine the value of a home. We use this to offer liquidity to the seller by making an instant offer to purchase their house. We then refurb the property as necessary and further sell through our channel partners.
one_liner: We make instant offers to buy homes in India
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Commery
long_description:
Commery makes it easy for commercial tenants to find their perfect space, whether it is retail, industrial or office space.

Instead of browsing a list of available spaces like Zillow, tenants can publicly list their commercial space requirements (sqft, location, use case, etc.) and receive inbound from brokers and landlords who have spaces that are good matches. By listing demand first, tenants can even source off-market spaces that aren't publicly available yet.
one_liner: Marketplace to lease commercial real estate
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Búho Contable
long_description: Búho Contable is a tax filing and accounting platform for micro and small businesses in México.
one_liner: Turbotax for México and LATAM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Tavus
long_description: We make personalized video outreach scalable with AI. Record a video once, and send it to thousands instantly completely customized to them.
one_liner: Deepfake Personalized Videos

name: Zen
one_liner: Ergonomic (posture) benefit for employees at companies like Brex.

name: Basis
long_description:
[Basis](http://getbasis.com) is a platform for building end-to-end data pipelines ridiculously fast — everything from ingestion to ETL, machine learning, automation, and reverse ETL in a unified framework with no data engineering required. 

Data tools on the market today are all about managing your data as exhaust. We're building Basis for a new era where businesses use data as fuel for their operations — embracing both analytical and operational paradigms in a single product. 

Nearly all companies today operate on the same SaaS platforms with common schemas, and are trying to solve the same data problems — we're uniquely positioned to win in a new market of cloneable end-to-end data solutions!

We're industry veterans who have built production data solutions at Google, Square, and our previous startups, and we're going after the +$100B business automation market with a data-driven, API-first product that gives data developers superpowers.
one_liner: Zapier for Data Science

name: Forage
long_description:
Forage is the internet infrastructure for government social programs – the Stripe for government-funded payments. Government distributes $3.7T worth of social benefit programs through specialized payment networks every year. We want to give the internet access to that spend through a unified API.

Our first product offering helps online grocery stores accept payments from the existing $160B/year grocery subsidy (called SNAP / EBT) which >42M Americans rely on.
one_liner: Internet infrastructure of government social programs

name: Financial Choice
long_description: Financial Choice offers a unified checking and investment account. Your full balance is invested to get market returns, all while retaining instant access to cash even when the markets are closed. We are two ex-Googlers with CS PhDs from Stanford and the University of Washington who have worked together for 7 years.
one_liner: Financial Choice offers a unified checking and investment account.

name: Lariat Data
long_description:
Lariat Data is the monitoring and alerting solution for machine learning in production.

With a one-line integration, data teams can tie together business metrics, ancillary data, and model output to identify model pipeline issues. Teams can pinpoint the datasets and jobs responsible for problems like data aberrations, cohort instabilities and model drift.
one_liner: Observability for Machine Learning Teams
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Tablevibe
long_description:
Cloud Kitchens and Restaurants rely on delivery apps that demand a 40% revenue share without disclosing any customer information. 

Tablevibe is a SaaS platform that helps these businesses print QR codes on food packaging so they can capture customer feedback, build their own customer database, and push diners to order directly with them.

1. Capture: Delivery app and dine-in customers scan a Tablevibe QR-code to complete a short feedback survey in exchange for a loyalty discount (i.e. "$5 off on your next direct order"). This results in up to 25% response rates.

2. Learn: Tablevibe shares customer data and satisfaction insights in an easy-to-use online dashboard.

3. Grow: Happy customers share Google ratings and use their discount for repeat visits / direct reorders. This boosts positive word-of-mouth, drives loyalty and helps restaurants save up to 40% in delivery app commissions.

Demo & further details: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1UlIwG8fTXt6twNR3S0A7YDvrCmqnJ9GX3P_KJjbSYG8/edit#slide=id.gdb15d216a3_0_132
one_liner: Surveys boosting direct sales for restaurants & cloud kitchens

name: DailyBot
long_description:
DailyBot is an automation platform and chat assistant for work. It takes chat to a new level by providing automation and chat use-cases that are underserved by the current messaging platforms. It helps users get more things done within the chat to be more efficient and save time.

The new generation lives in chat. Remote/hybrid teams use DailyBot to automate daily workflows like stand-ups, team check-ins, give kudos to teammates or even to create their own chat-automation for their back-office with no-code/low-code in an environment similar to Amazon Alexa. DailyBot offers numerous add-ons to make the work experience better.

DailyBot is cross platform and already available for Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Chat and Discord.

Keywords: chatops chat-ops async nocode assistant workflow automation developer
one_liner: In-chat automation for work

name: Rendalo Maq
long_description: Rendalo Maq is the first digital broker for construction equipment in Latin America. Equipment owners use our free software to manage their inventory, and track the location and the availability of their machines. We collect this data and use it to help contractors acquire the equipment they need in hours instead of days, improving their productivity and efficiency.
one_liner: Digital broker for construction equipment in Latin America.

name: Lago
long_description:
Growth is one of the fastest growing functions within software companies. Yet there are few tools built for them. 

Their burning pain is to segment and sync data across dozens of tools while iterating as fast as possible. 

Lago solves this issue by enabling growth teams to perform data extraction, modeling, and synchronization themselves, in minutes, versus hours through engineers.
one_liner: No-code tool for growth teams, to segment and sync customer data

name: Hypercore
long_description:
Hypercore is a loan management software for small lenders. We help lenders automate workflows and provide them with real-time analytics and KPIs on their portfolios.
Since June we are running paid pilots ($3.5K MRR), 1 LOI ($1.5K MRR). The founding team met while serving together as officers in technological units in the Israeli Defence Forces. We then established together a software development company specialized in fintech projects such as e-wallets and open-banking projects. That’s where we discovered how archaic are the tools lenders use that are ready for disruption.
Hypercore is building the tools for private lenders who currently do everything in Excel, culminating in a 'Nasdaq of private loan books' - utilizing the platform to securitize loan books.
one_liner: Loan management software for private lenders

name: Union54
long_description: Union54 provides APIs for African corporates to easily issue debit cards. We save fintechs 6 months of development and hundreds of thousands of dollars in setup fees.
one_liner: Card Issuing API for Africa

name: StudyStream
long_description:
StudyStream is a video platform & online community that allows students to study with others from around the world 24/7 and in real time. It brings accountability & motivation to the students from over 180 countries who study with us daily.  

We have helped over 3 million students be more productive & motivated, while also feeling less isolated. Our mission is to create a global community of students who can motivate each other to succeed.
one_liner: 24/7 video platform & online community for students to study together

name: Abbot
long_description: Abbot is a platform for building, running, and monitoring automation from your chat room. We help teams bring work to where the conversation about work happens.
one_liner: Make Chat Your Command Center
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: InstaKin
long_description:
InstaKin helps migrants in the US to make payments and manage tasks in their home countries. Research shows that more than 70% of migrants want to pay vendors back home directly. 

As Founders, we realized InstaKin can work when thousands of migrants contacted us asking for help. Our marketplace makes it easier for immigrants  to manage their tasks and make direct payments back home.
one_liner: Building a SuperApp for Global Diaspora to make Payments back home

name: SnapCalorie
long_description: SnapCalorie is the world’s first app where you can take a photo of ANY meal and get an accurate calorie count.  It takes seconds to use and is more accurate than a trained nutritionist. The team previously co-founded Google Lens, Cloud Vision API, and published a CVPR paper demonstrating the first algorithm to outperform a professional nutritionist at calorie counting. We started building three months ago and already trained a complex AI algorithm, built an app from scratch, and launched a beta to early adopters. With 45M Americans dieting each month, and charging $16 a month, this presents a 9 billion dollar market opportunity in the US alone.
one_liner: Single photo nutrition tracking.

name: Anakin
long_description:
Anakin helps e-commerce stores and brands increase their revenue by sending them the pricing, products and trends data of their competitors. Using Anakin, stores like Instacart, Walmart and Nike can increase their revenue by up to 12%. 

The number one issue facing big e-commerce companies today is maintaining and pricing millions of SKUs across geographies correctly. Anakin makes it easy and fully automated. Anakin is growing 28% every month and is live in 10+ countries with 3 multi-billion dollar eCommerce companies as clients.
one_liner: We send eCommerce companies LIVE pricing data of their competitors

name: Bite Ninja
long_description: Our platform allows restaurants to outsource their drive-thru and front-counter shifts to trained freelancers working from home offices.
one_liner: Cloud labor for restaurants

name: REPROSENT
long_description: REPROSENT is an app that tracks a cancer patient's daily symptoms and uses this data to produce reports that are sent to their oncologist. Today, half of patient symptoms are missed during treatment. REPROSENT provides this key missing information, enabling the oncologist to provide better care.
one_liner: Helping patients fight cancer with their own data.

name: Epinoma
one_liner: We engineer proteins that control the operating system of biology.

name: Watu
long_description:
Watu is enabling shopping inside of emails to help eCommerce companies delight their customers with amazing email campaigns.

We transform their static marketing emails into interactive shopping experiences.
one_liner: Shopping inside of emails

name: MadEats
long_description:
MadEats is an online delivery-only restaurant group in the Philippines, building affordable, high margin food brands by using our own ghost kitchens. 

Since we use ghost kitchens, we don’t have to spend for expensive dining areas and wait staff. We can spend more money on growing our food brands, better food, and making better delivery experiences.
one_liner: Online delivery-only restaurant group in the Philippines

name: Sleek
long_description:
Sleek is a browser extension that lets you do 1-click checkout from every store on the internet. You give us your credit card once, and we make checking out from any website as easy as buying from Amazon. Plus, Sleek gives you cash back on top of your existing card rewards.

Our browser extension uses ML to understand and complete every checkout on the web. In the future, we’ll become ‘Ramp for consumers’, expanding beyond checkout with a suite of financial tools.
one_liner: 1-click checkout from every store on the internet + cash back rewards.

name: Keeper
long_description:
Keeper makes software to help bookkeepers manage their clients' back-office.

We write the same kind of software that venture-backed bookkeepers like Pilot write internally, but instead of doing bookkeeping, we sell that software to the 1.5M bookkeepers across the US.
one_liner: We make software for bookkeepers.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Strive Math
long_description: Strive teaches K12 math through code via live 1-1 online classes. In Strive classes, students code games and visualizations that are aligned to their school math syllabus, in the process, kids learn the most valuable skill in the 21st century: coding.
one_liner: Live 1-1 Classes Teaching K12 Math Through Code

name: PlusIdentity
long_description: At PlusIdentity, we’re building the best password manager for startups, starting with a Slack app. With backgrounds in CS and Econ, we (Channy & Ike) left Harvard to work on this because we noticed that there isn’t a password manager specifically built for startups. We recently launched within the YC community with our Slack app and our users already love how easy we are to set up and use. Our goal is to become every YC company's password manager, then grow with our users to eventually become the security & identity backbone of fast growing tech companies. In 5 years, we are going to be the Okta for startups.
one_liner: Password manager for startups

name: Cabal
long_description: Cabal helps founders get more out of their investors and advisors. We do this by providing a private workspace for founders to send asks & updates, track contributions, and get warm intros to prospects and candidates.
one_liner: Private workspace for founders, investors, and advisors to collaborate

name: Kitchenful
long_description: Kitchenful is an app for personalized recommendations of recipes, which gets you the ingredients delivered from your local supermarket. We offer the same convenience as meal kits do, but with better personalization at a lower price point.
one_liner: Weekly meal planning and grocery shopping, done for you!

name: AppX
long_description:
AppX empowers creators to launch their personal apps and monetise their audience via courses and premium content. 

We are currently doing $1.3M in monthly GMV, $63,000 in monthly revenue and working with 85+ active creators. We are growing 30% month over month and are profitable. The company is founded by Sameer Sadana and Anuj Gupta and is backed by Y Combinator. Sameer previously founded a 50-person consultancy building creatives for Youtubers and Anuj was previously software engineer at CampK12, one of the leading EdTech startups in India. https://appx.co.in
one_liner: AppX helps social media creators launch their own mobile apps.

name: Neodocs
long_description:
Neodocs lets you perform instant lab tests on your smartphone. Our users are health optimizers and athletes who want to improve key nutritional markers for better performance.

You simply collect your sample, take a picture, and results are instantly generated.


We are the perfect team to build this. Anurag is a 3-time medical entrepreneur who’s built medical devices, Pratik has worked on AI/ML models for leading US banks, and I come from a consulting background at Bain & Co.

We’re building your personal lab on your phone.
one_liner: Instant lab tests on your smartphone

name: AlgoUniversity
long_description:
We are building live teaching infrastructure that enables handful of top educators (from Google, Facebook, etc) to coach a large number of students.
We train college students in a year-long live cohorts and they pay us a portion of their salary as fees once they get a tech job (Income Sharing Agreement)
one_liner: Building Job driven Virtual Tech University for India 🇮🇳

name: Swipe
long_description: Swipe is a simple billing and payments app for small businesses in India. We make it easy for local businesses to invoice their customers over WhatsApp. With Swipe, businesses can send a WhatsApp message with a link that allows their customers to pay instantly with a variety of payment methods.
one_liner: Simple billing and payments for 75M+ Indian SMBs 🇮🇳
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Echoes HQ
long_description:
Echoes gives engineering leaders visibility into the alignment of engineering efforts against the business goals and whether their deliveries are having actual business impacts.

By doing so we enable engineering leaders to make informed decisions on hiring and priorities, to communicate effectively on their team's activity to their business partners/bosses/investors, and to build engagement by putting their team's work into context.

We achieve this by offering a seamless way for engineers to connect their day-to-day contributions to their intent, creating the missing link between tech outputs and business outcomes.
one_liner: Measure and communicate engineering activity
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Advantage Club
long_description: Advantage Club is a global platform for employee benefits and financial wellness including perks, rewards and early wage access. We are currently live with 370+ companies across 60+ countries and have a monthly revenue of $230,000+. Our revenue has grown 6x in the last 14 months.
one_liner: Global platform for employee engagement with perks,rewards&early wages
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Nino Foods
long_description: Nino Foods creates and operates cloud kitchen brands in India for the premium market. We're doing $160K of monthly revenue and we're profitable, from 3 locations in Mumbai. We've grown 13x in 11 months from 900 monthly orders to 12000. The founding team has an MBA from INSEAD, and led online revenue for Disney and Conde Nast. We're focusing on premium because it is where all the profits lie, and it represents 50% of a $10bn industry. At Nino, we're building category leading food brands with crazy amounts of customer love.
one_liner: Premium cloud kitchen brands in India

name: Rivia.AI
long_description: Rivia.AI is a fulfilment provider for D2C brands in India. We use software enabled warehouses and existing delivery services to enable 2 day deliveries for 200 million urban customers in India.
one_liner: Amazon Level Logistics for D2C Brands in India
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: BLUUMBIO
long_description:
How to clean up industrial pollution is one of the greatest unmet challenges of the 21st century. 

At BluumBio, we engineer bacteria and plants to eat toxic chemicals. Oil and mining companies use our products to clean up and restore contaminated sites.

To date, we created strains that can degrade petroleum hydrocarbons, PCBs, PFAS, heavy metals and microplastics. We also achieved regulatory approval to field trial our products. We are also in the process of obtaining our first five R&D contracts worth >$20M.  
Field-application of our products costs $1-2M per year per site. The cost of treating Superfund, military, and landfill sites in the US alone is worth >$40B annually.

At BluumBio, we are building a future where biodiversity thrives and everyone has access to clean soil, water and air.
one_liner: We make bacteria and plants that clean up pollution.

name: Parallel Bio
long_description: Parallel Bio created a human 'immune system in a dish' to discover drugs and immunotherapies more likely to work in patients. Our platform has all of the same elements as a human immune system, meaning you can test drugs and vaccines as if you were testing them in actual patients from the start. The biggest reason why 92% of new drugs fail is that they were tested in mice - but with our human platform, pharma companies will know which drugs will successfully treat patients, speeding up the process and reducing the cost. To date our platform has successfully been used to test 12 drugs, and vaccines against 8 different diseases. The company is founded by Robert DiFazio, a former Stanford R&D director with a PhD in immunology, and Juliana Hilliard, a former System1 Biosciences R&D lead with an MSc in bioengineering, both of whom have led drug discovery programs for years.
one_liner: Using the immune system to cure disease

name: Zazos
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description: Zazos is a no-code tool for HR teams. It allows them to build people management apps like employee directories, onboarding forms, and compensation reports 10x faster, without knowing how to code. It’s like retool for HR. HR software stops working as companies grow and their data ends up being spread across spreadsheets and poorly supported home-built tools. With Zazos, companies can build HR apps that do exactly what they need.
one_liner: No-code tool for HR teams
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Instacrops
long_description:
Instacrops is a simple dashboard that helps farmers maximize their crop yields. 

We give farmers IoT sensors to put in their field. We combine that data with satellite and drone data to provide analytics on the health of their farms. Farmers use this to increase their crops yield by 22% on average. 

We’re live on 280 farms across Latam and have reached more than $200.000 in monthly revenue, growing 41% month over month. 

There’s 2.9 billion acres of farmland in Latin America which makes this a $50 billion market.

We’re instacrops. We’re bringing data driven decisions to farmers worldwide
one_liner: We help farmers maximize crop yields in LATAM.

name: BoldVoice
long_description: BoldVoice helps non-native English speakers speak more clearly and confidently. We combine personalized, bite-sized video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches with real-time pronunciation feedback via speech AI, to create an effective and engaging learning experience.
one_liner: Speech and accent coaching app for non-native English speakers

name: SalaryBook
long_description:
SalaryBook is an payroll, employee attendance and Expense management app for 60 million Indian SMEs. SMBs see in our app a one stop solution for running their business. Starting from seamless on-boarding of employees to managing their payroll and attendance. Our app includes some cool features like selfie & location based attendance marking. Say goodbye to the traditional punch in attendance systems & replace it with a click of a button on SalaryBook mobile app.

SalaryBook also helps 400M Indian blue-collar employees to create their first ever credit & skills profile online.
one_liner: Mobile first solution for Payroll, employee & expense management

name: Zeit Medical
long_description: Zeit Medical leverages the power of AI and wearable sensors to deliver peace of mind for those affected by stroke. Zeit’s smart headband immediately detects the onset of stroke and notifies 911. Each year more than 90% of the one million strokes in the US go untreated, resulting in life-long disability and exploding medical costs north of $100b. The lack of timely treatment is the result of delays in alerting the emergency services. More than 10 million Americans with an elevated stroke risk live with constant fear that a stroke may go unnoticed for hours, while they are asleep or alone. The company was founded by Orestis Vardoulis  PhD  a biomedical & mechanical engineer and expert in digital health (EPFL/Stanford) and Urs Naber  MD  a critical care physician (Dartmouth/Stanford). They have both seen the devastating effects of stroke in their families and came up with the idea of addressing this unmet clinical need during their Stanford Biodesign Innovation Fellowship.
one_liner: Immediate stroke detection at home

name: Atmana
former_names: Atmana Innovations Pvt. Ltd. (formerly FunSwitch Technologies Pvt. Ltd)
long_description:
At Atmana, we help millennials cut down on technology addictions like gaming, pornography and social media. We charge users $90 per year for our solution consisting of blocking and techniques used in treating in alcohol and drug addiction like peer support groups, buddy program and psycho education. 

Our first product- BlockerX, helps millennials cut down on compulsive watching of pornography.
one_liner: Helping 15-30 year olds control technology addictions

name: ODWEN
long_description: ODWEN enables India’s 60m SME's to find curated warehouses in minutes at prices 20% below current market and transport their inventory in and out with just a few clicks.  With 500+ warehouses across 91 locations in 21 States, we are the largest integrated 3PL/ warehouse network in India.
one_liner: AirBnB for Small Warehouses
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Deed
long_description: Deed makes it easy for employees to donate to their favorite charities and volunteer with great causes at work. Companies like Airbnb and Stripe use Deed to increase employee retention and happiness. Since launching publicly in January, we’ve increased our logo count by 4X with companies like DoorDash, Box, and Lob. We did this by making sure employees have the same awesome experience using their workplace giving tool as they do with their favorite consumer apps.
one_liner: Making it easy for employees to donate and volunteer with good causes.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: PropReturns
long_description: PropReturns is a marketplace to invest in Indian Real Estate. In the Indian Real Estate market plagued by lack of transparency and trust, we provide investors access to investment grade properties and allow them to make investment decisions backed by financial analysis.
one_liner: Marketplace to invest in Indian Real Estate backed by data
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Coulomb AI
long_description:
We are building Predictive Battery Analytics software for Electric Vehicles to significantly boost their battery performance and extend their lifetime. 

Our platform enables electric vehicle and battery manufacturers, fleet operators, and financial service providers to accelerate product development, improve performance, ensure long-term reliability, extend life, and mitigate financial risks of batteries. 

We have helped EV Fleets to increase their fleet utilization by 25% and reduce operational by 30%. Our customers have witnessed 50% fewer battery-related failures & recalls.
one_liner: Battery Analytics Platform for Electric Vehicles

name: Mailmodo
long_description: Mailmodo is an email marketing software that helps marketers create app-like experiences in email by adding forms, shopping cart, calendar, NPS and more widgets within the email. Our interactive emails reduce the number of steps for users, thereby increasing email conversions. You can use it to collect feedback from your users, book meetings with prospects, recover abandon carts, generate leads, and more all within emails.
one_liner: No-code email marketing platform to send forms & widgets within emails

name: Akudo
long_description:
Akudo is a digital bank for teenagers in India that gets them their own sleek, personalized prepaid card that they can use independently, helps them save money and gives them exciting rewards under a gamified setup when they're good at their personal finance.  
We are crafting the concept of "Learning-first Banking" where financial learning is seamlessly intertwined with full scale banking.
one_liner: India's first learning-focused neobank for teenagers

name: Koshex
former_names: Koshex (Your Pot of Wealth X Exponential Growth)
long_description: Koshex is building Wealthfront for India with data-driven insights around day to day finances for an individual to save more and invest well. We are automating wealth creation for 400 million Indian millennials with access to more than US$700bn of individual investable wealth.
one_liner: Automating wealth creation for 400M Indian millennials

name: Defy
long_description:
We are building India's first social crypto exchange.

We’re on a mission to change the way you perceive your investments by building a fair, efficient and transparent system that enables you to take charge of your finances.   We want you to be able to navigate the world of cryptocurrency in an enjoyable, seamless manner; and what better way to do so than along with your friends?   Which is why we built Defy.
one_liner: Social Crypto Exchange for India

name: Kalam Labs
long_description: At Kalam Labs we teach 6 to 14 year old kids their favourite science topics via live gaming. Kids spend upto 3 hours per week learning topics like- Space, Black Holes and Dinosaurs.
one_liner: STEM Learning via live-gameplay

name: FrontPage
long_description:
We’re building a brokerage around our community of more than 200k users sharing more than 150k ideas per month. FrontPage grew 2.5x in the last one year to 50K MAU and has >60% M1 retention.

Starting with a community to build a brokerage gives us unfair advantages over the traditional brokerages. It reduces cost of user acquisition, retains users better and builds in network effects to our brokerage.

FrontPage team is a bunch of tech and product geeks who have been active traders and investors in Indian equity markets for over 15 years combined, with a nose for building highly engaging social apps over the past half a decade. The founders are alumni from IIT Delhi, IIT Roorkee with experience in standing up consumer facing products at OLA, Flipkart, Yahoo! etc.
one_liner: Public.com for India

name: Levro
long_description:
Levro is a new multicurrency business neobank. We help companies expand overseas by giving them the ability to hold, convert, and pay in/out of 30+ currencies using one account.

If you are growing your company overseas or dealing with setting up in a new country, foreign currency volatility, high exchange rates, etc. please send us an email. We'd love to help: founders@levro.com
one_liner: Multicurrency bank account for businesses

name: Ananya Health
long_description: Ananya Health is building a portable cryoablation unit designed for every primary care clinic in the world. Our beachhead application is cervical cancer prevention -- even though cervical cancer is easy to screen for, 80% of clinics worldwide lack the infrastructure to treat at the earliest stages. Our platform technology allows clinics to treat at the point of care and save more than 5M women from developing cancer in the next decade.
one_liner: Portable cryoablation to prevent cervical cancer

name: Flowbo
long_description: Flowbo is an exchange connecting investors to online creators like YouTube and Instagram. We package assets of creators into investable products so creators can raise money. For example, we package creators' receivables into factoring products. We create new asset classes for the new economy.
one_liner: Pipe for creators

name: q&ai
long_description: q&ai gives product leaders insight into how customers think about product and messaging by analyzing their company's sales calls. For example, we automatically highlight customer pain points and reactions to messaging, delivering objective insights into product and positioning. q&ai is founded by alumni from the University of Michigan. Adithya operated as the NLP modeling lead at Capital One's Center for Machine Learning. Michael was the lead developer of Capital One's privacy portal, serving millions of customers. Bhairav dropped out of his dual PhD at MIT to found q&ai, after publishing research on deep learning and robotics at NVIDIA Research, NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory, and the Montreal Institute for Learning algorithms.
one_liner: Automatic product insights from sales and success conversations.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: SolarMente
long_description:
We integrate solar, storage and energy trading for each home in one smart solution via our software platform. We’re starting in Spain which has the highest potential for solar and one of the lowest market penetration in Europe (0.1%). 
We are doing $100k in monthly revenue, we’ve grown 300% since YC started and are breaking even. 
We will help 5M Spanish homeowners produce, store and distribute their clean energy ($50B market). We are backed by GFC, Liquid2 Ventures, Soma Capital, Y Combinator and other investors including Atomico angels.
one_liner: Sunrun for Europe

name: Catena Biosciences
long_description: Catena’s technology lets us attach any two proteins together using an enzyme -tyrosinase- and the native amino acids tyrosine and cysteine within target proteins. It is a true platform technology because it enables the joining of any two soluble proteins together with minimal engineering and without restrictions due to protein size or complexity. Our work has already been used to modify cancer specific antibodies, but the most exciting application is in the emerging field of immune tolerance induction. Catena’s technology allows us to couple receptor binding proteins to immune triggering partners, letting us retrain the immune system when it targets healthy proteins. Such treatments could effectively cure autoimmune diseases such as Multiple Sclerosis, Graves' Disease and Hashimoto's by limiting inflammation towards ankyrin, anoctamin, and other self-antigens.
one_liner: Using protein coupling to cure autoimmune disorders.

name: Karbon Card
long_description:
We at Karbon Cards provide corporate credit cards to Indian private limited companies without any fixed deposits. Most good companies qualify for credit - 10% of annual profits for profitable companies or 1% of cash balance for VC backed startups. 

For those do not qualify, we have corporate cashback card where they can top up, use their card, and get 0.5% of cashback. In addition of cards, we provide vendor payment solutions that our customer love, as it is 5X better than banks.
one_liner: Corporate Card solution for Indian businesses

name: Goodkind
long_description:
Asynchronous video is quickly becoming a primary medium of communication. Yet, big businesses don't do it because trusting people on video is hard and doing this at scale is too difficult. 

Goodkind is a video messaging platform for B2C revenue teams, and we're unlocking this medium for businesses for the first time. 

Fortune 500 retailers, fintechs, and SMB SaaS companies use Goodkind to increase conversion rates by up to 5x across the customer journey. 

Goodkind is backed by Yuri Sagalov, Chris Golda and other awesome investors.
one_liner: Video messaging for B2C revenue teams

name: Fingo Africa
long_description:
Fingo is building a pan-African digital bank.

Today, most Africans pay 5-15% fees to transfer money to friends, family, or businesses - with Fingo these fees will be 90% cheaper. 

In 240 seconds, any young person will be able to access a full suite of financial services including personal, business, investment and savings accounts.
one_liner: A neobank for Africa's 500 million youth

name: Pabio
long_description: Pabio offers high-quality furniture rental for Europe. With our asset-light rent-to-own business model, customers can get $20k of new furniture with $0 upfront and monthly payments for up to 4 years.
one_liner: Asset-light, rent-to-own furniture for Europe

name: Alchemy Commerce
long_description: Alchemy is a platform that enables brands to build unique e-commerce experiences without code. High-growth companies use us to iterate faster without being held back by clunky apps and rigid templates.
one_liner: Visual development for high-growth e-commerce 🔮
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Rootly
long_description:
Rootly is an incident management platform and Slackbot designed to help companies resolve incidents faster by automating manual admin tasks and providing insight to prevent them in the future.

Key Features:
- Incident Slackbot
- Automated Runbooks
- Status Pages
- Postmortems
- Service Catalog
- Metrics
- 30+ Integrations
one_liner: Manage incidents like outages directly in Slack

name: Potion
one_liner: AI for product formulation

name: Level
long_description: Level provides fast and simple financing to lending startups that gets them off the ground and grows with them as they scale. We do so by buying loans in small quantities at first and rewarding our customers with more access to capital based on performance. Co-founder & CEO, Vladimir Korshin, previously worked in the traditional venture debt system at Silicon Valley Bank, where he noticed that strong startups were frequently denied from non-dilutive financing because they were too small. Just 4 weeks after going live with our first customer, we purchased $1.3M in loans across 6 customers and have a backlog of 63 companies to work with. The founding team brings 30+ years of startup experience: Vladimir previously worked as an operator at Facebook, Eventbrite, and Niantic; Asa Schachar was an engineer at Microsoft and managed teams of engineers at Optimizely; Molly Hogan was a principal product manager at Amazon. Level is backed by Liquid2, Y Combinator (S21), and others. https://www.trylevel.app/
one_liner: Fast and simple fintech financing

name: jestor
long_description: Jestor is a no-code tool for COOs that need to scale their operations fast. We help hundreds of startups around the world, such as Loft 🦄, to build their own internal tools without code.
one_liner: Run your company with internal Apps

name: Flow Club
long_description:
https://www.flow.club/ is a virtual co-working space where people work in high-intensity sprints designed to double their productivity. 

We envision a world where...
- anyone can access deep, focused flow anytime, anywhere
- working independently or remotely doesn’t have to feel like you're on your own

Our mission is to build the software that powers the most inspiring and productive work environment for knowledge workers.

Our members love Flow Club (https://www.flow.club/wall-of-love). We’re growing quickly, just presented at Y Combinator's Summer 2021 Demo Day, raised $5M, and hiring our founding team.

We are backed by Worklife Ventures, a firm investing in companies re-designing the way work gets done in the future, and 100 more of the world's best investors and operators. Among our investors are Paul Graham and the founders of iconic companies like Dropbox, Mercury, Quora, Outschool, and Sendbird. 

Finally, we are inspired by our members and hosts who we see everyday working out of Flow Club building the most incredible things. They remind us great things are built incrementally, one step at a time.
one_liner: Virtual WeWork for Deep Work

name: Concord Materials
long_description: SaaS automation tools, financing and marketplace for bulk construction materials
one_liner: Automating procurement for construction companies

name: Jupe
long_description: Jupe is creating a flat-packed off-grid technology that allows a village to be set up in hours, anywhere on the planet, unlocking what was considered unusable land. With ‘skateboard chassis’ tech inspired by the electric vehicle industry, Jupe is able to flat pack and transport living units and infrastructure 100X cheaper, manufacture 30X faster, and at 10X lower cost relative to a volumetric modular ADU/living unit. ARR of $11M next year on land share model. Ultimate aim is to house 1% of the human population (100M persons) by 2050.
one_liner: Jupe delivers a village on a truck anywhere on planet Earth.
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Baraka
long_description:
💸Hey YC, we’re baraka (S21), a commission-free investment app for the Middle East.

🚀 Our mission

Our aim is to build a better investment experience through a content first approach that focuses on providing news and educational insight for a new generation of investors. 

📱 Our product

This is how we do it:

•	5,000+ stocks and ETFs – the freedom to choose the companies and industries that you want to back
•	The power of financial literacy – educational  content, digestible market news and in-depth stock analysis
•	Fractional Shares – the ability to invest with as little as $1
•	Fair pricing – no commission, custody fees or inactivity fees
•	Easy to use – intuitive user journey and interface  


🕒 What's Next?

The app is available for Arabian Gulf  residents and soon to expand Middle East wide. Everyone else, please sign up to our daily, finance themed newsletter, a mashup of Robinhood Snacks and Morning Brew but for MENA. Check it out on our website: getbaraka.com.

Please reach out to give us feedback, discuss product, go-to-market strategy or anything else on founders@getbaraka.com.  

Feras & Kunal
one_liner: Commission-Free Investment App for the Middle East.

name: Archbee
long_description: Build product documentation sites, internal wikis, knowledge bases, API references, developer guides, architecture diagrams, and more.
one_liner: Docs tool for software teams and products
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Varos
long_description:
Varos is a planning software for marketing, product and finance teams that leverages our real-time competitor data to help guide key decisions.

Companies today are flying blind because they only rely on their own historical data and don’t know how their metrics compare to their competitors.

Varos increases revenue for our users by accurately showing them how their metrics compare against similar companies so they can decide which KPIs to double down on and which to spend time fixing.

Planning software is a $21bn market with companies like Anaplan and Adaptive Insights achieving multi-billion dollar exits by making it easy to compare current performance against historical and set goals. Varos goes far beyond this by also leveraging this competitive data, and that’s why we’re going to be bigger than any of them.
one_liner: Planning software for marketing and finance teams with a twist

name: Gobillion
long_description: Gobillion is the Pinduoduo for India, we make e-commerce social by enabling customers to buy together in groups and get great deals!
one_liner: Pinduoduo for India

name: Carbonfact
long_description: Carbonfact identifies products with the lowest carbon footprint in their category. We enable online retailers to easily build their sustainable product catalogue and distribute low carbon brands through the sustainable categories we certify.
one_liner: Source of truth for product-level carbon footprint of consumer goods

name: TAG
long_description: TAG is setting new standards and changing the way Pakistan banks by building a digital bank for the masses, with an aim to encompass the entire financial life of users, from basic banking such as bank account and Visa Debit card to employer payrolls, salary advances, savings, and neo-brokerage in future.
one_liner: First Digital Bank (Chime/Revolut/N26) for Pakistan

name: Abstra
location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
