long_description:
Most of the edtech products right now are don't have the right incentive mechanism to stay accessible, high quality and up-to-date.

The traditional model of charging users for attending courses, is broken. This optimizes for increasing the number of people coming through the front doors of the course. Once they are in, there is not much incentive to actually deliver a good learning experience. It quickly shifts from a game of education to a game of marketing.

We think this can be fixed. This can be fixed with clear crypto-economic incentives that aligns with the actual learning outcomes of the learners. We're creating a University DAO, one that is decentralized and permissionless. What does the Stanford native to the internet look like?
one_liner: A Decentralized University, where learning is always free.

name: Aerotime
long_description:
Aerotime helps you be more productive by reducing context switching. We do this by automatically grouping your meetings together, creating dedicated time on your calendar for individual tasks, and shutting down all notifications when you need to focus.
Done across the team, it saves countless hours and helps teams run faster (and happier).

You'll always be in flow with Aerotime, because you'll be going deep into similar tasks in one go and are easily visualize your week's plan which will not let you get distracted from the task in hand.
one_liner: Automatically group meetings together and find time for deep work

name: Newzip
long_description: Newzip is an online marketplace for neighborhood advice.  We make it easy for you to connect to local experts to answer questions like what neighborhood should I live in or what school should I send my kids to.

name: Taste
long_description: Taste is an online marketplace where you can order ready-to-eat dinners from great restaurants, shipped nationwide. The next time you want to have a nice dinner at home, instead of cooking for hours or getting low quality take out, you can order a nice multi-course dinner from Taste to enjoy with friends or loved ones.
one_liner: Online marketplace for dinners shipped from great restaurants

name: ZOKO
long_description:
Zoko makes it easy for businesses, to do Sales, Marketing and Customer Support on WhatsApp. 

There are 100 million merchants worldwide, already using WhatsApp for their businesses. The founders started off with an ecommerce business, entirely on WhatsApp, which grew to a customer base of 200K followers who would make purchases after seeing their weekly WhatsApp updates. 

Other businesses started reaching out to them, offering to pay for their "WhatsApp sales tools". That was the Aha moment! The founders realized that selling these tools to other businesses, was the way to go. 

In fact, 175 million people message a business on WhatsApp everyday. Even Amazon can't beat that! There is a dire need for tools that allow businesses to use WhatsApp effectively as a channel to sell online. The market size for ecommerce on WhatsApp is estimated be north of $50B/year.

WhatsApp is the internet of the #nextbillion and Zoko plans to become the Shopify for merchants, selling on WhatsApp.
one_liner: Better Business on WhatsApp

Our product provides anything that is needed from underwriting software to access to insurers to compliance, in a simple API.

We want to accelerate transition of meat industry into a more sustainable future - by 2030 we want to cut meat consumption in half.

Companies like Autodesk, Bloomberg and Clearbit are using Milk Video to turn their 60-minute webinar recordings into 1-2 minute videos. These videos are being used in social media and email outreach to drive leads and close deals.

- Capture Video/Audio Product demos, customer references, sales decks, white-papers, contracts, onboarding material, and other content 

- Automatically organize & contextualize  (by industry, persona, deal stage, deal size)

- Build personalized deal rooms with AI-targeted content,  simplified workflows, and 1:1 communication with the prospect and other stakeholders/influencers.

Learn more about our launch here https://www.producthunt.com/posts/referenceable or sign up here  https://www.enable.us/

name: TRACTIAN
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil

one_liner: Machines talk, we listen. So you can act on insights before they break

name: AutoProctor
long_description:
AutoProctor is an automated tool that ensures students don’t cheat on online tests. As students take the test, AutoProctor monitors their camera, mic and the screen they are looking at. So, for example, if they try Googling an answer, this will be detected.

At the end of the test, depending on the type and frequency of these violations, AutoProctor calculates a Trust Score. Teachers can view the evidence gathered for those Test Attempts with a low Trust Score.
one_liner: Automated Tool that Prevents Cheating on Online Tests

name: AcadPal

name: Dendron
long_description:
[Dendron](https://dendron.so) is the scalable note taking tool that grows as you do 🌱. Built on top of markdown, git, and VSCode, Dendron helps you reference all your information in seconds, regardless of how much of it you have. 

With Dendron, you can effortlessly add, organize, and compound the value of your notes over time. 

You can use Dendron as your own personal knowledge management solution, your daily planner, or as your company's own take on the [gitlab handbook](https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/).

name: Codingal
long_description:
Codingal is the online after-school for 270M Indian K-12 students to learn coding by buildings apps, games, and websites. All classes are taught live 1:1 by vetted and trained all-star teachers with Computer Science background, which sets them apart.

India has great technical universities but literally zero programming education at the K-12 level. Parents want their kids to get started with programming earlier, and that's why they use Codingal.

Every kid gets a personalized learning path and personalized individual attention in 1:1 classes with teachers. Kids learn by building apps, games, websites, and robotics in a fun & engaging way.

Kids find it so fun & engaging that NPS is just outstanding - 73. They have rated teachers at 4.9 out of 5. Curriculum content is rated at 4.6 out of 5.

Codingal is on a mission to inspire kids to fall in love with coding, and provide the right education to them who will be able to create anything they can imagine and build the future when they grow up to become entrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists.
one_liner: Online after-school for K-12 students to learn coding

name: Resquared

Local businesses were the hardest B2B segment to reach, but account for over 60% firms in the U.S.
Our SaaS application has data on every local business that are easy to get in touch with using our specialized marketing automation tools and workflows. 
Resquared has been proven to save sales pro's over 3 hours per day and result in 53% stronger leads (case study on website).

Want to build the next great dApp? Build it on QuickNode.

We are enabling service businesses to grow their business online. In a way, we’re building Shopify for service businesses to (1) bring the business online with a website, (2) market the business, and (3) manage everything from one place.

Founded in 2019 by three ex-VCs, Quotabook is a fintech startup building equity management solutions for startups, employees and investors. With Quotabook, founders can streamline equity data and company ownership by managing cap tables as well as running analyses and simulations. Employees are better motivated through stock option features that are aligned with the growth of the company. Investors can track performance of their portfolios with data automatically synced into the platform. Quotabook takes care of all the fuss so that founders, employees and investors can focus on building a business together. 

We are proud to be a startup helping fellow startups boost growth. Find out more about how we simplify equity management for startups around the globe from https://www.quotabook.com/en/

Law firms use Darrow's system to take cases with the highest potential impact and success rate to court - securing compensation for victims and deterring bad actors from wrongdoing.

Once connected, both teams can collaborate together on sales deals to close more business, faster using our workflows & automation - all of which are tracked so executives gain critical insights & intelligence on how each partnership is influencing their sales pipeline.

Homebase provides Rent-To-Own real estate financing for buyers in Southeast Asia - the only alternative to inflexible/high-interest rate (12%+) mortgages in the region. We strive to provide more innovative, compelling, and empathetic solutions for those who aspire to own a home.

Homebase was founded in 2019 in Singapore and is backed by Y Combinator, VinaCapital Ventures, Class 5 Global, Pegasus Technology Ventures, 1982 Ventures, Iterative VC and Antler, as well as the founders and executives at disruptive real estate financing companies including Opendoor, Zerodown, 99.co and Divvy Homes.

name: LogisticsOS
long_description: LogisticsOS provides route optimization and fleet dispatching algorithms as services to let any last-mile company offer same day and next hour delivery. We are the creators of the route optimization engine that both FedEx and USPS are using on production today. We increase profit per delivery by 15% and optimize thousands of deliveries in seconds using 30X faster algorithms. The route optimization software market size is at $5B as of 2020 and growing 20% YoY. We have launched for 3 months already at 200k ARR with 5 live clients and many more in sales pipeline. We are targeting $1.2m ARR by end of 2021.
one_liner: World's fastest and most optimal route optimization engine

name: Veera Health
long_description:
Veera Health is helping 110M women in India get treated for Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS).  Our app combines evidence-backed therapy with coaching & specialist support for a subscription fee.

PCOS is the most common cause of infertility in women, and can lead to diabetes, depression and cancer. Patients spend up to 10 years and thousands of rupees searching for the right treatment, yet 90% are dissatisfied with existing options. With our program, 85% patients report feeling "in control" of their PCOS after just 1 month and are 4-times more likely to complete treatment.

The founders, Shobhita (COO) and Shashwata (CEO) got an inside view into this massive need when the former was diagnosed with PCOS. Shashwata studied data science at Yale University, holds an MBA from Wharton, and helped grow Fortune 100 and growth-stage consumer health / product companies at McKinsey. Shobhita studied Biology & Psychology at Tufts University and has worked with leading healthcare companies, such as GlaxoSmithKline, Accenture Life Sciences & UnitedHealth.
one_liner: We treat women with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome in India

You can read more here: https://blog.lighttwist.io/p/introducing-lighttwist

name: Coderhouse
long_description:
A web app that offers live online courses in programming, design, data, online marketing and more.

Our courses are nearly as affordable as online Moocs (~$40 a month) and as effective as Bootcamps. We achieve this by running 100 person live classes with one expert professor and one mentor per 15 students. Every class, students need to turn in assignments that are corrected by their mentors and at the end of the course they need to turn in and approve a final project. We also help our selected students with careers services such as mockup interviews, Linkedin enhancement, and more. All of this creates a level of accountability that allows us to achieve really low churn levels (<9%).

Our career tracks last between 9-11 months and we give our selected students their money back in case they don't get a job 6 months after they are done with the course.
one_liner: Effective and accessible online live education.

Datrics helps companies build and deploy machine learning models without writing code. For instance, one of our customers is a digital bank that developed a new risk model using just our drag and drop interface.

Datrics requires no installation or coding skills and allows data analysts or other non-programmers to build and launch machine learning models in a few clicks.
Helps to automate the ELT process in a visual way.

Aimed to help companies that currently:
* Have a need to roll-out analytics or machine learning solution FAST, but are limited with time or in-house expertise
* Spending a lot of time on reports or spreadsheet routines, lacking collaboration and automation functionality
* Want to use available templates or pre-built solutions, including Risk modeling, Demand Forecasting, Sales Analytics, and Predictive Maintenance.

We're big believers in the power of Machine learning and self-service analytics, and Datrics built to support the democratization of it!

Greywing is a platform for ship operators to automate their business, through actionable intelligence, better data and communication.

Greywing today serves three product lines to customers:

*Flotilla* is a monitoring tool for vessels, enabling vessel managers to identify fleet-level patterns and optimizations and to identify risk and liability vectors in advance.

*CRY4* is an operational tool for individual vessels that allows crew managers, security officers and masters to gather intelligence about a vessels current or proposed route, making decisions about the safest and the cheapest ports of call that a vessel can be directed to.

*Landfall* is a crew management and analysis system to provide risk reporting and detailed editing capabilities about the crew on-board a vessel.

*Semaphore* is a port-agent communications tool meant to simplify the process of interfacing with large numbers of port agents while planning a port call.
one_liner: The Operating System for Maritime

Patients submit their problems and requests on Anima instead of waiting for an appointment, and Anima sends an actionable report to their provider with trends, risks and recommendations, allowing most cases to be resolved within hours, without the need for further information gathering.

By 2030, most of the US workforce will freelance.  We enable students at the beginning of their work-life to start and grow their own freelance businesses while still in school.

In the past 12 months, we've expanded to 850 colleges, helped students earn more than $500,000, and raised $3mm in VC funding. 

We're building a network that empowers college talent to hone their skills without having to take on unpaid work, creating a platform they will use even after they graduate.

name: Udhaar App
long_description:
We are a simple book-keeping app, to help 30M micro SMEs run their finances digitally.

I was visiting Pakistan. 1-day, asked our local store owner on plans for his next location. His response, 'never'. 

Since business operations & money flow are manual, he worked 16 hours / 7 days to minimize theft. Zero time with family. We got obsessed with identifying how we can help small business owners run their business and have a life. 

Everything in Pakistan is manual, store credit, sales, purchasing inventory, cash management, tax filings, payments, etc.

This idea got us hooked as it allows us to build a large company and have a huge impact on ~30M small businesses in Pakistan that contribute 74% of the overall GDP.

Explosion in 4G adoption (91M 4G subscribers, 720% growth in 5 years), is helping drive product market fit:
i. >1M downloads
ii. 4.6 star rating on Playstore & Appstore
iii. MAUs & GTV: get in touch :)

name: Orbillion Bio
long_description:
Intro to Orbillion Bio: https://youtu.be/Rql0eteqQ-o

Orbillion Bio will be the first company to bring premium lab grown meat to the market. We will replace prime beef and wagyu with an ethical alternative that tastes amazing. The founders Patricia Bubner, PhD, Samet Yildirim, MSc, MBS and Gabriel Levesque-Tremblay, PhD have over 30 years of combined experience in business and product development, bioprocessing and biopharma. After only 4 months of development time, Orbillion has four different flavorful meats growing in the lab: wagyu beef, elk, sheep and American bison. Using their proprietary platform technology, Orbillion is rapidly decreasing the cost of cultivated meat. Major investors in our pre seed round were Y Combinator, New Protein Fund, Joyance Partners and Venture Souq. https://www.orbillion.com/
one_liner: Premium cultivated meat at low cost

name: Dashlabs.ai
long_description: Dashlabs.ai provides DIY lab software. We focus on small and mid-sized labs in emerging markets that still do manual processes, and don’t have access to good lab software.
one_liner: Lab software for emerging markets

name: Prescribe
long_description: Hospitals are seeing at least 50% reduction in their revenues and we're helping them earn more by taking them online through WhatsApp. We set up a WhatsApp chatbot for each hospital through which their patients can book consultations, order medicines, and avail other services. Hospitals can manage patients through our admin dashboard and doctors can consult patients through our doctor dashboard.
one_liner: Prescribe helps doctor's offices in India run their business online.

name: Fintoc
long_description:
Fintoc is Plaid for LATAM. We enable developers to initiate bank transfers and pull transactional data from their users' bank accounts. 

Whether an app wants to automate bank reconciliation, improve its underwriting process or simplify user onboarding, Fintoc is the way to go in Latin America.
one_liner: Plaid for LATAM

name: Superpowered
one_liner: Manage your meetings and messages in one click.

name: Alinea
long_description: Alinea is an investing app for GenZs who want to understand the companies they are investing in. We explain how each company makes money, how they treat their stakeholders, and their environmental impact on the world so customers can buy stock in companies they believe in.
one_liner: The Smart Next Gen Investing App 💫

name: Lendflow
long_description: We help companies embed lending services into their software so they can better serve their customers by helping them access capital, increase engagement in their product, improve retention and expand their revenue per user.
one_liner: Embedded lending infrastructure for software companies

name: Parsagon
long_description: Parsagon writes optimized code to transform data. Researchers and data scientists use us to create data pipelines that run 3 times faster in a quarter of the time.
one_liner: Developer tool for data pipelines
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Emerge Tools
long_description: Emerge is helping teams like Dropbox build better mobile apps. Emerge Tools provides actionable insights to help instantly reduce app size, while enabling continuous monitoring to help developers write smaller, better code by profiling binary size on every pull request.
one_liner: Build mobile better
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Pry Financials
long_description:
Pry makes it simple for companies to manage their budget, hiring plan, financial models, and cash runway.

Today, most people plan for their business once a quarter. It's done in Excel - buggy, boring, confusing, and really time-expensive. A lot of people have tried to solve this and only found moderate success or failed.

We're the team to do it right.
one_liner: Finance for Founders
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Juniper
long_description: We're building behavioral health practice management software that solves the logistical pain points many clinics have today and helps them scale in the future. Essentially, our solution is an IT backbone that seamlessly integrates everything from patient onboarding to billing and everything in between, with an emphasis on integration with 3rd-party apps -- replacing the manual effort that clinicians waste time on today.
one_liner: Software stack for behavioral health, starting with autism

name: Aviron Interactive
long_description: Aviron is Peloton with fully animated multiplayer video games for rowing
one_liner: Aviron is Peloton with fully animated video games for rowing

name: Promoted.ai
long_description:
Promoted matches buyers to sellers in marketplace search. Buyers find what they want better and buy more. Sellers see immediate feedback about how they appear in search and get tools to improve sales, like performance ads.

Our solutions include:

- Delivery: real-time ML, indexing, search and feed ranking, auction, and pricing 
- Metrics: real-time event ingestion and aggregation for seller metric reporting 
- Manager: self-service reporting and manger tool with white-label UI and API

We're the backend-for-your-backend. We specialize in enterprise-scale backend solutions that can be scaled down for startups and scaled up as they grow. We go beyond MVP product recommendations and integrate with in-house solutions. We work with web and mobile and any format, including video, to optimize search, feed, and recommendations.
one_liner: Discovery and Performance Ads for Marketplaces

name: FifthTry
long_description: FifthTry is a Notion-like documentation tool designed to end documentation rot. We integrate with GitHub and block code changes from getting deployed till documentation has been updated and approved. We call this Continuous Documentation.
one_liner: Continuous Documentation To End Documentation Rot

name: June
long_description: June is instant product analytics. We automatically generate graphs of the metrics you should track - just connect your Segment account. We allow every startup to track their metrics the same way companies like Airbnb, Facebook and Slack do.
one_liner: June is instant product analytics.

name: Per Diem
long_description: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online.
one_liner: Local subscriptions made easy

name: OctiFi
long_description: We empower commerce with instant 0% interest loans for responsible spenders.  Consumers can now renovate their dream homes or buy furniture online with an extended budget and pay later at no extra cost.
one_liner: Buy Now Pay Later for Southeast Asia

name: Firstbase.io
long_description:
Firstbase is building an all-in-one Company OS to help define how founders across the globe launch, manage and grow their businesses.

More than 10,000 founders from over 175 countries have used our product, Firstbase Start, to launch their startup. For many founders, "firstbase.io" has become what they type into their address bars when they think about incorporating a business.
one_liner: All in one Company OS

name: Bimaplan
long_description:
Bimaplan is an affordable insurance platform for the next billion Indians.

Our vision is to provide financial security to 150 million vulnerable households through contextual life and health insurance products. The growth in mobile penetration and the evolution of digital infrastructure in India has now made it possible to reach this vulnerable population. This is an $8 billion addressable market.

We launched in February 2021, and went live with one insurance underwriting partner. We are on track to sell 1,000 policies in March 2021. We are backed by some of the best early stage technology investors, successful fintech founders, and insurance industry veterans.

The company is founded by Vikul Goyal, a second-time founder with a successful exit track record. His previous venture, Carcrew, was acquired by TVS Group, a large automotive conglomerate in India.
one_liner: Affordable insurance for the next billion Indians

name: Bueno Finance
long_description: Credit building platform for next billion users. We offer digital credit card over UPI
one_liner: Building Chime for India

name: Version Story
long_description:
Version Story is a document comparison and version management tool for lawyers. 

Demo video: https://youtu.be/Hzk-JpMuhfA 

It enables lawyers to view their document history as a visual map with lines connecting versions that, when clicked, display a redline comparison of the changes made. 

In lieu of confusing email chains, Version Stories may be shared with colleagues to provide a concise summary of a brief or contract's version history.
one_liner: Git for lawyers

name: Gridware
long_description: Gridware provides a grid monitoring system of sensors and software for the power distribution grid. The system centers around a low-cost hardware platform that is easily and permanently deployed to power poles. The platform detects and predicts faults that ignite wildfires, expedites repairs during a power outage, and helps utilities demonstrate risk reduction to regulators through comprehensive asset health profiles.
one_liner: Hardware + software to detect powerline failure and prevent wildfires.

name: FanPlay
long_description: A technical bootcamp in the Income Sharing Model. We train top tech talent with 0 upfront fee and place them across our partner companies. Also our program has a deep social impact. We  provide special assistance to women and unemployed youth in India- both economically and socially.
one_liner: Lambda School for India

name: Expent Inc
long_description: Expent is a marketplace that accelerates software procurement for teams, while giving organizations control over the entire purchasing process.
one_liner: Procure the right software 5x faster

name: Faction
long_description:
Faction develops driverless vehicles that have the speed and performance of cars, but at the cost of a motorcycle.  We do driverless combined with remote human supervision, so we’re not gated by waiting for 100% autonomous technology.

Initially we’re focusing on micro delivery and vehicle-on-demand, where you can summon a vehicle and drive it yourself.

Faction prototypes are in operation now and we're preparing for on-road trials in Fall 2021.
one_liner: Driverless electric vehicles at a fraction of the cost of a car.

name: Remix
long_description: Remix has the audio chat you love from Clubhouse, with the socializing and mingling you miss from real-world meetups and events.
one_liner: Host and attend virtual events from your phone!

name: YourQuote
long_description: YourQuote is a social writing app that helps regular people share their short-form creative writing. Much like how Instagram has turned each one of us into a photographer, YourQuote has turned 2.5 million people in India into amateur writers.
one_liner: YourQuote is India's largest writing platform

name: Terapify
long_description:
Terapify is a video chat platform that easily and securely connects people who need psychological help with trusted psychologists who share their culture and language. 

Currently, people in more than 45 countries take therapy with us on a recurring basis every month.
one_liner: Online therapy platform for the Spanish-speaking market

name: Cyble
long_description: Cyble is an AI-powered cyber intelligence company that empowers organizations with darkweb & cybercrime monitoring and mitigation services
one_liner: Cyble empowers organizations with darkweb & cybercrime monitoring.

name: Noya
long_description: Noya captures CO2 from the sky and re-sells it for 2x cheaper than existing options. We do this by retrofitting existing industrial equipment like cooling towers and converting them into CO2 capture machines.
one_liner: Capturing CO2 from the sky and re-selling it for 2x cheaper

name: Axle Health
long_description: Axle Health enables telehealth companies, hospitals, insurance companies, and researchers to send nurses to their patients’ homes to administer physical services like blood draws and injections. Instead of going into a lab or doctor’s office, patients can now receive basic services at home.
one_liner: In-home Healthcare as a Service

name: Gradia Health
long_description: We help clinics improve throughput by sending timely information to patients' phones. For example, we send colonoscopy patients handcrafted instructions to help them arrive at the GI clinic prepared.
one_liner: We help clinics improve throughput by educating patients

name: Sivo
long_description:
Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API and risk protocol allows fintechs, neobanks, and gig platforms to lend money to their users, at scale, without having to raise debt which can take up to two years. You can think of us as Stripe for Debt. 

We started 6 months ago, in March signed a $100m debt capital partnership, and will be launching our API in April. We already have more than 100 companies in our customer pipeline including Uber. 

We’ve been able to move so quickly because we are a team with previous exits and decades of experience in risk, debt, and enterprise software for companies including Goldman Sachs, Revolut, NASA, McKinsey and Citigroup.
one_liner: Debt as a service for companies to lend money to their users at scale.

name: Charge Running
long_description:
Charge Running is a community for all runners. We host 20+ live virtual running classes and races per day, where runners join and run together from all over the world through a mobile app. Each class is hosted by a live, certified run coach, that tracks all participants' distances, paces, cadences, and interval summaries as they lead the runners via audio through effort-based run classes.

Each runner can chat with the coach and other participants of the run, as well as see in real-time the distance of every other runner, no matter where they run from. This creates an incredibly motivational experience. 

In addition to our daily lineup of classes, Charge hosts virtual races, partnering with race directors and charities to offer a virtual racing experience, with an in-person feel.
one_liner: Provides live, virtual running classes to runners all around the world

name: Flok
long_description: Flok is building Airbnb for corporate offsites. When the sales team at your remote-first company needs to meet in-person, they use Flok to book a hotel room block and then are connected to a third party event planner who will handle everything from travel logistics to itinerary creation.
one_liner: Building Airbnb for company offsites/retreats

name: Nebo
long_description: Nebo builds tools for companies to build UI faster and more collaboratively with less code.
one_liner: The visual builder for React
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Prequel
long_description: We set up and manage the entire data stack for fast-growing companies. We cover the full life-cycle: data extraction, warehousing, transformation, querying, and visualization. By abstracting out the infrastructure layer, we allow fast-moving teams to focus on what matters: generating insights and making better decisions.
one_liner: Fully managed modern data stack

name: Avenue
long_description:
Avenue is a simple way for business teams to set up alerts from their database or data warehouse. Think Datadog / PagerDuty for operations teams.

Operations teams create set-and-forget alerts on all their data, so they can be more proactive with their time (and monitor on more nuanced triggers than just what fits on their dashboard page).

Avenue can improve response times to critical problems from several days to real-time by alerting directly on the data sources that customers already use.
one_liner: Observability platform for operations teams

name: LiliumX
long_description:
Bispecific antibodies are the next breakthrough in cancer therapy, but current R&D is limited by a lack of scalable and flexible design platforms. 

LiliumX overcomes this limitation by using a modular protein platform, rapidly generating and testing thousands of candidate bispecifics using robotic screening and big data analysis to discover bispecific lead assets with entirely new modes of action.
one_liner: We discover new bispecific antibodies against cancer

name: Finary
long_description: Finary is a social investing platform for Gen Z. You can chat with friends about the market, discover new investing communities, and make trades with your brokerage.
one_liner: Discord for Investing.

name: ClipDrop
long_description:
ClipDrop is an app that turns regular mobile photos into professional product visuals.

Thanks to companies like Poshmark, Etsy and Ebay, there are now over 25M sellers who need great visuals for their shops but most of them don’t have access to a professional photographer or a design team. We replace all of this with our app available on mobile and desktop.

We’re a team of former Google, Facebook employees and Machine learning PhD’s and academic Professors. We believe that machine learning will bring professional photography and design to millions of businesses for a fraction of the cost.
one_liner: Turn regular mobile photos into professional product visuals

name: Fractional
one_liner: Social platform for fractional ownership of investment properties.

name: PingPong
long_description:
A video messaging app for remote teams in multiple time zones—it's like Slack for video.

With PingPong, teams collaborate by exchanging short video, voice, and screen recording clips.
one_liner: Video messaging app for remote teams.

name: CashBook
long_description:
CashBook is a cash accounting app for small businesses in India to record income and expenses. 
We launched 6 months ago and already have 200k monthly active users on our app, and growing 27% month over month. Last month our users recorded $500 million of cash transactions using cash book

India is still a cash-driven economy & home to 70M small businesses still recording their transactions on pen and paper.
one_liner: Cash Accounting App for Small Businesses in India
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Cord
long_description: Cord is building an algorithmic data labeling platform designed to automate manual annotation for computer vision. The company's suite of powerful tools allows for seamless collaboration across roles and teams, from domain-expert annotators to project managers and machine learning engineers, enabling data scientists and researchers to algorithmically solve the problem of annotating training data for machine learning applications.
one_liner: Automating data annotation for computer vision
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Segments.ai
long_description: We are building a data platform for computer vision. Much like Tesla's data engine approach, our customers can label images, visualize model predictions, identify failure cases, improve their datasets and all in an iterative manner. Our platform is inherently an infrastructural backbone to help build better computer vision models through iterative dataset debugging. Already now, our platform contains the best labeling technology for segmentation - give it a try at https://segments.ai !
one_liner: Build better computer vision models by building better datasets
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Axiom.ai
long_description:
Axiom is no-code browser automation. We enable non-coders to automate repetitive work, and new businesses to be built on top of websites that can't currently be automated. 

Where tools like Zapier automate with APIs, Axiom automates using the User Interface (UI) of web applications. Automation that act on keyboard and mouse input to the UI, is known as Robotic Process Automation, or RPA. 

RPA has been hugely successful on Enterprise desktops, with developer tools like UiPath valued at $33 billion. 

Axiom brings RPA to every business, in the browser.
one_liner: No-code Browser RPA

name: Tachyon
long_description: We offer developers APIs that make it fast and easy to transfer large amounts of data across the internet. We do this in two ways - with protocol optimization and a network of edge servers.
one_liner: APIs making big data transfer a breeze
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Pragmatic Leaders
long_description: Pragmatic Leaders runs online training programs in product management for mid-career professionals in India. We are a better, faster, and cost-effective alternative to getting an MBA in specialized tech business roles like product, growth, and marketing
one_liner: Better, faster and cost-effective alternative to MBA - free till hired

name: Zepto
long_description:
We deliver groceries in 10 minutes through a network of optimized of micro-warehouses or 'dark stores' that we build across cities.

We're a Series C Company, and we're aggressively looking for A+ Talent.
one_liner: 10-Minute Grocery Delivery in India

name: Smartcuts
long_description: Smartcuts is a Chrome extension that lets you automate anything in your browser, without code. Record your clicks and keystrokes, and replay them later on similar web pages to automate repetitive work. It's like Excel macros for any website.
one_liner: Chrome extension to turn clicks & keystrokes into no-code automations

name: Weekday
long_description: We help companies hire by building a highly curated list of engineering candidates for them; crowdsourced by our network of software engineers who moonlight as “mini-recruiters” or scouts. Our product enables anyone to become that scout and earn passive income.
one_liner: Hire engineers vouched by other techies
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: BeWell Digital
long_description: Insurance regulatory compliance for India's 1.5mn hospitals, pharmacies, and labs.
one_liner: Inclusive and quality healthcare for all

name: Instamenu
long_description:
Instamenu is the new payments platform for restaurants. We are like the Starbucks app but for the entire $800B restaurant industry.

We charge the guest, not the restaurant, which allows us to save the restaurants money while making Instamenu between $20k and $100k per location.

Restaurants love us because we are easy to use and save them money.
Restaurant workers love us because they make more in tips with us.
Customers love us because we make the dine in experience easier and faster.
Investors love us because we are an experienced team fixing a problem in a huge market.
one_liner: A payment platform for the entire US $800B restaurant industry

name: Ennerate
long_description: Ennerate automates small business valuations. Automating valuations is done by customers uploading financial statements and being asked specific questions to generate projections. By cross-referencing inputs with industry data and learning economic trends using historical data, we are able to generate valuations for small businesses. Ennerate makes small business valuation credible, easy, timely, and affordable.
one_liner: Automating business valuations catered to SMBs
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Fountain9
long_description:
Fountain9 is a predictive inventory planning solution. We help food brands and retailers reduce food wastage and improve product availability by predicting their future inventory needs. 

Food wastage is a global problem that has both financial and environmental costs. An estimated $1.3 Bn tonnes of food is wasted every year and 7 - 15% of that is because of mismanaged inventory. 

We accurately predict future inventory imbalances which lead to out of stock situations or wastage, and also recommends best ways of minimising their impact. Our state of the art demand sensing and pricing engine takes into account several factors like historical sales trends, seasonality, holidays, markdown events and pricing changes to predict future inventory requirements and optimize prices. Predicted inventory demand is also aligned with supply side data to identify ideal suppliers and replenishment quantities that minimize chances of stock outs or inventory wastage.
one_liner: Helping food brands and retailers reduce food wastage

name: Spruce Systems, Inc.
long_description: Spruce provides an ecosystem of open source tools for developers that let users collect their data in one place that they control, and show their cards however they want. Spruce's solution enables limitless use cases across NFT creator authenticity, cross-chain reputation, private pools for DeFi, and even permissioned storage for DAOs.
one_liner: Spruce lets users control their data across the web.

name: Brick
long_description:
We're building the financial OS for general remodeling contractors that enables them to grow their business by offering the financial trust their customers demand. Our initial payments product enables general contractors to:

- offer standardized, low-cost initial deposit options for customers,
- access working capital on a project by project basis, and
- eliminate customer collections risks
one_liner: The financial operating system for general contractors

name: Clay
long_description: A realtime collaborative, web-based review tool for 3D models. It allows users to upload 3D assets, share a link to the 3D viewer, and receive comments and feedback in real-time.
one_liner: Figma for 3D design
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: CoVerified
long_description: CoVerified builds integrated software that uses COVID-19 test results, vaccine records and symptom data to verify real-time compliance and help organizations re-open safely.
one_liner: Using infection data to keep organizations safe

name: Krab
long_description: A lending platform that enables truckers/trucking companies with no formal credit score to access loans from banks. Our platform creates a rich credit profile of a trucking company by pulling 200+ data points from varied sources via consent APIs and instantly offers loans from multiple banking partners in less than 60 seconds. The trucking company can also use the same product for order management, invoice generation, vendor payments, and collections.
one_liner: Instant loans for trucking companies in India

name: Wyndly
long_description: Wyndly is fixing allergies. We give you lifelong allergy relief with personalized treatment and exceptional online care. We’re making an allergy-free life easy and accessible to the 60 million Americans who suffer from environmental allergies.
one_liner: Fixing allergies from home

name: Curvenote
long_description: At Curvenote we are building the Google Docs for scientists and engineers. In the future, every scientific report will feature interactive graphs with live data that will make it significantly easier to share and reproduce the work.
one_liner: Google Docs for scientists and engineers

name: JoinSub
long_description:
We, at JoinSub, are empowering the Indian small and medium retailers to drive repeat purchases & maximize their revenue by building a subscription-based model. 

India has over 14 million retail outlets, and we are poised to revolutionize the Retail Sector and enhance the buying experience both for retailers and consumers. We are dedicated to co-creating a community of futuristic retailers who are ready to embrace tech for growth.

Our Subscription Programs work wonderfully for everyone who is looking to drive repurchases, right from those in the F&B industry, to Salons, Nail Salons, Spas, Gyms, Yoga & Dance Studios, Coffee Shops, Bakeries, Dry Cleaners, Florists, etc. We can help you delight your consumers and accelerate your business, the JoinSub Way!
one_liner: India's first aggregator and provider of local business subscriptions

name: Aspen Cloud
one_liner: Use web apps without opening a browser

name: Bluelight
long_description: Bluelight is a financial data and analytics company. We help companies and investors manage their financial data, metrics, reporting, and growth plans.
one_liner: Bluelight is a financial data and analytics company.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Gerald Technologies, Inc
long_description: Gerald is on a mission to eliminate stress about paying bills. We are transforming bill payments by providing consumers with an application for linking and automatically paying their household bills while offering overdraft and late fee protection for all their biller accounts. Our app tracks and pays bills so our users don’t have to. We offer banking services; direct deposits, credit building, cash advance and rewards to simplify bill payments for both billers accounts and consumers.
one_liner: Autopay household bills without fear of overdraft or late fees

name: Queenly
long_description:
We help women of all ages and all sizes find the exact dress they’re looking for (and resell it after!). Live on iOS, Android and our web app (queenly.com). 

Backed and/or advised by the former CTO of Uber, CPO of Uber, COO of Stitch Fix, CEO of Lambda School, CEO of Mercari, CEO of FitBit, Head of ML at Pinterest, Head of Strategy at Pinterest, COO of Walmart.com & Samsclub.com, and more.
one_liner: Leading marketplace for formalwear

name: Moichor
long_description: Moichor is a team of biologists and data scientists building AI-powered software to provide veterinary clinics with actionable insights.
one_liner: Automated complete blood counts for vet clinics

name: Debrief
long_description: Debrief converts your recordings into transcribable, searchable, and easy to browse content so everyone stays aligned. Users can automatically upload and organize their recordings in one central place, making it accessible and searchable to the right teams at any time.
one_liner: Organize, transcribe, collaborate and share recordings.

name: Furmacy
one_liner: PillPack for Pets

name: Lion Pose
long_description: Lion Pose is the only clean and clinically-backed skincare brand targeting people of color (Black, Hispanic, Indian, Asian skin). Our two hero products include a hyperpigmentation serum and zinc-based mineral sunscreen that treat and protect against acne scars and discoloration. Hyperpigmentation affects over 50% of people of color.
one_liner: Clean and clinical skincare for people of color

name: Pibit.ai
long_description: Pibit.ai converts any paper documents (invoices, medical records, IDs, statements etc) into structured data using the merge of AI/ML + human-in-the-loop. Pibit.ai provides 100% automation to businesses that help them in making fast & accurate decisions.
one_liner: API to turn unstructured documents into structured data.

name: GroMo
long_description:
GroMo is an app for agents to sell Insurance in India. 
We help India’s 4M Independent Insurance agents to acquire new customers and manage existing customers efficiently.
one_liner: App for independent agents to sell Insurance in India

name: ModernLoop
long_description: ModernLoop helps every team and company deliver the best candidate experience by automating and streamlining their recruiting operations.
one_liner: ModernLoop helps teams automate and streamline recruiting operations
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Unfurl
long_description: Unfurl is a ghost kitchen, but instead of having one type of food we enable families to order many types of food all in one order. Think of it as an upscale food court where you and your kids can order from 8-15 different restaurants all at once.
one_liner: A virtual food hall that delivers

name: Zerobroker
long_description: We’re building the best logistics system to empower businesses globally to automate their supply chain processes and ship all their products broker-free.
one_liner: Broker-free shipping platform for businesses.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Gigs Live
long_description: We are the Substack for millions of artists, musicians, indie producers, extreme sports athletes and video production companies. With us, creators have the freedom to choose flexible monetization plans such as PPV, micro-subscriptions, merch drops and many more.   Creators choose us because our platform is available in 4K on Apple TV, Roku, Amazon Fire, Gaming consoles and more. Creators also get audience analytics and marketing to retain and acquire their audience. So take care of marketing, distribution and monetization for creators so they can focus on their craft and we take care of the rest.
one_liner: Video publishing and monetization platform for creators and artists

name: Pensil
one_liner: We help YouTube teachers in India monetize their courses

name: SigNoz
long_description: SigNoz is an open source alternative to DataDog, NewRelic. We help developers monitor their applications and troubleshoot any problem.
one_liner: Open source alternative to DataDog

name: PowerRouter
long_description: PowerRouter helps sales teams assign leads and contacts to the right reps, instantly within Salesforce.  We provide a powerful automation engine with a drag and drop canvas to create routing rules, visually.  With actionable metrics to increase speed-to-lead and account based sales support, we make it very simple to stay on top of every lead in your Salesforce CRM.
one_liner: PowerRouter helps sales teams with lead routing in Salesforce

name: Stacksi
long_description:
Stacksi helps companies automate the process of answering enterprise security questionnaires so they can close deals faster and save their best engineers’ time for more strategic projects.
Salespeople, CTOs, and CEOs of fast-growing enterprise startups can upload security questionnaires into our system. If the company already has written security policies, they can upload those documents, too. From there, Stacksi parses their documents, identifies gaps in their security policies vs. standards, and helps them establish a successful security program. 
Ultimately, we will help them 1) automate completion of security questionnaires, 2) quickly get through enterprise security audits and 3) improve their security posture.
one_liner: Automated Answers to Security Questionnaires

name: Hapi
long_description:
Hapi democratizes the access to the US stock market to consumers in Latam. 
Users can easily register, transfer the funds they want to invest, trade stocks in real time with no commissions,  follow up their investments with all the relevant information, and thus generate returns!
one_liner: Stock trading app with zero commission and no minimums for Latam

name: Finley
long_description: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps companies like Ramp automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers. Our team brings experience from Goldman Sachs, Nova Credit, and Palantir Technologies, and is backed by Y Combinator and Bain Capital Ventures.
one_liner: Streamline your debt capital raise and management

name: Spokn
long_description: Spokn is a podcasting platform for work. We help companies like Podium, Mixpanel and Superhuman improve their internal comms, employee engagement, and learning through a format their employees love: audio.
one_liner: Podcasting platform for work

name: Marketbase
long_description:
We are building software for the next generation of marketplaces. We make it easy for anyone to start and scale a marketplace business online.

Our founders have over 15 years of experience working on online marketplaces (1 acquired), global SaaS companies, large-scale communities, and payments infrastructure at Stripe and Finix Payments.
one_liner: Powering the next generation of marketplaces

name: SBX Robotics
long_description:
SBX Robotics generates synthetic data that teaches robots to see. We use simulation software to create training data 10x faster and cheaper than annotation services or in-house teams. 

Instead of being blocked on data, our clients send 25 images from their robot’s camera, and receive 25,000 perfectly labeled synthetic training images. SBX data is ready to be used by deep learning computer vision models.
one_liner: Synthetic data for robot vision.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: MedMe Health
long_description:
MedMe Health builds software for pharmacists to deliver paid clinical services like prescribing/adapting medications, point-of-care testing, giving vaccinations, and monitoring chronic conditions.  

Our web-based platform helps both independent pharmacies and large chains schedule appointments online, conduct virtual care, automate documentation, and flag clinical opportunities. With MedMe, our customers have increased their efficiency of clinical service delivery by 10x and increased pharmacy revenue with the same staff.

For the first time, MedMe enables integrations to traditionally locally-stored pharmacy data. Our vision is to transform today’s dispensing locations to tomorrow’s health hubs.
one_liner: Software for pharmacies to move beyond dispensing

name: Taloflow
long_description: Taloflow is a buying insights platform for the tech stack. We help CTOs at digital native companies pick the best cloud infrastructure and API products for their specific use case, saving them weeks of soul-sucking analysis and costly mistakes for every big decision they make.
one_liner: Buying insights platform for the tech stack
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Quadrant Eye
long_description:
Quadrant Eye is on a mission to improve eyecare access and fight preventable blindness. We're building the next generation eye exam... inside the average American home. 

V1 of our eye exam allows patients to renew their glasses and contact lens prescriptions online. V_final will be an end-to-end exam that can remotely detect eye abnormalities. 

Our team wants to enable patients' best and most visually rich lives. To this end, we're looking for curious and nimble minds to help us develop the world's first at-home eye exam and ultimately deliver high-quality eyecare at scale.

Some QE highlights:

🐝 We're a team of renegades: ex-founders, surgeons, scientists, digital nomads, and polymath hackers.
💸 Our backers include Y Combinator, Khosla Ventures, and the creator of Google Image Search.
🍥 We're a mission-driven company tackling an eye health market worth $USD137B.
💵  Revenue isn't our main metric right now, but it did double last month!
🌟 Our core focus in the coming months is the development of patentable deep tech.
one_liner: Enabling at-home eyecare.

name: Snazzy
long_description: Snazzy is a direct-to-consumer teledentistry platform for teeth straightening. Our goal is to democratize access to affordable and accessible clear aligner treatment. We leverage teledentistry and offer the highest quality aligners at a fraction of what others charge.
one_liner: Making clear aligners accessible and affordable in India

name: Austin Software
long_description:
Build your team in Latin America as a service.

We create teams of LATAM developers for product companies in the US, enabling US companies to scale their engineering departments in US time zones.

Tell us the team size and skills you need and we’ll recruit and pre-vet candidates. If you love them, we’ll employ them in one of our Silicon Valley style offices in LATAM. Our offices are communities with local success managers, your local representative, making sure your team has everything they need including dev friendly perks like mentors, Macbooks, and community events. 

We include everything you need to build and retain a team of long term product stakeholders for your company. You want missionaries, not mercenaries.

There are no startup fees, no recruiting fees, no cancellation fees and no contract obligations. Just pay a weekly flat rate, cancel any time. We'll take care of  the international logistics of payroll, taxes, IP laws, and all local compliance.

We have class-A offices in cities across LATAM, with a focus on building developer communities in untapped markets. We get to know and attract the local tech contributors, and through community network effects and word of mouth, one great teammate turns into three! Then we provide them with everything they need so that you can extend your team’s engineering culture around the world.
one_liner: We help US tech companies hire and manage software engineers in LATAM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: DreamWorld
long_description: DreamWorld is the massive digital world where everyone creates together. Think Minecraft or Roblox, a platform where players create, except one immersive social world.
one_liner: the game where everyone creates together.

name: Playmaker
long_description: We're building the social, infrastructure layer for players of fantasy sports games, to provide them with a centralised place where they can own their identity as a fantasy sports player and get additional enjoyment and engagement out of watching live sports alongside their friends.
one_liner: Community for fantasy sports players

name: Albedo
long_description: Albedo is building a constellation of satellites that will capture both visible and thermal imagery simultaneously, at a resolution 9x higher than the best available today.  This novel dataset will enable commercial applications that, until now, have been limited due to the lack of affordability, timeliness, and spatial resolution required for the majority of imagery applications.  Our low cost approach will commoditize ultra high resolution imagery, enabling this data source to become as core to society as GPS.
one_liner: Capturing the highest resolution satellite imagery

name: Humaans
long_description:
Humaans is an HRIS system designed to help People Ops/Finance/IT teams operate collaboratively with all the best in class point solutions they want for their staff while maintaining a central record of employee data.

The goal is to automate the employee lifecycle by integrating deeply with other complementary solutions and turn complex/manual processes (e.g. onboarding, offboarding, compensation management, etc) into simple workflows.
one_liner: The fastest way to onboard and manage employees
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: authzed
long_description:
SpiceDB is a database system for managing security-critical permissions checking.

SpiceDB acts as a centralized service that stores authorization data. Once stored, data can be performantly queried to answer questions such as "Does this user have access to this resource?" and "What are all the resources this user has access to?".

Authzed operates the globally available, serverless database platform for SpiceDB.
one_liner: A globally available, serverless platform for SpiceDB.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Alba Orbital
long_description: Alba Orbital are building the worlds largest earth observation constellation, imaging everywhere on earth, every 15 minutes. We can see events within minutes such as wild fires in real time and have signed $41m of LOIs in the last month. To date we have launched 6 satellites into orbit (more than all other YC Companies combined), with another 9 launching in Q2 2021 via SpaceX. Our imaging satellites called Unicorns are the worlds most advanced satellite under 1kg ever flown in orbit.
one_liner: We make satellites to image everywhere on Earth, every 15 minutes

name: oxio
one_liner: building the first global digital ISP

name: The Third Place
one_liner: Subscriptions for neighborhood businesses

name: Trestle Biotherapeutics
long_description: We are developing an implantable therapeutic tissue that will be surgically delivered to patients suffering from end stage renal disease.  Upon implantation, this tissue will supplement the patient's renal function, eliminating their dependency on dialysis and improving their disease status. This has the potential to not only get these patients off dialysis - a significant impact for them and their families - but to greatly extend the time required before kidney transplantation is essential.
one_liner: Bioengineered kidneys for patients with kidney failure

name: Bristle
one_liner: Reinventing oral health & care

name: cloud humans
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
long_description: Cloud Humans is a managed marketplace leveraging the gig economy for services typically outsourced to BPOs (call center). When tech companies want to build or grow a sales team, instead of hiring the team or outsourcing to a traditional BPO, they can outsource directly to talented independent professionals whose incentive is fully aligned with the companies' interests. While the cost is very similar, the quality increases as a company can bring people earning, on average, 2-4 times more than they would otherwise.

name: Neverland
long_description: Neverland is the first marketplace that connect buyers of everything needed for indoor and outdoor gardening with the 24,000 shops across the US. Neverland is taking this offline category online starting with this $26B market.

name: Runway
one_liner: Easier and more reliable mobile app releases for teams.

name: Atrato
long_description:
Atrato is Affirm for Latin America. We let consumers pay for purchases in up to 24 monthly installments without a credit card. 

We are live in Mexico with +110 online and offline merchants, including global brands and growing our GMV +45% month over month.
one_liner: Affirm for LATAM

name: Abacum
long_description: Abacum, is a SaaS platform, which makes is it easy for finance teams to use real-time data, generate reports and collaborate. We have been defined as the notion of finance.

name: Chums

name: Gonddo
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil

With gonddo, retailers can find fresh products, discover new brands and easily connect with wholesalers

name: Webiny
long_description:
When the public cloud appeared migration was easy. Existing apps running on physical servers could just be moved to virtual machines running in the cloud. The cloud is now moving towards serverless, and serverless is not backward compatible. New tools need to be created and existing apps need to be rewritten. Webiny provides developers with everything they need to build those serverless apps.

We are a 100% remote team.
one_liner: Open-source framework for building serverless applications
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

name: Degrees of Freedom
long_description: Degrees of Freedom offers a high-quality, low-cost degree, by blending virtual and traditional college models. Our students learn on-campus, and online on-line, and in-VR from diverse Ivy League professors and master teachers-- all at the cost of the Pell Grant
one_liner: DoF provides a high quality, affordable higher education alternative.

name: Observa
one_liner: Catch accidental database exposures before the bad guys

name: Scribd

Read and listen without limits. Unlimited* audiobooks, ebooks, and magazines, available anytime and on any device for only $9/ month.

We make it easy for readers to stay informed, discover new passions, and become their best selves. Scribd’s impressive library includes over one million bestselling and award-winning books and audiobooks from the largest global publishers, and articles from leading magazines and newspapers like The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Newsweek. 

No matter what you’re looking for, Scribd is the only reading subscription you need.

Scribd has more than 100 million active users every month and more than 700,000 paying subscribers.

With games on multiple social networks as well as its own destination site, the company is recognized as a leader in creating real-time game experiences. Based in New York City, OMGPOP is funded by Spark Capital and Bessemer Venture Partners.

You can download Smartr for Gmail, Android or iPhone; and Xobni for Outlook and BlackBerry - or connect them all with Xobni Pro.

Users can send mass messages on any of the platforms and JumpChat will send it to the platform the receiver activates. They are currently focusing on mass mobile messaging, where users can shoot off mass messages to the groups they define.

name: PagerDuty
long_description: PagerDuty is an operations performance platform delivering visibility and actionable intelligence across the entire incident lifecycle. Their SaaS-based solution empowers over 10,000 small, mid-size and enterprise global customers such as Comcast, eHarmony, Slack and Lululemon with the insight to intelligently respond to critical disruptions for exceptional customer experience. PagerDuty was founded to deliver a new and innovative approach to increase business response and efficiency. When brand reputation depends on customer satisfaction, PagerDuty arms businesses with the insight to proactively manage incidents and events that may impact customers across their IT environment.

name: Presto
long_description:
Presto, developers of the PrestoPrime™ EMV Terminal and Presto EMV System, leads the table-top dining revolution with its guest-facing, pay-at-the-table, e-commerce system. Installed in over 1,800 restaurants across the nation, including Applebee’s (a division of DineEquity, NYSE:DINE) and selected Outback Steakhouse Restaurants (a division of Bloomin’ Brands, Inc., Nasdaq: BLMN), the Presto System enables restaurant guests to take greater control over their dining experience by allowing them to order from a full menu, play exciting interactive games, and pay their bill directly from the table. The PrestoPrime EMV Terminal also provides operational and financial benefits to restaurant operators which drives increased profitability, and unlocks restaurant data that was previously inaccessible, enabling smarter decisions around guest satisfaction. Presto’s new dual processor, secure PrestoPrime EMV system is software compatible with the current generation Presto System - more than 90,000 of which are at work every day in more than 1,800 restaurants across the United States - and includes twice the memory and four times the flash storage of the current generation, and a securely partitioned payment module that enables point-to-point encryption (P2PE) security, EMV, and multiple forms of payment, including PIN-entry payment, Magstripe, and NFC capability for contactless payment systems such as Apple Pay and Samsung Pay.

Collapse
one_liner: Tools to streamline, optimize, and improve the restaurant experience.

name: FutureAdvisor
long_description:
FutureAdvisor is an award-winning digital wealth management firm serving client households nationwide from our offices in San Francisco. We use software to power a wealth management experience accessible to everyone, at less than half the price charged by traditional firms. Our clients are the mass-affluent investors underserved by traditional financial advisory and wealth management firms.  

FutureAdvisor is leading a shift in financial services towards transparency, convenience and inclusion.

FutureAdvisor is looking for engineers to help build better portfolio management tools for everyone. Our unbiased financial advice is giving middle- and working-class families powerful tools they never had access to before, and they're free. If our mission strikes a chord with you, please send us your resume: https://www.futureadvisor.com/jobs

name: WorkFlowy
long_description: WorkFlowy is a tool for organizing your brain. It provides a powerful interface for hierarchical lists. People use it as a replacement for text editors and spreadsheets as organizational tools. They leave it open all day and put whatever passes through their brain in it - project plans, to-do's, meeting notes, brainstorms, etc..
one_liner: WorkFlowy is a better way to manage information. It provides a simple…

name: inDinero
long_description:
inDinero is on a mission to reinvent small business operations, helping our clients understand their finances like never before.

By combining a full finance team of bookkeepers, accountants, and CPA’s, with real time accounting software, we provide startups and small businesses the knowledge they need to understand their company's financial health and make better decisions with their money. Tax experts work with accountants under one roof to prepare and file our clients'​ taxes and maximize tax savings.

We're a growing company with big ambitions and big opportunities for internal mobility. If you’re interested in one of our open positions and looking for your next big professional adventure, drop us a line at jobs@indinero.com.
one_liner: Financial dashboard for businesses.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Docker
long_description: Docker is the world’s leading software container platform. Developers use Docker to eliminate “works on my machine” problems when collaborating on code with co-workers. Operators use Docker to run and manage apps side-by-side in isolated containers to get better compute density. Enterprises use Docker to build agile software delivery pipelines to ship new features faster, more securely and with confidence for both Linux and Windows Server apps.

name: AnyList

one_liner: The best way to create and share a grocery shopping list and organize…

name: DemandSphere
long_description: DemandSphere, formerly GinzaMetrics, is an enterprise SEO and marketing intelligence platform for brands, organizations, and agencies.

name: Recurse Center

name: AdGrok

name: Whereoscope
long_description:
Whereoscope is a service designed to help parents keep know where their kids are.

Whereoscope uses smartphones and an intelligent sampling algorithm to provide the best possible accuracy without draining the battery.

Whereoscope enables location-based geo-fencing so that parents can know when their kids arrive at school, leave soccer practice, or are just about to get home.
one_liner: Location-aware smartphone application that enables parents to keep…

name: Fridge
long_description:
The Fridge is a platform for lightweight single serving social networks for the functionality of Facebook without being on Facebook.

The Fridge makes private conversation, media, and event sharing dead simple. The Fridge is like Tumblr for social networks. Anyone can easily create shared spaces, invite their friends and socialize/share photos, videos, music, and more.

The Fridge reinvents how groups interact online allowing users to cut through the clutter of their social graph and create lightweight targeted spaces for personal and private relationships, special interest groups or clubs, or any temporary network around events, gatherings or nights out on the town...
one_liner: Disposable social networks.

name: Fanvibe
long_description:
Check-in to games to chat and trash-talk with friends who are also watching. Get scores and breaking news sent straight to your iPhone. Fanvibe covers the NBA, NFL, MLB, NHL, college basketball, college football, and the English Premier League.

Fanvibe Features Include:

-Your Sports Pulse: A custom feed with news, scores and your friendsâ€™ activity.

-Game Check-Ins: Tell your friends what youâ€™re watching and see what games your friends are watching. Never ask, â€œDid you see that game?â€ again!

-Personalized Scoreboard: Real-time scores, live game details, alerts and score updates.

-Favorites: Get news and scores for your favorite teams sent straight to your iPhone or iPod touch.

-Friend Finder: Find your friends easily by searching Facebook, Twitter and your address book.

Coming soon: March Madness brackets and World Cup coverage, Cricket, Golf and Tennis.

About Fanvibe

Fanvibe for the iPhone / iPod Touch is the first product from We The Fan, a company dedicated to building new sports products built by and for the sports fan.

name: Leftronic

Leftronic is a Y Combinator-funded company that develops a web-based real-time dashboard application for monitoring a company's most important data.

Leftronic business dashboards retrieve a company's metrics from popular services such as Google Analytics, Twitter, Zendesk and others, as well as receive custom metrics through a super-simple API. The dashboards update in real-time and are designed for large screens. This makes it easy for teams to monitor their company's critical metrics.
one_liner: Business dashboards

name: GazeHawk
long_description: GazeHawk provides low-cost eye tracking technology for use in usability studies and ad evaluation.  Our proprietary technology allows us to use ordinary webcams to run studies.  This enables in-home eye tracking, as well as fast, affordable large-scale studies.http://www.gazehawk.com/

name: 1000Memories

name: Homejoy
long_description:
Homejoy believes everyone deserves a happy home. With just a few clicks, Homejoy will match you with an interviewed, background-checked and tested professional cleaner who maintains high customer ratings. Homejoy makes a sparkling home an affordable reality for many hard-working individuals. 

Founded by brother-sister duo Aaron and Adora Cheung, the Homejoy team includes long-time veterans of the hospitality industry and former owners of large cleaning companies. Head to homejoy.com now to view our range of programs and click through to a convenient, trusted, and affordable cleaning.

name: PadMapper
long_description:
PadMapper is a location-based apartment rental search engine with real-time filtering.

PadMapper's entire browsing interface is taken up by a full-screen map, and listings are loaded as the user moves around the map. Zooming into the map loads more listings in that area, zooming out broadens the search. Listings are filtered out or allowed back into the results as filter sliders are moved.

Apartment listings from hundreds of sites are included, including Craigslist, Apartments.com, ForRent.com, and Oodle.

name: AeroFS
long_description:
AeroFS enterprise file sync and share & collaboration solution deploys on your infrastructure. Your files remain secured by your own security protocols, removing the risk associated with relying on your vendors to secure your data.

The service has a Dropbox like user experience.  Now, both the end user and the IT team can both get what they are looking for out of a file sharing tool.

We are funded by some of Silicon Valley's best investors and entrepreneurs:

Avalon Ventures
A16Z Seed
YCombinator
SVAngel
Chris Sacca (Lowercase Capital)
Maynard Webb (COO eBay)
Jerry Yang (Founder Yahoo!)
Paul Buchheit (Founder FriendFeed)

We're hiring!  https://aerofs.com/company/careers

We're not just building a company; we're building a family. Many of us are new to the area, so company trips, get togethers, and BBQs are par for the course!

They released Simplenote as a showcase of this platform.

Rapportive shows you everything about your contacts right inside your inbox. 

You can immediately see what people look like, where they're based, and what they do. You can establish rapport by mentioning shared interests. You can grow your network by connecting on LinkedIn.

Imagine relationship management built into your email. For free.

name: Hipmunk
long_description:
Hipmunk is making travel planning simple and delightful. The site and mobile apps save you time by comparing top travel sites so you don't have to. The unique display makes it easy to visually compare results and choose what's best for you. Hipmunk brings in travel options ranging from commercial flights to trains to charter flights and accommodations ranging from large hotels to home and apartments rentals through Airbnb and Homeaway. Users can find less agonizing flights with the innovative flight search “Agony” sort, as well as the best hotels and home rentals with the hotel search “Ecstasy” sort. 

Hipmunk is one of TIME Magazine’s “50 Coolest Websites,” TIME Magazine’s “50 Best Smartphone Apps,” Travel + Leisure’s “Best Websites of 2012,” Budget Travel’s “Top 10 Most Useful Websites,” and Inc.’s “Best Booking Website.” Co-founders Adam Goldstein and Steve Huffman were named to Bloomberg BusinessWeek’s “Top Tech Entrepreneurs,” Forbes “30 Under 30” and Inc.’s “30 Under 30” lists. The company launched in 2010, is based in San Francisco, and has funding from IVP, Ignition Partners, Y Combinator, SV Angel, Webb Investment Network, Quest Hospitality Ventures, and several angel investors.
one_liner: Hipmunk takes the agony out of searching for flights, accommodations,…

name: Chartio
long_description: Chartio is a cloud-based data exploration solution for all. Easily connect your data and create powerful dashboards in minutes, without any SQL knowledge.
one_liner: Chartio is changing how companies work by building the best…

name: Koduco

name: Pribbit

name: Tapzilla
long_description:
TapZilla is a Y Combinator-backed company that launched October 13, 2010 and is taking the daily deal model and applying it to discounts on paid mobile apps.

Through TapZilla.com and AppRebates.com, the company has given out more than 25,000 paid applications to its users and has pioneered the method of connecting developers with users by giving away paid applications for free.

TapZilla has been featured by TechCrunch and Forbes.

Each day, TapZilla features a paid iOS app. To get the deal, the user clicks on the â€œget App Nowâ€ button, which will then prompt TapZilla to ask for your email. Users receive an email with a link to the app in the App Store where they can purchase the app and a coupon code.

Once the app is purchased and downloaded, users are prompted to enter the coupon code once inside the Appâ€™s interface. The app can also be prompted by shaking the phone. Once the code is entered, TapZilla automatically puts the app cost in the buyerâ€™s PayPal account or can issue an iTunes gift card.
one_liner: Woot for iOS apps.

name: MessageParty
one_liner: Local chat.

name: Ready For Zero
long_description:
ReadyForZero creates online financial tools for managing debt automatically. ReadyForZero users create plans, make payments, monitor credit and track their progress via the web or mobile. 

As of 2015, customers paid down over $250 million in debt - on their own. ReadyForZero was acquired by Avant.

https://www.readyforzero.com/who-it-helps
one_liner: Help people get out of debt. Simplified personal debt and credit…

name: Post.fm
one_liner: New email inbox.

name: Opzi
long_description: Opzi was a knowledge management platform, styled as a "Quora for the enterprise," that became the First Round Network.
